TAFSEER-E-QURAN

Compiled by Shoeb Raza Abdi Nauganvi,  Bombay

(Daily Written & WhatsApp Posted.)

SURAH TAUBA
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

(Qur'an ki har Ayat ki Tafseer daily WhatsApp aur doosre Social Media par post ki jaati hai. Daily mukhtalif kitabon ke hawale se likha jata hai. Main source: Tafseer e Noorus Saqlain aur Tafseer e Namoona (Urdu).

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

          *7th Rabius Sani 1441*

  *5th December 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SURAH TAUBAH*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1357)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُكُمۡ فِی ٱلدِّینِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡـَٔایَـٰتِ لِقَوۡمࣲ یَعۡلَمُونَ*

[Surat At-Tawbah 11]

_"Pas agar woh Taubah kar len aur Namaz qayem karen aur Zakat ada karne lag jayen to woh tumhare Deeni  Bhai hain aur Jannewalon ke liye Ham Ayaat ko wazeh karte hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 11)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Surah ko Surah Taubah, Surah Bara'at *برائت* aur Surah Fazeha bhi kaha jata hai.

👉🏻Surah Bara'at kahne ki wajah ye hai ke iske aghaz mein Mushrekin se Bara'at ka Ailaan kiya gaya hai.

👉🏻Surah Fazeh  *فاضحه* kahne ki wajah ye hai ke is Surah mein Munafiqeen ko be naqab kiya gaya hai aur unhe khoob zaleel kiya gaya hai.

👉🏻Is Surah ke ibteda mein Bismillah nahi hai. Mufasserin ne do wajah batayi hain:

Ek to ye ke ye mustaqil Surah nahi hai. Ye Surah Anfaal ka hi hissa hai aur dono ke Topics common hain.

Doosre Muqasserin ka kahna hai ke ye Surah Jalal e Khuda Wandi ka Mazhar hai aur ye Surah Kuffar o Mushrekin ke liye tabahi o barbadi ka Paigham le kar aayi hai isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne iski ibteda mein Apni Shaane Rehmani o Rahimi ka zikr karna munasib nahi samjha kyonki is Surah ke zariye se Allah ne Azaab ka zikr kiya hai.

Jabke pahli wajah zyada durust nazar aati hai.

📚

*Is Surah ke Topic:*

1. Mushrekin wa Ahle Kitab ke saath Jihad.

2. Munafeqeen ke Kirdar ki nishaandahi.

3. Jihad ki Targheeb.

4. Jihad se kinara kashi karne walon ke heele bahane.

5. Kuffar o Mushrekin se Dosti ki Mumani'at (Prohibition)

6. Ayaat e Zakat.

📚

Is Surah ke Fazail mein wohi Surah Anfaal ki Ahadis hain.

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Jo aatish e Jahannum se darega wo Allah se apne gunaho'n ke baare mein jaldi Tauba karega aur Haraam kaam karne se bachega."_

(Tuhfal Uquul, p281, Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنْ يَقْبَلُ التَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِ،..*

_"Aye Woh Jo Apne Bandon ki Tauba qubool karta hai."_

(Dua Joshan e Kabir No. 67)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM HASAN ASKARI (as)*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

***********************************

           *8th Rabius Sani 1441*

      *6th December 2019, Friday,*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

_*Hadis e Lauh mein Imam Askari (as) ka zikr:*_

*"ابو محمد الحسن بن على(ع) الرفيق، أمه جاريه، إسمها سمانة، تكني بٱم الحسن، الْخَازِنَ لِعِلْمِی  وَ أُکمِلُ ذَلِک بِابْنِهِ محمد رَحْمَةً لِلْعَالَمِینَ عَلَیهِ کمَالُ مُوسَی وَ بَهَاءُ عِیسَی وَ صَبْرُ أَیوبَ فَیذَلُّ أَوْلِیائِی فِی زَمَانِهِ وَ تُتَهَادَی رُءُوسُهُمْ."*

_"Abu Mohd Al Hasan bin Ali (as), Al Rafeeq, unki madaregrami Kaneez Samana, unki Kunniyat Ummul Hasan, Ilm ka Khazana, unke bete Muhammad par (Imamat) ki takmeel hui."_

(Kamaluddin, Vol 1, P-308)

🌷 _*Biography of Imam Askari (as), Click:*_

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hasan_al-Askari

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SURAH BARA'AT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1358)

*بَرَاۤءَةࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۤ إِلَى ٱلَّذِینَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ*

_"Allah aur Uske Rasool (saww) ki taraf se un Mushrekin ke liye *Ailaan e Bara'at* hai jinse tumne Moaede kiye the."_

(Surah Taubah: 1)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

_*Surah Tauba mein Bismillah kyon nahi hai?*_

👉🏻

1. Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Surah Anfaal aur Surah Taubah dar asl ek hi Surah hai. Isliye darmiyan mein Bismillah nahi likhi gayi."_

👉🏻

2. Bismillah Amaan o Rehmat ki Alamat hai jabke Tauba Amaan khatm karne ke liye nazil hui hai.

👉🏻

﻿Imam Ali (as):

_" Surah Tauba mein Bismillah na likhne ki wajah ye thi ke Bismillah Amaan o Rehmat ke liye hai aur Surah Bara'at (Surah Tauba) naazil is liye hui thi ke Amaan uthayi jaye aur Talwaar chalaayi jaye."_

(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p36)

👉🏻

3. Surah ki ibteda in Alfaaz se ki gayi ke Allah aur Uske Rasool ki taraf se un Mushrekin ke liye Ailaan Bara'at hai jinse tumne Moaeda kiye the.

Nabi 3 wujuhat ki bena par Moaeda faskh (Cancel) kar sakta hai:

1. Shart ye rakhen ke ye Agreement jab tak qaem rahega tab tak Khuda Mansookh ka Hukm de.

2. Paiman Shikni Mushrekin ki taraf se ho.

3. Moaeda ek makhsoos arse ke liye ho.

👉🏻

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Mushrekin se Moaede mein pahle shart rakhi thi. Mushrekin bhi Moaeda tod chuke the. Isliye Allah Ta'ala ne Moaeda faskh hone ka Ailaan kar diya.

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Askari (as):

_"Aa'nkh ki Siyaahi Aa'nkh ki Safedi se itna qareeb nahi hoti jitna BISMILLAH HIR RAHMAN AR RAHIM Ism e Aazam ke qareeb hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, p915)

🤲🏻

*بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ اِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيْمِ*

(Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

***********************************

           *9th Rabius Sani 1441*

    *7th December 2019, Saturday,*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SURAH BARA'AT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1359)

*بَرَاۤءَةࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۤ إِلَى ٱلَّذِینَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ*

_"Allah aur Uske Rasool (saww) ki taraf se un Mushrekin ke liye *Ailaan e Bara'at* hai jinse tumne Moaede kiye the."_

(Surah Taubah: 1)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

_*Fazilat Hazrat Ali (as):*_

Haris bin Sa'labah ne Saad bin Abi Waqas se kaha:

"Kya tu ne Ali (as) ke kuchh Fazail ka mushaheda kiya?"

Usne kaha:

"Ji haan, meine Ali (as) ke 5 Manaqeb ka mushaheda kiya aur Ali (as) ki Panchvi Fazail itni qeemti hai ke agar un mein se mujhe ek Fazilat bhi hasil hoti to woh mujhe surkh Oonton se bhi zyada Mehboob hoti. Hazrat Ali (as) ki Panchvi Fazilat ye hai ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Abu Bakr ko Surah Bara'at ki Ayat de kar rawana kiya tha. Phir AanHazrat (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ko rawana kiya aur unhone usse wo Ayat le li thi. Abu Bakr Rasoole Akram (saww) ke paas aaya aur arz kiya ke kya mere mutalliq Aasmaan se koi Hukm nazil hua hai?

Nabi Akram (saww) ne farmaya: _"Nahi, baat ye hai ke meri taraf se woh Paigham pahuncha sakta hai jo mujh se ho."_

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Roze Shura apni Khilafat ke istehqaq ke liye yehi Fazilat ki taraf ishara kiya. Jibrael (as) ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se yehi farmaya tha ya to Aap khud jayen ya us ko bhejen jo Aap mein se ho. Is baat ka hazirin e Shura ne bhi iqrar kiya tha.

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Riwayat:

Ibne Umar ne bayan kiya ke Abu Bakr ne farmaya ke, _"Nabi e Kareem (saww) (ki khushnoodi) Aap (saww) ke Ahle Bait (as) ke saath (Mohabbat o Khidmat ke zariye) talaash karo."_

(Sahih Bukhari, V5, p185, H-3751)

🤲🏻

*وَ بِالْبَرَاۤئَةِ مِمَّنْ اَسَّسَ اَسَاسَ ذٰلِكَ وَ بَنٰي عَلَيْهِ بُنْيَانَهُ وَ جَرٰي فِيْ ظُلْمِهِ وَجَوْرِهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ عَلٰيۤ اَشْيَاعِكُمْ بَرِئْتُ اِلَي اللهِ وَ اِلَيْكُمْ مِنْهُمْ وَ اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَي اللهِ ثُمَّ اِلَيْكُمْ بِمُوَالَاتِكُمْ وَ مُوَالَاةِ وَلِيِّكُمْ وَ بِالْبَرَاۤئَةِ مِنْ اَعْدَاۤئِكُمْ وَ النَّاصِبِيْنَ لَكُمُ الْحَرْبَ وَبِالْبَرَاۤئَةِ مِنْ اَشيَاعِهمْ وَ اَتْبَاعِهِمْ....*

(Ziyarat e Ashura - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM HASAN ASKARI (as)*

(Doosri Rivayat se)

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

***********************************

           *10th Rabius Sani 1441*

      *8th December 2019, Sunday,*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🌷 _*Biography of Imam Askari (as), Click:*_

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hasan_al-Askari

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SURAH BARA'AT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1360)

*فَسِیحُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرࣲ وَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّكُمۡ غَیۡرُ مُعۡجِزِی ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِی ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ*

_"Tum Zameen par 4 Mahine aur chal phir lo aur tum ye jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz na kar sakoge aur Yaqeenan Allah Kafiron ko ruswa karnewala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 2)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

_*4 Mahine ki chhoot:*_

🕋

Imam Sadiq (as) se Rivayat hai:

Hajj ke Mahine Shawwal, Zilqad aur Zilhajj ke 10 Din hain. Iske baad chalne phirne ke liye Khuda ne Mushrekin ko 4 Mahine ki chhoot di yani Mahe Zilhajj ke 20 Din, Mahe Muharram, Mahe Safar aur Rabiul Awwal ke ibtedai Din ki Mohlat di gayi thi.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Musa Kazim (as) se sawal kiya gaya ke kya wajah hai ke Hajj karne wale ke Gunah 4 Mahine tak kyon nahi likhe jate?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

"Iski wajah ye hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne Mushrekin ke liye 4 Mahine tak Haram Mubah qarar diya tha aur farmaya: _"Tum Zameen mein 4 Mahine chal phir lo."_ (9:1) Isiliye Allah ne Hajj karne wale Ahle Imaan ko bhi ye chhoot di ke unke 4 Mahine tak Gunah nahi likhe jate."

(Al Kaafi, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab koi Haji Hajj karta hai to uske 4 Mahine baad tak uske Naama Aamaal mein Nekiyan likhi jati hain aur Buraiyyan nahi likhi jati aur jab 4 Mahine guzar jate hain to woh aur logon ke saath shamil ho jata hai."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

**وَ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي شَهْرِنَا هٰذَا الْمُرَجَّبِ الْمُكَرَّمِ وَ مَا بَعْدَهُ مِنَ الْاَشْهُرِ الْحُرُمِ...*

(Dua e Mahe Rajab - Mafateeh )

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *11th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *9th December 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*ALI (as) 'AZAAN' HAIN*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1361)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَذَ ٰ⁠نࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۤ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَجِّ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِیۤءࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ* فَإِن تُبۡتُمۡ فَهُوَ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكُمۡۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّیۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّكُمۡ غَیۡرُ مُعۡجِزِی ٱللَّهِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِیمٍ.

_*"Hajj e Akbar ke Din tamam logon ke liye Allah aur uske Rasool (saww) ki taraf se Ailaan kiya jata hai ke Allah (Allah aur Rasool (saww) ki taraf se Azaan hain.) aur Uska Rasool Mushrekin se Bezaar hain.* Agar tum log Tauba kar lo to tumhare Haq mein behtar hai aur agar tumne Munh moda to jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz na kar sakoge aur Kafiron ko Dardnak Azaab ki basharat do."_

(Surah Taubah: 3)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Lafz Azaan *اذان* wo Naam hai jo Allah ne Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ko Aasmaan se ata kiya hai kyonki unhone hi Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki taraf se Surah Bara'at ko tableegh ki thi."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Zainul Abedin (as):

_"Ayat (9:3) ke tahet Hazrat Ali (as) hi Allah aur Rasool (saww) ki Azaan ban kar gaye the."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Abu Bakr se Khuda ki Qasam de kar daryaft kiya Surah Bara'at ki Tableegh ke liye 'Azaan' ban kar tu gaya tha ke mein?

Usne kaha Aap (as) hi gaye the.

(Kitabul Khisaal)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Logo! Agah raho, Allah Ta'ala ne Qur'an Karim mein mujhe kuchh Asma se makhsoos kiya hai. In Asma par qabza karne ki koshish na karna warna Deen mein gumrah ho jaoge. Mein hi Duniya o Akherat mein Mu'azzin hun. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: "Unke darmiyan ek Ailaan karne wala (Mu'azzin) ye Ailaan karega ke Zalimon par Khuda ki La'anat hai. (7:44), Allah Ta’ala ka farman (9:3), wo Azaan bhi mein hi hun."_

(Khutba Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Logon ke darmiyan mein hi "Azaan" tha."_

(Noorus Saqlain, Kitabul Khisaal, Kitab Ilalush Sharaye)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕌

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab bhi Azaan wagairah mein H. Rasule Khuda (saww) ka zikr karo ya koi aur shakhs tumhare saamne unka zikr kare to Rasule Khuda (saww) par Durood o Salaam (Salwaat) bhejo."_

(Wasaail ush Shia, v4, p78)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Kam az kam Azaan itni kaafi hai ke Raat ki (Namazo'n ki) ibteda (Namaz e Maghrib mein) Azaan o Iqamat se karo aur Din ki (Namazo'n ki) ibteda (Namaz e Subh mein) Azaan o Iqamat har do se karo aur baaqi Namazo'n mein baghair Azaan ke sirf Iqamat kehna bhi kaafi hai."_

(Wasaail ush Shia, v4, p45)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْئَلُكَ بِحَقِّ اَمِيْرِالْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ عَلِىِّ بْنِ اَبِيْطَالِبٍ عَلَيْهَالسَّلَامُ اِلَّا انْتَقَمْتَ بِهِ مِمَّنْ ظَلَمَنِىْ وَغَشَمَنِىْ وَاٰذَانِىْ وَانْطَوٰى عَلٰى ذٰلِكَ وَكَفَيْتَنِىْ بِهِ مَؤُنَةَ كُلِّ اَحَدٍ يَاۤ اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.*

(Doosri Dua e Tawassul - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *12th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *10th December 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*HAJJ-E-AKBAR*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1362)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَذَ ٰ⁠نࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۤ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَجِّ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِیۤءࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ* فَإِن تُبۡتُمۡ فَهُوَ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكُمۡۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّیۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّكُمۡ غَیۡرُ مُعۡجِزِی ٱللَّهِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِیمٍ.

_*"Hajj e Akbar ke Din tamam logon ke liye Allah aur uske Rasool (saww) ki taraf se Ailaan kiya jata hai ke Allah (Allah aur Rasool (saww) ki taraf se Azaan hain.) aur Uska Rasool Mushrekin se Bezaar hain.* Agar tum log Tauba kar lo to tumhare Haq mein behtar hai aur agar tumne Munh moda to jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz na kar sakoge aur Kafiron ko Dardnak Azaab ki basharat do."_

(Surah Taubah: 3)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd..)

Fateh Makkah 8 AH, Surah Bara'at 9 AH mein nazil hui aur Hujjatul Wuda 10 AH ko hua.

Jis Hajj ke mauqe par Hazrat Ali (as) ne Hukme Khuda Wandi se ek se chhin kar Ailaan e Bara'at kiya, woh Hajj e Akbar hai, jis Din unhe Azaan ka laqab mila.

Imam Sadiq (as) se Hajj e Akbar ke mutalliq sawal kiya to Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Us Saal jo Hajj hua tha wo Hajj e Akbar tha kyonki us Saal Hajj mein Musalmano ke alawa Mushrekin bhi sharik the. Us Saal ke baad Mushrekin ke liye Hajj ko mamnu (prohibited) qarar diya gaya tha."_

_"Is se Qurbani ka Din murad hai."_

_"Jabke Hajj e Asghar "Umrah" ko kaha jata hai."_

(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Tafseer e Ayyashi mein hai ke is Ayat (9:3) Khurooj e Qaem (atfs) bhi shamil hai.

🕋

Imam Sadiq (as):

Hazrat Ali (as) ka farman hai:

_"Hajj e Akbar" Qurbani ka Din hai. Chunanche in 4 Mahino mein 20 Din Zilhajj ke, Mahe Muharram, Mahe Safar, Mahe Rabiul Awwal ke ke 3 Mahine aur Rabius Sani ke pahle 10 Din shamil hain. Agar Hajj e Akbar Roze Arafa hota to phir Kafiron ko di jaane wali mohlat 4 Mahine aur ek Din qarar pati."_

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

🗒

AanHazrat (saww) ne farmaya Quran ke mein 4 Mahino ko Haram qarar diya gaya hai: Rajab, Zilqad, Zilhajj aur Muharram. (9:36)

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕋

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab koi Hajj karta hai to 4 mahine tak uske gunah likkhe nahi jaate aur agar wo koi gunah e Kabira nahi karta to is dauraan sirf nek aamaal darj hote hain."_

(Greater Sins, III)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"(Aye Maabood!) Mujhe Apne mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is Saal aur aainda Saalon mein bhi naseeb farma aur mujhe Apne wus'at waale fazl se kushaada Rizq de..."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimaali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *13th Rabius Sani 1441*

 *11th December 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*MUSHREKIN SE INTEQAM*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1363)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ ثُمَّ لَمۡ یَنقُصُوكُمۡ شَیۡـࣰٔا وَلَمۡ یُظَـٰهِرُوا۟ عَلَیۡكُمۡ أَحَدࣰا فَأَتِمُّوۤا۟ إِلَیۡهِمۡ عَهۡدَهُمۡ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ یُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ * فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلۡأَشۡهُرُ ٱلۡحُرُمُ فَٱقۡتُلُوا۟ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ حَیۡثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمۡ وَخُذُوهُمۡ وَٱحۡصُرُوهُمۡ وَٱقۡعُدُوا۟ لَهُمۡ كُلَّ مَرۡصَدࣲۚ فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّوا۟ سَبِیلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ*

_"Albatta us se woh Mushrik mustashna (exception) hain jinse tumne Moaede kiye hain phir unhone Moaeda poora karne mein kisi kami ka muzahera nahi kiya aur tumhare khilaf kisi Dushman ki madad nahi ki to aise logon ke saath muddat e Moaeda Wafai karo. Yaqeenan Allah Parhezgaron se Muhabbat rakhta hai."_

_"Jab Hurmat wale Mahine guzar jayen to Mushrekin ko jahan pao wahan qatl karo. Unhe pakdo aur unka gherao karo aur har ghat mein unki talash mein baith jao. Pas agar woh Tauba kar len aur Namaz qaem karen aur Zakat ada karne lag jayen to unhe chhod do. Yaqeenan Allah bahut Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Anfaal: 2 - 5)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) koi Lashkar rawana karte the to Aap (saww) unhe apne saamne baitha kar unse farmate the: "Allah ka Naam le kar chale jao aur Khuda ki Madad ke saath jao aur Allah ki Raah aur Uske Rasool ki Millat ke liye chale jao. Khabardar! Khayanat na karna, Dushman ki Laashon ka hulya tabdeel na karna aur kisi Boodhe, Bachche aur Aurat ko qatl na karna aur kisi majboori ke baghair Darakht na kaatna aur agar koi Musalman khwah woh aala darje ka ho ya adna darje ka ho, kisi Mushrik ki taraf Shafqat ki nazar se dekhe to use Amaan de dena yahan tak ke woh Allah ka Kalam sune aur agar Kalam e Khuda sunne ke baad tumhari Pairavi ikhtiyar kar le to woh tumhara Deeni bhai hai warna use uske pur amn maqam tak pahunchao aur uske khilaf Allah se Madad ki darkhwast karo."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ne Ali (as) ko Apne aur Apni makhlooq ke darmiyaan Alaamat (Nishani) banaya hai. Pus, jisne unki Ma'arefat haasil ki wo Momin hai aur jisne inkaar kiya wo Kafir hai aur jo unse Jaahil raha wo Gumrah hai aur jisne unke saath kisi shay ko qaem kiya wo Mushrik hai. Jisne unki Wilayat ka iqraar kiya wo daakhil e Jannat hua aur jisne unse adawat ki wo waasil e Jahannum hua."_

(Al Kaafi, v4, p360)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى صَاحِبِ النُّهٰى وَ الْفَضْلِ وَ الطَّوَاۤئِلِ وَ الْمَكْرُمَاتِ وَ النَّوَاۤئِلِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى فَارِسِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ لَيْثِ الْمُوَحِّدِيْنَ وَ قَاتِلِ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ وَ وَصِيِّ رَسُوْلِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّٰهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهُ.*

(Ziyarat e Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *14th Rabius Sani 1441*

 *12th December 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*PANAAHGAZIN - REFUGEES*_ ♦

          (MUSHRIK SHARNARTHI)

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1364)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِنۡ أَحَدࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ ٱسۡتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرۡهُ حَتَّىٰ یَسۡمَعَ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبۡلِغۡهُ مَأۡمَنَهُۥۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ لَّا یَعۡلَمُونَ*

_"Aur agar koi Mushrik Kalam e Khuda sunne ke liye Aap (saww) se panah maang kar Aap (saww) ke paas aaye to Aap (saww) use panah den yahan tak ke woh Allah ka Kalam sun le. Phir use uske pur amn maqam tak pahunchao. Iski wajah ye hai ke ye na Jannewale log hain."_

(Surah Tauba: 6)

📚📖 ☂

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Halaat hazra mein Kafir/Mushrikon panah dene ki awaz uth rahi hai.

Islam ne Mushrekin ko Panah dene ka zikr kiya hai agar woh Panah talab karen aur Islami baten sunne ko tayyar hon. Lekin apni Tableegh ke baad unko hifazat ke saath unki pur amn jagah ko pahunchane ki baat ki.

Agarche guzishta Ayat mein Allah ne Mushrekin ko sakhti se mukhtib kiya hain jabke is Ayat mein Sharnarthiyon ke saath Narmi se pesh kiya hai.

👉🏻

Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi mein marqoom hai ke Allah ne Apne Nabi ko  Hukm diya hai ke jab koi Mushrik Kalam e Khuda sunne ke liye Aap (saww) se panah talab kare to Aap (saww) use panah den aur Quran sunayen aur uske shukook o shubhat ka ezala (door) karen aur is dauraan us par koi dast darazi zor zabardasti na karen yahan tak ke woh apne pur amn maqam par pahunch jayen.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Allah ka Kalam Allah ek Fe'l (Action) hai jise Khuda ne doosre Af'aal ki tarah se insha (khalq - create) kiya hai. Kalam pahle maujood na tha aur agar Kalam pahle se maujood hota to wo bhi Qadeem hota aur wo doosra Ma'bood qarar pata."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

☂

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jo shakhs khauf-naak balaa se kisi khauf-zada Insaan ko Amaan dega, Khuda usay Iqaab o Azaab se panaah mein rakhega."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p108)

☂

Imam Kazim (as):

_"Jis shakhs ke paas uska bhai baaz haalaat mein Panaah lene ki garaz se aaye aur woh qudrat rakhne ke bawajood use Panaah na de, to wo Khuda Wande Aalam ki Wilayat ko Qata' (cut-off) karega."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1, p129)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

*.. يَا رَبِّ هٰذَا مَقَامُ مَنْ لَّاذَبِكَ، وَاسْتَجَارَ بِكَرَمِكَ، وَ اَلِفَ اِحْسَانَكَ وَ نِعَمَكَ،..*

_"Main Panaah chahta hun Teri, na kisi aur ki. Aur siwaaye Tere kisi aur se kashaaish ka taalib nahi hun."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *15th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *13th December 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*AHD SHIKNI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1365)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كَیۡفَ یَكُونُ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ عَهۡدٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦۤ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ عَـٰهَدتُّمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِۖ فَمَا ٱسۡتَقَـٰمُوا۟ لَكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَقِیمُوا۟ لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ یُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ *  كَیۡفَ وَإِن یَظۡهَرُوا۟ عَلَیۡكُمۡ لَا یَرۡقُبُوا۟ فِیكُمۡ إِلࣰّا وَلَا ذِمَّةࣰۚ یُرۡضُونَكُم بِأَفۡوَ ٰ⁠هِهِمۡ وَتَأۡبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ*

_"In Mushrekin ke liye Allah aur Uske Rasool ke nazdeek koi Ahd akhir kaise rah sakta hai siwai unke ke jinse tumne Ahd o Paiman Masjidul Haram ke paas kiya hai, to jab tak woh log tumse Moaede nibhain tum bhi unse wafadari karo. Yaqeenan Allah Ahle Taqwa se Muhabbat karta hai."_

_"Unke Waadon ka kya aitbar, unka agar tum par ghalba ho jaye, to na to ye Qarabatdari ka khayal karenge na Ahdo Paiman ka. Woh log apni Zabano se tumhe raazi kar rahe hain magar unke Dil inkar karte hain aur unki aksariyat Badkaron (Fasiq) par mushtamil hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 7 - 8)

📚📖 📜

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Mushrekin aur Rasool (saww) ke darmiyan Moaeda tika rahna mushkil tha aur yehi hua. 6 AH mein Hudaibiya mein kuchh Moaede Mushrekin ke sab Qabilon aur Rasool (saww) ke darmiyan hue the. Hudaibiya Masjidul Haram se 50 Mile door par hai, lekin us waqt ye poora area Haram mein shumar hota tha. Lekin is Moaede ke bawajood Kuffar e Quraish ne Moaeda toda, Jang hui aur Fateh Makkah hua 8 AH mein. Tab ye Mushrekin Musalman ho gaye lekin Dilon mein koi tabdeeli nahi aayi. Yani Munafiqon ne janm liya. Ye Ayat 9 AH mein nazil hui jo guzishta aur aane waale halaat ka khulasa bayan kar rahi hai. Quraish jo ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Rishtedar the unhone koi Rishtedari ka paas o lehaz nahi rakha aur muqabila araayi ki. Yehi Paiman Shikni ka natija Jange Jamal ki surat mein zahir hua.

(To be Cont'd...)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye logo'n! Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) se Muhabbat karo, kyunki unka Gosht mera Gosht hai. Unka khoon mera khoon hai. Allah Ta'ala Laa'nat kare meri Ummat mein se un logo'n par jo Ali (as) ke bare mein mere Ahd ko zaaya kar de'n aur uske baare mein meri Wasiyyat ko bhool jayen. Aise logo'n ke liye Khuda ke nazdeek koi Ajr o Sawaab nahi hai."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p182)

🤲🏻

*وَ صَلِّ عَلٰى وَلِيِّكَ وَ وُلَاةِ عَهْدِكَ وَ الْاَئِمَّةِ مِنْ وُلْدِهِ وَ مُدَّ فِي اَعْمَارِهِمْ وَ زِدْ فِي اٰجَالِهِمْ وَ بَلِّغْهُمْ اَقْصٰى اٰمَالِهِمْ دِيْنًا وَ دُنْيَا وَ اٰخِرَةً اِنَّكَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ قَدِيْرٌ*

(Dua Abul Hasan Zarab Al Isfahani - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *16th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *14th December 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*JANG-E-JAMAL*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1366)

*ٱشۡتَرَوۡا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنࣰا قَلِیلࣰا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِیلِهِۦۤۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَاۤءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ *  لَا یَرۡقُبُونَ فِی مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلࣰّا وَلَا ذِمَّةࣰۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ *  فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُكُمۡ فِی ٱلدِّینِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡـَٔایَـٰتِ لِقَوۡمࣲ یَعۡلَمُونَ*

_"Unhone Allah ki Ayat ke evaz thodi si qeemat qabool kar li hai aur unhone Allah ki Raah mein rukawaten dali hain. Ye bahut bure kaam kaam sar anjaam dete rahe hain."_

_"Ye (itne sangdil hain ke) kisi Momin ke mutalliq na to Qarabat ka lehaz rakhte hain aur na hi kisi Moaeda ka dhyan rakhte hain aur yehi log zyadti karne wale hain."_

_"Pas agar woh Tauba kar len aur Namaz qaem karen aur Zakat ada karne lag jayen to woh tumhare Deeni Bhai hai aur Jannewalon ke liye ham Ayaat ko wazeh karte hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 9 - 11])

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd)

Jaisa ke pahle bataya Ahd Shikni Rasool (saww) ke jaane ke baad bhi hui. Kuffar Musalman hue lekin Dil Kufr se bhara tha. Jange Jamal mein ek taraf Zauja e Rasool to doosri taraf Khalifa e Rasool the. Ayat (:12) isi se mutalliq hai.

⚔👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as) se Basrah ke kuchh afraad ne Jange Jamal ke bare mein Poochha to Aap (as) ne farmaya:

"Unka talluq Kufr ke sarghano (Chiefs) se tha. Jange Jamal mein jab dono taraf se Safen qaem huin to Hazrat Ali (as) ne apne saathiyon se farmaya ke hamla karne mein jaldi na karo taake mein un logon par Itmaam e Hujjat kar sakun. Phir Aap (as) ne Ahle Basrah se khitab karte hue farmaya:

_"Ahle Basrah! Kya meine Hukm e Khuda Wandi ke nifaaz mein koi zyadti ki hai?"_ Unhone kaha: "Nahi." Phir Aap (as) ne farmaya: _"Kya meine Baitul Maal mein koi Khayanat ki hai?"_ Unhone Kaha: " Nahi." Phir Aap (as) ne farmaya: _"Kya meine Baitul Maal ki Raqam ka koi hissa utha kar apne aur apne Ahle Bait (as) ko diya hai jiski wajah se tum mujh par naraaz hue ho aur tumne meri Bai'at todi ho?"_ Unhone kaha: "Nahi." Aap (as) ne farmaya: _"Khudara! Mujhe batao meri Bai'at kyon todi ja rahi hai aur mere ghairon ki Bai'at ko kyon nahi toda gaya tha? Meine maamla ki achhi tarah se tehqeeq kar li hai. Ab mujhe do mein se ek ka intekhab karna hai, ya Kufr ya Talwaar."_ (Aur mein Kufr ke bajaye Talwaar ka intekhab karunga). Phir Aap (as) apne Lashkar ki taraf mutawajjah hue aur farmaya: Allah ne Qur'an mein farmaya (9:12).

Phir Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Us Zaat ki Qasam Jisne Daane ko shigafta kiya aur Insaani Jaan ko paida farmaya aur Jisne Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ko Nabuwwat ke liye muntakhab kiya, ye log isi Ayat ke misdaq hain aur jab se ye Ayat nazil hui hai is par Aaj tak amal nahi hua,  aaj is Ayat par amal hoga."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd..)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Momin Khaalis Tauba karta hai to Allah usko chahne lagta hai aur Duniya o Akherat mein uske gunaho'n ko chhupa leta hai."_

(Sharh Dua e Kumail)

🤲🏻

*اِلٰهِيْ قَدْ مَدَّ اِلَيْكَ الْخَاطِئُ الْمُذْنِبُ يَدَيْهِ بِحُسْنِ ظَنِّهِ بِكَ اِلٰهِيْ قَدْ جَلَسَ الْمُسِيۤ‏ءُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ مُقِرًّا لَكَ بِسُوۤءِ عَمَلِهِ وَ رَاجِيًا مِنْكَ الصَّفْحَ عَنْ زَلَلِہِ*

(Kufa mein Zaid bin Sauhan ka Mazar aur Masjid  Huzaifa Yamani hain. Yahan ke kuchh Ziyarat wa Aamal hain. Ye dono Ashaab e Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) the aur Jange Jamal mein Shaheed hue. Ye Dua bhi usi ka ek hissa hai.)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *17th Rabius Sani 1441*

  *15th December 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*JANG-E-JAMAL*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1366)

*ٱشۡتَرَوۡا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنࣰا قَلِیلࣰا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِیلِهِۦۤۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَاۤءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ *  لَا یَرۡقُبُونَ فِی مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلࣰّا وَلَا ذِمَّةࣰۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ *  فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُكُمۡ فِی ٱلدِّینِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡـَٔایَـٰتِ لِقَوۡمࣲ یَعۡلَمُونَ*

_"Unhone Allah ki Ayat ke evaz thodi si qeemat qabool kar li hai aur unhone Allah ki Raah mein rukawaten dali hain. Ye bahut bure kaam kaam sar anjaam dete rahe hain."_

_"Ye (itne sangdil hain ke) kisi Momin ke mutalliq na to Qarabat ka lehaz rakhte hain aur na hi kisi Moaeda ka dhyan rakhte hain aur yehi log zyadti karne wale hain."_

_"Pas agar woh Tauba kar len aur Namaz qaem karen aur Zakat ada karne lag jayen to woh tumhare Deeni Bhai hai aur Jannewalon ke liye ham Ayaat ko wazeh karte hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 9 - 11])

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd)

Jaisa ke pahle bata chuke hain Jange Jamal mein bhi Ahd Shikni hui. Jange Jamal mein ek taraf Zauja e Rasool thi to doosri taraf Khalifa e Rasool the. Jang mein Dono to sahih nahi ho sakte. Quran ki Ayat ke mutabiq Rishtedari ka bhi paas lehaz nahi kiya. Rivayaat mulaheza farmayen.

⚔👉🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Roz e Jamal farmaya:

_"Meine us Paiman Shikan Giroh se Qur'an Majeed ki is Ayat (9:12) ke tahet Jang ki."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚔

_"Jab se ye Ayat nazil hui hai is par aaj tak amal ki bari nahi aayi (aur aaj aayi hai)"_

(Aamal e Tusi, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚔

Hasan Basri ka bayan hai ke jab Hazrat Ali (as) Ahle Jamal ke Fitne se farigh hue to Aap (as) Minbar par baithe aur Khuda ki Hamd o Sana aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) par Darood padhne ke baad ye Ayat (9:12) padhi aur farmaya:

_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne mujh se Ahd liya tha aur mujh se farmaya tha ke tujhe Baghi Giroh aur Paiman Shikan Giroh aur Deen se nikalne wale Giroh se zaroor Jang karna padegi."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚔

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Allah mujhe Talha o Zubair se mazoor rakhega kyonki in dono ne apni khushi se kisi ke majboor kiye baghair meri Bai'at ki thi aur phir meri kisi ghalti ke baghair unhone meri Bai'at todi thi. Khuda ki Qasam! Ayat (9:12) jab nazil hui is par amal karne ki nobat Jange Jamal mein hi pesh aayi."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

Note: Jang e Jamal ki tafseel Tarikh ki Kitabon darj hai, refer karen.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Riwayat:

_"Imam Ali (as) ke bade dushmano’n mein Abdullah ibne Zubair bhi tha jo aap ko elaania (openly) aur khullam khulla gaali deta tha aur Basra mein jab usne khutba padha to logo’n se kaha ke tumhari taraf bewaqoof, kamina, zaleel aur bakheel Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) aaye hain (MAZALLAH). Iske bawajood jab aap ne Jung e Jamal khatm ki aur ye qaid kar ke Imam (as) ke saamne laya gaya to aap ne koi sakht lafz istemaal na kiya na gussa dikhaya balke darguzar karte huwe apna Mu’nh pher liya aur usko baksh diya."_

(Shabha e Peshawar, v1, p270)

🤲🏻

*٠٠اِلٰهِيْ جَاۤءَكَ الْعَبْدُ الْخَاطِئُ فَزِعًا مُشْفِقًا وَ رَفَعَ اِلَيْكَ طَرْفَهُ حَذِرًا رَاجِيًا وَ فَاضَتْ عَبْرَتُهُ مُسْتَغْفِرًا نَادِمًا وَ عِزَّتِكَ وَ جَلَالِكَ مَا اَرَدْتُ بِمَعْصِيَتِيْ مُخَالَفَتَكَ وَ مَا عَصَيْتُكَ اِذْ عَصَيْتُكَ...*

(Kufa mein Zaid bin Sauhan ka Mazar aur Masjid  Huzaifa Yamani hain. Yahan ke kuchh Ziyarat wa Aamal hain. Ye dono Ashaab e Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) the aur Jange Jamal mein Shaheed hue. Ye Dua bhi usi ka ek hissa hai.)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *18th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *16th December 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*JIHAD KE FAWAID*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1368)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَـٰتِلُوهُمۡ یُعَذِّبۡهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِأَیۡدِیكُمۡ وَیُخۡزِهِمۡ وَیَنصُرۡكُمۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡ وَیَشۡفِ صُدُورَ قَوۡمࣲ مُّؤۡمِنِینَ *  وَیُذۡهِبۡ غَیۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَیَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن یَشَاۤءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمٌ*

_"Unse Jang karo. Allah tumhare haatho unko Azaab dega aur Khuda unhe ruswa karega. Aur unke muqabile mein tumhari Madad karenge aur Momino ke Seeno ko thandak ata karega aur unke Dilon ka Ghussa khatm kar dega. Khuda jise chahta hai Tauba ki Taufeeq ata karta hai. Allah Sahib e Ilm aur Sahib e Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 14 - 15)

📚📖 ⚔

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Kuffar se Jang karne ki 7 Wujuhaat bayan ki thi aur in fo Ayaat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Jang ke 5 Fawaid bayan kiye hain aur in mein se agar ek fayde ke liye bhi Jang karna pade to koi nuqsaan nahi hai.

*Benefits:*

1. Allah tumhare haatho se unhe Azaab dega.

     Azaab 3 Qism ke hain:

     (a) Qatl hona (b) Qaid hona (c) Maal lut jaana.

2. Allah Ta'ala unhr ruswa karega.

3. Allah unke muqabile par tumhari Madad karega.

4. Allah Mo'meneen ke dukhte hue Seeno ko shifa ata karega.

5. Allah unke Dilon ka Ghussa khatm kar dega.

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚔

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Ali bin Uqba ke Walid se farmaya:

_"Tumhe basharat ho kyonki Allah ne tumhe do mein se ek bhalai ata ki hai. Allah ne tumhare Seeno ko shifa di hai, tumhare Dilon ke Ghusse ko khatm kiya hai aur tumhe tumhare Dushman par Ghalba diya hai. (9:14) Aur agar ye cheezen dekhne se pahle tum mar bhi jao to bhi tumhe koi nuqsaan nahi hai kyonki tumhari Maut Allah ke us Deen par waqe hogi jise Khuda ne apne Nabi (saww) aur Ali (as) ke liye pasand kiya hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Afzal Jihad Khwaishaat ke khilaaf Nafs ki jihad hai aur Duniyavi Lazzato'n ko chhorna (Jihad) hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

🤲🏻

*وَ جَاهَدْتَ فِي اللّٰهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِ حَتّٰى اَتَاكَ الْيَقِيْنُ فَعَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ مِنِّيْ مَا بَقِيْتُ وَ بَقِيَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهَارُ وَ عَلٰى اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.*

(Ziyarat Imam Husain (as))

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *19th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *17th December 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*AULIYA - DILI DOST*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1369)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَمۡ حَسِبۡتُمۡ أَن تُتۡرَكُوا۟ وَلَمَّا یَعۡلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِینَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمۡ وَلَمۡ یَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَلِیجَةࣰۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِیرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ*

_"Aur kya tumne samajh liya hai ke tumhe yun hi chhod diya jayega halanke Allah ne abhi to ye bhi nahi dekha ke tum mein se Uski Raah mein Jihad karnewale kaun hain aur Mujahid kaun hain, jinhone Allah aur Uske Rasool aur Mo'meneen ke alawa kisi ko Jigri Dost nahi banaya. Allah ko tumhare tamam Aamaal ki poori khabar hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 16)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Raavi ne Imam Hasan Askari (as) se Lafz *وَلِیجَةࣰۚ* ke bare mein sawal kiya.

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Lafz *وَلِیجَةࣰۚ* se murad woh hai jo "Wali e Amr" ke qaem maqam ho. Isse murad woh Aimma hain jin ko Allah ne Ameen banaya hai aur unki Amaan qubool karta hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:

_"Jin Mo'meneen ko sahara aur takiyagah (support) banane ka Khuda ka Hukm diya gaya hai usse ham Aimma e Huda murad hain. Isiliye Mo'meneen ko chahiye ke woh iske alawa kisi aur ko sahara aur Dili Dost na banayen."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Naujwaano se farmaya:

_"Naujwaano! Allah se Daro aur Sardaro ke paas mat jao. Unhe chhod do yahan tak ke woh Pairokar banne par majboor ho jayen aur tum logon ko apne liye sahara mat banao. Khuda par bharosa rakho. Khuda ki Qasam mein tumhare liye un se kahin behtar hun."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Usman ki Khilafat ke daur mein Masjid e Nabavi Muhajerin o Ansar se khitab kiya:

_"Mein tumhe Allah Ta'ala ki Qasam de kar tum se poochhta hun ke kya tum jaante ho ke jab Ayah e Ita'at (4:59) aur Ayah e Wilayat (5:55) aur Ayat (9:16) nazil hui to Rasoole Khuda (saww) se logon ne daryaft kiya ke aam Mo'meneen ya Khas Mo'meneen ke liye hain? Allah Ta'ala ne apni Nabi (saww) ko Hukm diya ke Maslah Wali e Amr, Wilayat ko logon inform karen, AanHazrat (saww) ne Ghadeer mein apna Jaanashin muqarar kiya. Shaikhen ke sawal par Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne wazahat farmayi: "Ali (as), mera bhai, mera Wazir, mera Waaris, mera Wasi, meri Ummat mein mera Jaanashin aur mere baad har Momin ka Wali (Sarparast) hai. Uske baad mera beta Hasan (as), phir Husain (as) hai. Phir ek ke baad ek Nasl e Imam Husain (as) se 9 afraad honge. Quran unke saath hoga aur woh Quran ke saath honge aur Hauze Kausar par pahunchne se pahle na woh Quran se juda honge aur na Quran un se juda hoga."_

Sab Muhajerin aur Ansar ne sun kar taeed ki ke haan kaha tha.

(Kitab Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي اَتَوَالٰى اٰخِرَهُمْ كَمَا تَوَالَيْتُ اَوَّلَهُمْ وَ اَبْرَاُ مِنْ كُلِّ وَلِيْجَةٍ دُوْنَهُمْ وَ اَكْفُرُ بِالْجِبْتِ وَ الطَّاغُوْتِ وَ اللَّاتِ وَ الْعُزّٰى صَلَوَاتُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ يَا مَوَالِيَّ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّٰهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهُ....*

(Tuesday Dua - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *20th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *18th December 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦🕌 _*MASJID*_ 🕌♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1370)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ أَن یَعۡمُرُوا۟ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَـٰهِدِینَ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَـٰلُهُمۡ وَفِی ٱلنَّارِ هُمۡ خَـٰلِدُونَ * إِنَّمَا یَعۡمُرُ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمۡ یَخۡشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ فَعَسَىٰۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ أَن یَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِینَ.*

_"Ye kaam Mushrekin ka nahi hai ke woh Khuda ki Masajid ko abaad karen jabke woh khud apne upar Kufr ke Gawah hain. Unke tamam Aamaal zaye honge aur woh hamesha Jahannam mein rahenge."_

_"Allah ki Masjid ko to sirf woh abaad karte hain jo Allah aur Akherat par Imaan rakhen aur Namaz qayem karen aur Zakat ada karen aur Allah ke siwa kisi se na daren. Unhi se ye tawaqqo hai ke Seedhi Rah par chalenge."_

(Surah Taubah: 17 - 18)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

In Ayat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Masajid ki Abaadi aur Tameer o Marammat ki Mushrekin se nafi ki hai. Kaaba wa Masjidul Haram ka Tawaf pahle Mushrekin bhi karte the aur ise apne haath mein lena chahte the. Agar Masjid Kafir ke haath mein rahe to woh Mandir hoga na ke wahan Tauheed payi jayegi.

Iske baraks Masjid ko woh abaad kar sakte hain jo Khuda aur Akherat par Imaan rakhte hon aur sab se badi baat ye hai ke woh Namaz qayem karte hon kyonki Masajid ki abaadi aur Masajid ki raunaq ka daromadar Namaziyon par hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

*من بنى مسجدا و لو كمفحص قطاة بنى الله له بيتا فى الجنة*

_"Jo shakhs koi Masjid banaye agarche Parinde ke Ghonsle ke barabar ho to Khuda Jannat mein uske liye ek Ghar banayega."_

(Wasail Chap 8, Al Munar, Vol 10, 213)

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

*من اسرج فى مسجد سراجا لم تنزل الملائكة و حملة العرش يستغفرون له ما دام فى ذالك المسجد ضوئه.*

_"Jo shakhs Masjid mein chirag raushan kare jab tak us Chirog ki raushni rahegi, Farishte aur Hameleen e Arsh e Ilahi uske Isteghfar aur Duayen e Khair karte rahenge."_

(Kitab Kanzul Irfan, Vol 1, P-108, Kitab Mahasin, P-57)

🤲🏻

*يَا رَبَّ الْمَسْجِدِ الحَرَامِ،....*

(Joshan e Kabir No. 26)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *21st Rabius Sani 1441*

 *19th December 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*FAZAIL-E-ALI (as)*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1371)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَجَعَلۡتُمۡ سِقَایَةَ ٱلۡحَاۤجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ كَمَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ وَجَـٰهَدَ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۚ لَا یَسۡتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یَهۡدِی ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ.*

_"Kya tumne Hajiyon ko Paani pilane aur Masjidul Haram ki Abaadi ko us shakhs ke kaam ke barabar thehra liya hai jo Allah aur Akherat par Imaan rakhta hai aur Allah ki Raah mein Jihad karta hai, ye Allah ke nazdeek barabar nahi ho sakte aur Allah Zalim logon ko Hidayat nahi karta."_

(Surah Taubah: 19)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as), Abbas aur Shaiba ke mutalliq nazil hui. Abbas ne kaha ke mein afzal hun kyonki mein Hajiyon ko Paani pilane ki zimmedari ada karta hun. Shaiba ne kaha ke mein afzal hun kyonki mein Baitullah ka Hajib (Darban) hun aur mein Ka'aba ka Kalid bardar (Key Keeper) hun. Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya ke mein afzal hun kyonki meine tum dono se pahle Islam qubool kiya (zahiri), meine Hijrat ki hai aur Jihad kiya."_

_"Phir Teeno buzurg Faisle ke liye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein hazir hue aur Teeno ne apna moqif bayan kiya. Tab ye Ayat nazil hui."_

_"Ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as) ki shaan mein nazil hui."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Hakim Abul Qasim Al Haskani, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) se farmaya:

_"Abdul Muttalib ne Zamana Jahiliyyat mein 5 Sunnaten qayem ki thi jinhe Khuda ne Islam mein jaari rakha. Unhone ne Chahe Zamzam (Zamzam Well) ki phir se khudayi ki thi aur uska naam "Siqayatul Haajj - *سقاية الحاج*" rakha tha. Allah ko ye naam pasand aaya aur Quran mein yehi naam barqarar rakha."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Umar ke Shura mein bhi yehi Ayat pesh karke sawal kiya tha ke ye Ayat meri Fazilat mein hai ya kisi aur ke?

(Majmaul Bayan)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Khuda Wande Mut'aal ne mere bhai Ali ibne Abu Talib (as) ke beshumaar fazaail bayaan kiye hain. Jo bhi unke Fazaail mein se ek Fazilat ko Zikr kare aur uska iqraar kare to Khuda Wanda uske pehle aur aainda waale gunah maaf kar dega chaahe jitne bhi bhaari gunah kyun na ho'n. Aur jo bhi unke fazaail mein se kisi ek fazilat ko likhega, jab tak uska likha huwa baaqi rahega Malaaika uske liye Maghferat talab karte rahenge. Aur jo unki kisi ek fazilat ko sunega, Khuda Wanda uske kaano'n se kiye huwe gunah maaf kar dega. Aur jo bhi unke likhe huwe fazaail par nigaah karega to Khuda Wanda uske tamaam gunah jo usne Aa'nkho'n se anjaam diye hain Ma'af karega…"_

(Maula Ali Ki Shaan Mein 1000 Ahadees, p51)

🤲🏻

*وَ لَمَّا اسْتَسْقٰى فَسُقِيَ اللَّبَنُ كَبَّرَ وَ قَالَ قَالَ لِيْ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ صَلَّى اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهِ اٰخِرُ شَرَابِكَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا ضَيَاحٌ مِنْ لَبَنٍ،..*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
