**********************************

         *22nd Rabius Sani 1441*

   *20th December 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*FAZAIL-E-ALI (as)*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1372)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَاۤىِٕزُونَ *  یُبَشِّرُهُمۡ رَبُّهُم بِرَحۡمَةࣲ مِّنۡهُ وَرِضۡوَ ٰ⁠نࣲ وَجَنَّـٰتࣲ لَّهُمۡ فِیهَا نَعِیمࣱ مُّقِیمٌ *  خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥۤ أَجۡرٌ عَظِیمࣱ*

_"Jo log Imaan laye aur Hijrat ki aur apne Maal o Jaan se Allah ki Raah mein Jihad kiya woh Allah ke nazdeek buland tareen darja ke malik hain aur wohi log hi kamyab hain. Unka Rab unhe apni Rehmat aur Razaye Kaseer aur un Baghaat ki basharat deta hai jahan unke liye dayemi Ne'maten hongi. Woh un mein hamesha rahenge. Yaqeenan Allah ke haan Ajre Azeem hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 20 - 22)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Ayaat bhi guzishta Ayaat se marboot hain jo Hazrat Ali (as) ke Fazail mein nazil huin jiska zikr ham kar chuke hain. Ye rivayat phir se repeat kar rahe hain:

👉🏻

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as), Abbas aur Shaiba ke mutalliq nazil hui. Abbas ne kaha ke mein afzal hun kyonki mein Hajiyon ko Paani pilane ki zimmedari ada karta hun. Shaiba ne kaha ke mein afzal hun kyonki mein Baitullah ka Hajib (Darban) hun aur mein Ka'aba ka Kalid bardar (Key Keeper) hun. Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya ke mein afzal hun kyonki meine tum dono se pahle Islam qubool kiya (zahiri), meine Hijrat ki hai aur Jihad kiya."_

_"Phir Teeno buzurg Faisle ke liye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein hazir hue aur Teeno ne apna moqif bayan kiya. Tab ye Ayat nazil hui."_

_"Ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as) ki shaan mein nazil hui."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Tamaam Nek kaam hatta raah e Khuda mein Jihad karna, Amr bil Ma'aroof aur Nahi Anil Munkar ke muqaable mein aise hi hai jaisa ek wasee (vast) samandar ke saamne ek qatrah ho."_

(Aasmani Nasihatein, v1, p79)

🤲🏻

*و اغْضُضْ اَبْصَارَنَا عَنِ الْفُجُوْرِ وَ الْخِيَانَةِ وَ اسْدُدْ اَسْمَاعَنَا عَنِ اللَّغْوِ وَ الْغِيْبَةِ وَ تَفَضَّلْ عَلٰى عُلَمَاۤئِنَا بِالزُّهْدِ وَ النَّصِيْحَةِ وَ عَلَى الْمُتَعَلِّمِيْنَ بِالْجُهْدِ وَ الرَّغْبَةِ وَ عَلَى الْمُسْتَمِعِيْنَ بِالْاِتِّبَاعِ وَ الْمَوْعِظَةِ.*

(Dua e Imam Mahdi (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *23rd Rabiul Awwal 1441*

   *21st December 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HUBBE ALI (as)*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1373)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوۤا۟ ءَابَاۤءَكُمۡ وَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نَكُمۡ أَوۡلِیَاۤءَ إِنِ ٱسۡتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ عَلَى ٱلۡإِیمَـٰنِۚ وَمَن یَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمۡ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ *  قُلۡ إِن كَانَ ءَابَاۤؤُكُمۡ وَأَبۡنَاۤؤُكُمۡ وَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُكُمۡ وَأَزۡوَ ٰ⁠جُكُمۡ وَعَشِیرَتُكُمۡ وَأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لٌ ٱقۡتَرَفۡتُمُوهَا وَتِجَـٰرَةࣱ تَخۡشَوۡنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنُ تَرۡضَوۡنَهَاۤ أَحَبَّ إِلَیۡكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادࣲ فِی سَبِیلِهِۦ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ یَأۡتِیَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یَهۡدِی ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقِینَ*

_"Aye Ahle Imaan! Khabardar apne Baap, Dada aur Bhaiyon ko apna dost na banao. Agar woh imaan ke muqabile mein Kufr ko tarjeeh den, tum mein se jo bhi unhe Dost banayenge wohi Zalim honge. Aap keh den ke agar tumhare Baap, Dada, Aulad, Baradaran, Biwiyan, tumhare Qabile aur tumhare wo Maal jo tum ne khaaye hain aur tumhare wo Karobar jin ke maand pad jane ka tum ko khauf hai aur tumhare wo Ghar jo tumhen pasand hain, tum ko Allah aur us ke Rasool aur uski Raah mein Jihad se zyada aziz hain to intezar karo yahan tak ke Allah apna Faisla le aye aur Allah Fasiqeen ki Rehnumai nahin kiya karta."_

(Surah Taubah: 23 - 24)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Is Ayat ka ek Batin bhi hai aur woh ye hai ke Hazrat Ali (as) ke Siyaasi Mukhalefin ki Wilayat Kufr hai aur Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ki Wilayat Imaan hai. Maqsad ye hai ke agar tumhare Baap, Dada aur Bhai Ali (as) ki Wilayat par kisi ki Wilayat ko tajeeh (preference) den to tum un se Qata Talluq kar lo aur jo unse Qata Talluq na karega to woh Zalim qarar payega."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Jab ye Ayat nazil hui: _"Aur us Fitne se bacho jo sirf Zalimon tak hi mehdood nahi rahega."_(8:25) to Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:. _"Meri Shahadat ke baad jisne Hazrat Ali (as) ko meri us Sanad se mehroom rakha to goya usne meri Nabuwwat aur mujh se pahle Anbiya ki Nabuwwat ka inkar kiya aur jo Zalim se muhabbat rakhe woh bhi Zalim hai. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (9:23)"_

(Eteqaad e Imamia by Shaikh Sadooq, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Ham (Musalman) Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke saath ho kar apne Baap, Beton, Bhaiyyon aur Chachaon ko qatl karte hain. Isse hamara Imaan badhta tha. Ita'at aur Raahe Haq ki Pairavi mein izaafa hota tha aur karb o alam ki sozishon par Sabr mein zyadti hoti thi aur Dushmanon se Jihad karne ki koshish badhti thin. (Jihad ki surat ye thi ke) ham mein ek shakhs aur Fauj e Dushman ka koi Sipahi dono Mardon ki tarah aapas mein bhidte the aur Jaan lene ke liye ek doosre par jhapatte the ke kaun apne hareef ko Maut ka Pyala pilata hai. Kabhi hamari Jeet hoti thi aur kabhi Dushman ki. Chunanche jab Khuda Wande Alam ne hamari Niyyaton ki sachchayi dekh li to Usne hamare Dushmanon ko zaleel o ruswa kiya aur hamari Nusrat o Taeed farmayi. Yahan tak ke Islam Seena tek kar apni jagah par jam gaya aur apni Manzil par barqarar ho gaya. Khuda ki Qasam! Agar ham bhi tumhari tarah karte to Deen ka na to sutoon gadta aur na Imaan ka Tana barg o bar lata. Khuda ki Qasam! Tum apne kiye ke badle mein Doodh ke bajaye Khoon dhouge aur akhir tumhe nidamat o sharmindgi uthana padegi."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اُشْهِدُ اللّٰهَ وَ رُسُلَهُ وَ مَلَاۤئِكَتَهُ اَنِّي رَاضٍ عَمَّنْ رَضِيْتِ عَنْهُ سَاخِطٌ عَلٰى مَنْ سَخِطْتِ عَلَيْهِ مُتَبَرِّئٌ مِمَّنْ تَبَرَّأْتِ مِنْهُ مُوَالٍ لِمَنْ وَالَيْتِ مُعَادٍ لِمَنْ عَادَيْتِ مُبْغِضٌ لِمَنْ اَبْغَضْتِ مُحِبٌّ لِمَنْ اَحْبَبْتِ وَ كَفٰى بِاللّٰهِ شَهِيْدًا....*

(Ziyarat Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *24th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *22nd December 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MAAL E KASEER*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1374)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِی مَوَاطِنَ كَثِیرَةࣲ وَیَوۡمَ حُنَیۡنٍ إِذۡ أَعۡجَبَتۡكُمۡ كَثۡرَتُكُمۡ فَلَمۡ تُغۡنِ عَنكُمۡ شَیۡـࣰٔا وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَیۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ ثُمَّ وَلَّیۡتُم مُّدۡبِرِینَ*

_"Beshak Allah ne Kaseer Jaghon par tumhari Madad ki hai aur Hunain ke Roz bhi tumhari Madad ki hai jab tumhe apni Kasrat par naaz tha lekin usne tumhe koi fayda nahi pahunchaya aur Zameen apni wus'at ke bawajood tum par tang ho gayi. Iske baad tum Peeth pher kar bhag nikle."_

(Surah Taubah: 25)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ek bar Mutawakkil Abbasi sakht bimar hua. Usne shifayabi ke liye Mannat maani ke agar sehetyab hua to *"Maal e Kaseer"* Raahe Khuda mein dega. Khuda ne Meherbani ki aur woh theek ho gaya. Phir usne apne doston se poochha ke Nazr kaise poori karun. Uske saathiyon ne bataya aapko 5 se 8 Lakh Dirham tak Raqam Rahe Khuda mein kharch karni chahiye. Mutawakkil ne kaha ye to bahut zyada hai!! Uske ek Darbari ne suggest kiye ke ye Maslah Imam Ali Naqi (as) se Khat ke zariye poochh lo. To usne aisa hi kiya.

Imam (as) ne Jawab mein likha:

_"Tum apne Rizq e Halaal se 80 Dirham Rahe Khuda mein kharch karo tumhari Nazr ada ho jayegi."_

Mutawakkil ko ye Raqam bahut kam lagi aur sawal kiya ke is Raqam ki figure ka kiya saboot hai.

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat (9:25) mein "Kaseer" Maqamat par tumhari Madad ki hai aur jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Zindagi mein un Maqamat ko shumar kiya jaye jahan Khuda ne Madad ki hai to unki tadaad 80 banti hai. Isse maloom hota hai ke 80 par Lafz "Kaseer" ka itlaaq sahih hai aur Qur'an ki Lughat ke ain mutabiq hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Al Kaafi, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd: Hunain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jo shakhs mayassar hone ki haalat mein sakhawat ke liye apna haath phaila dega to jo kuchh wo kharch karega, Allah uske ewaz duniya mein hi de dega aur Akherat mein kayi guna Sawaab dega."_

(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p41)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اخْلُفْ عَلَيَّ نَفَقَتِيْ وَ انْفَعْنِيْ بِمَا رَزَقْتَنِيْ فِيْ دُنْيَايَ وَ اٰخِرَتِيْ لِيْ وَ لِاِخْوَانِيْ وَ اَبَوَيَّ وَ جَمِيْعِ عِتْرَتِيۤ...*

(Dua Hazrat Mahdi (atfs) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *25th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *23rd December 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*JANG E HUNAIN*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1375)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِی مَوَاطِنَ كَثِیرَةࣲ وَیَوۡمَ حُنَیۡنٍ إِذۡ أَعۡجَبَتۡكُمۡ كَثۡرَتُكُمۡ فَلَمۡ تُغۡنِ عَنكُمۡ شَیۡـࣰٔا وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَیۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ ثُمَّ وَلَّیۡتُم مُّدۡبِرِینَ*

*ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِینَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودࣰا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ۚ وَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ جَزَاۤءُ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ *  ثُمَّ یَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن یَشَاۤءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ*

_"Beshak Allah ne Kaseer Jaghon par tumhari Madad ki hai aur Hunain ke Roz bhi tumhari Madad ki hai jab tumhe apni Kasrat par naaz tha lekin usne tumhe koi fayda nahi pahunchaya aur Zameen apni wus'at ke bawajood tum par tang ho gayi. Iske baad tum Peeth pher kar bhag nikle."_

_"Phir Allah ne apne Rasool aur Sahebane Imaan par Taskeen nazil farmayi aur woh Lashkar bheje jinhe tumne nahi dekha aur Kafiron par Azaab nazil kiya aur yehi Kafiron ki Jaza hai. Phir Allah jisko chahta hai Tauba karne ki Taufeeq de deta hai aur Allah bahut Bakhshne wala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 25 - 27)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Taif ke raaste mein ek Waadi hai jiska naam Hunain hai aur Autaas bhi kahte hain aur Makkah se 3 Din ki Masafat ki doori par hai.

Fateh Makkah ke baad Hauzan aur Saqif ke Qabile ne Qabile Bani Nazr ke ek Chief ke saath hamla kiya. Aur poori family ke saath aaye. Yahan tak ke un mein most experienced 100 Saala Zaeef Dareed bin Samah bhi shamil hua aur mara bhi gaya. Ye log Teerandazi mein mahir the. Mushrekin ki tadaad 30 Hazaar thi, jabke Musalman 12000 hi thi. Jaise hi unhone hamla kiya to musalman bhagne lage.

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ko apna Alamdar banaya aur unhone apne Shuja'at ke karname yahan dekhaye. Al mukhtasar is Jang mein Mushrekin ko Shikast (defeat) hui. Kaafi Maal e Ghanimat hasil hua. Ye Jang Saturday, 6th Shawwal 8 AH mein hui.

(Tafseer Al Qummi, Kitabus Seerah wal Maghazi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali Reza (as):

_"Sakina" Jannat ki ek Hawa hai jiska Insaan ki tarah se Chehra hai. Iski Khushboo Kasturi se bhi zyada bhali hai aur yehi wo "Sakina" hai jise Allah ne Jange Hunain mein apne Paighambar par nazil kiya tha jiski wajah se Mushrekin ko shikast hui thi."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*قَدْ وَتَرَ فِیْهِ صَنَادِیْدَ الْعَرَبِ وَ قَتَلَ اَبْطَالَھُمْ وَ نَاوَشَ ذُؤْبَانَھُمْ فَاَوْدَعَ قُلُوْبَھُمْ اَحْقَادًا بَدْرِیَّۃً وَّ خَیْبَرِیَّۃً وَّ حُنَیْنِیَّۃً وَ غَیْرَ ھُنَّ فَاَضَبَّتْ عَلٰی عَدَاوَتِهٖ وَ اَكَبَّتْ عَلٰی مُنَابَذَتِهٖ حَتّٰی قَتَلَ النَّاكِثِیْنَ وَ الْقَاسِطِیْنَ وَ الْمَارِقِیْنَ وَ لَمَّا قَضٰی نَحْبَهٗ وَ قَتَلَهٗ اَشْقَی الْاٰخِرِیْنَ یَتْبَعُ اَشْقَی الْاَوَّلِیْنَ لَمْ یُمْتَثَلْ اَمْرُ رَسُوْلِ اﷲِ صَلَّی اﷲُ عَلَیْهِ*

(Dua-e-Nudba)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *26th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *24th December 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

               ♦ _*NIJASAT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1376)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُشۡرِكُونَ نَجَسࣱ فَلَا یَقۡرَبُوا۟ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ بَعۡدَ عَامِهِمۡ هَـٰذَاۚ وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ عَیۡلَةࣰ فَسَوۡفَ یُغۡنِیكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۤ إِن شَاۤءَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ*

_"Aye Imaan walo! *Mushrekin to mehez NAJIS (Napaak) hain* lehaza is Saal ke baad woh Masjidul Haram ke qareeb na phatakne payen aur agar tumhe Tangdasti ka khauf hai to Anqareeb Allah tumhe apne Fazl se Maala Maal kar dega. Yaqeenan Allah Sahib e Ilm aur Sahib e Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 28)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Hazrat Ali (as) ne 9 AH ko Ayat Bara'at jo Mushrekin ke Darmiyan 4 Ahkam ke saath Marasim e Hajj mein pahunchayi thi un mein se ek ye tha ke ainda Saal se koi Mushrik Masjidul Haram mein dakhil nahi ho sakta na Tawaf kar sakta hai kyonki woh Najis hai.

👉🏻

*Najis ke Maani:*

Literally aisi Takleef aur Dard ke jiska Ilaaj der mein ho Arab mein usko Najis kahte hain. Past aur Shareer, Budhape aur Badan ki Kanghi, Farsoodgi ko bhi Najis kahte hain.

👉🏻

_"Nijasat means har Qism ki Napaaki, Hissi aur Baatini."_

(Raghib Mafradat)

👉🏻

_"Har wo cheez ke jisse Insaan ki Tabiyat mutanaffir (Nafrat) ho use Najis kahte hain."_

(Majmaul Bayan - Tabarsi)

🕍

Pas Mushrekin (India mein Hindu) ko Najis isliye kaha gaya kyonki unka Jism Paleed hai jaise Khoon, Paishab. Sharab Najis hai. But Parasti ke Aqeede ki wajah se Batini Paleedgi hai. Isliye unko Masjid se door rakha gaya. Najis Khaana Haram qarar diya gaya hai kyonki woh Paaki ya Pakeezgi ka khayal nahi rakhte.

Sirf Saaf suthra hona ye hygienic hona Paakiza nahi maana jata jaisa ke aam log tasawwur karte hain. Nijaasat ke Ahkam amal karne par Insaan Pak mana jayega. Ek Najis Insaan kafi der tak ghas ghas kar nahata rahe lekin Ghusl nahi kare phir bhi woh Najis hi maana jayega. Khaana ya Paani bhale hi ek saaf suthra Kafir ke gile haath se le phir woh Khaana Najis maana jayega.

(Ahkam e Nijasat detail mein refer karen.)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 💦

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Zyada-tar Azaab e Qabr Peshaab ki wajah se hoga"_ (yaani Najaasat ka khayaal na rakhne ki wajah se hoga).

(Iqaabul Aamaal, p491)

🍷

Imam Sadiq (as)

ne Khabees (na-paak, najis) cheez se ilaaj karne manaa farmaya hai.

(Tibb ul Aimma (as), p14)

🤲🏻

*اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ كُنْتَ نُوْرًا فِي الْاَصْلَابِ الشَّامِخَةِ وَ الْاَرْحَامِ الْمُطَهَّرَةِ لَمْ تُنَجِّسْكَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةُ بِاَنْجَاسِهَا وَ لَمْ تُلْبِسْكَ مِنْ مُدْلَهِمَّاتِ ثِيَابِهَا....*

_"Mein Gawahi deta hun ke Aap Buzurg Aslaab aur Pakeeza Arhaam mein Noor the, Jahiliyyat ki Nijasat (Napaaki) Aapko chhu nahi sakin aur na usks Napaak Daman Aap par saya dal saka."_

(Ziyarat e Waaresa - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *27th Rabius Sani 1441*

  *25th December 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*CHRISTIANITY*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1377)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَیَّ یَوۡمَ وُلِدتُّ وَیَوۡمَ أَمُوتُ وَیَوۡمَ أُبۡعَثُ حَیࣰّا *  ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ عِیسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡیَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِی فِیهِ یَمۡتَرُونَ*

(Surah Maryam: 33 - 34)

*ٱتَّخَذُوۤا۟ أَحۡبَارَهُمۡ وَرُهۡبَـٰنَهُمۡ أَرۡبَابࣰا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَسِیحَ ٱبۡنَ مَرۡیَمَ وَمَاۤ أُمِرُوۤا۟ إِلَّا لِیَعۡبُدُوۤا۟ إِلَـٰهࣰا وَ ٰ⁠حِدࣰاۖ لَّاۤ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ سُبۡحَـٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا یُشۡرِكُونَ*

_"Unhone apne Ulama aur Darweshon ko Allah ke siwa apna Rab bana liya hai aur isi tarah se Maseeh Ibne Maryam ko bhi. Halanke unhe sirf ek Ma'bood ki Bandagi ke siwa aur kisi ki Bandagi ka Hukm nahi diya gaya. Uske alawa koi Ma'bood nahi. Woh unke Mushrekana Khayalaat se Paak o Pakeeza hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 31)

📚📖 ⛪

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as) is Ayat ke zel mein farmate hain:

_"Esa Maseeh (as) ki unhone (Christian) ne Nafarmani ki thi aur unhone apne Dil o Dimagh mein Maseeh (Jesus Christ) ki itni Ta'zeem ki ke woh use Ma'bood aur Ibnullah (Son of God) samajhne lage. Ek Giroh ne kaha ke Woh Teen mein Ek hai (Trinity). Ek aur Giroh ne kaha ke Jesus khud Allah hai. Aur jahan tak Ulama ka talluq hai to Ahle Kutub Ahbar o Ruhban (Monks and Rabbis, Father, Priest) ki ita'at karte the aur unke Ahkam ki Pairavi karte the aur jo kuchh unhone kaha tha logon ne unke aqwal ko Deen ka darja de diya tha aur yun logon ne Allah ke Farman, Kutub e Ilahi aur Anbiya ko chhod diya tha aur Ulama aur Ahbar ki pairavi ki thi. Allah Ta'ala ne is pairavi ko Arbab min Doonillah se tabeer kiya hai. Allah Ta'ala ne unke is tarz e Amal ka hamari Kitab mein isliye Zikr kiya hai taake ham Nasihat hasil karen. Allah Ta'ala ne Bani Israel ko sharam dilate hue is Ayat mein farmaya (9:31)."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⛪

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ki Qasam! Ahle Kitab ne Ulama o Rohbaan ke liye na to Roze rakhe the aur na unke liye Namaz padhi thi. Ulama o Rohban ne unke liye Halal ko Haram aur Haram ko Halal qarar diya tha aur unhone is mein Ulama o Rohban ki pairavi ki thi."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal hua ke Yahudiyo'n aur Nasraniyo'n (Christians) ko Dua kaise den?

Imam (as) ne farmaya,

_"Ye kaho 'Barakallahu Lakaa Fi Duniyaka'"_

(Allah Ta'ala tujhe teri duniya mein Barkat de)."

(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p312)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى عِيسٰى رُوْحِ اللّٰهِ*

(Ziyarat Ameerul Mo'meneen - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *28th Rabius Sani 1441*

*26th December 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

             ♦ _*JIZIYA TAX*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1378)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِینَ لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ وَلَا یُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا یَدِینُونَ دِینَ ٱلۡحَقِّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ حَتَّىٰ یُعۡطُوا۟ ٱلۡجِزۡیَةَ عَن یَدࣲ وَهُمۡ صَـٰغِرُونَ.*

_"Un Ahle Kitab se Jang karo jo Allah aur Roze Akherat par Imaan nahi rakhte aur jis cheez ko Khuda aur Uske Rasool ne Haraam kiya hai woh use Haraam nahi samajhte aur Deen e Haq ko apna Deen nahi banate. (Unse lado) yahan tak ke woh apne Haath se zillat ke saath tumhe *Jiziya* pesh karne par amada ho jayen."_

(Surah Taubah: 29)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jiziya woh makhsoos Raqam hai jo Islami Sultanate apni Non-Muslim ri'aaya (Parja - Subject) se wusool karti hai aur iske ewaz unke Jaan o Maal ki Hifazat karti hai. Non-Muslim se Zakat aur doosre Islamic Tax wusool nahi kiye jaate. Jizya Ahle Kitab aur Majoosiyon se bhi liya jata hai.

🏫

Imam Sadiq (as) se Majoosiyon ke bare poochha to bataya:

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Majoosiyon ka ek Nabi tha lekin unhone use qatl kar diya tha aur unke paas Kitab bhi thi jise unhone jala dala tha. Unke Nabi ne unke saamne Khuda ki Kitab pesh ki thi jo ke 12 Hazar Khalon par tehreer thi."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

💰

In short Riwayat mein hai ke Auraton par Jizya nahi hai Kyonki Darul Harb, Darul Islam mein Aurton ka qatl karna Haraam hai. Balke Apahahij (Handicapped), Andhe, Budhe aur Bachchon, Pagal ko bhi Jizya se chhot hai. Jizya ki Raqam Hukmaran par hai jo woh tai kare.

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs hum Ahlebait (as) se bugz rakhega, Allah Ta'ala usko Yahoodi bana kar mab'oos karega."_

Arz kiya gaya, _"Ya Rasulallah (saww no)! Agarche wo Kalma e Shahadatain (La Ilaha Illallah, Muhammadur Rasulallah) padhta ho?"_

Aap (saww) ne farmaya: _"Haa'n. Wo Kalma e Shahdatain padhne se to qatl hone aur Jiziya dene se bach jayega."_

Phir farmaya:

_"Jo shakhs hum Ahlebait (as) se Bugz rakhega, usko Allah Ta'ala Yahudiyo'n ki saf mein mab'oos karega."_

Arz kiya, _"Ya Rasulallah (saww)! Ye kyun?"_ 

Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Isliye ke agar wo Dajjal ke daur ko paaye to uspar Imaan le aayega."_

(Bihaarul Anwaar, v12, p80)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ عَذِّبْ كَفَرَةَ اَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ الَّذِيْنَ يَصُدُّوْنَ عَنْ سَبِيْلِكَ وَ يَجْحَدُوْنَ اٰيَاتِكَ وَ يُكَذِّبُوْنَ رُسُلَكَ...*

(2nd Khutba Eidul Fitr Ali (as) - Man La Yahzarahul Faqih)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *29th Rabius Sani 1441*

   *27th December 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*HAZRAT UZAIR (as)*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1379)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡیَهُودُ عُزَیۡرٌ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَـٰرَى ٱلۡمَسِیحُ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِۖ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ قَوۡلُهُم بِأَفۡوَ ٰ⁠هِهِمۡۖ یُضَـٰهِـُٔونَ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبۡلُۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ أَنَّىٰ یُؤۡفَكُونَ*

_"Yahoodiyon (Jews) ne kaha ke Uzair Allah ka Beta hai aur Esai (Christian) kahte hain ke Maseeh Allah ka Farzand hai. Ye Sab be-Haqeeqat baten hain jo woh apne Munh se nikal rahe hain. In baton mein ye unki misl hain jo unse pahle Kuffar kaha karte the. Un par Khuda ki Maar pade, ye kahan bahke chale jaa rahe hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 30)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Hazrat Uzair (as) woh Paighambar hain jinko Allah ne 100 Saal sula kar uthaya.

👉🏻

*Shaane Nuzool:*

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke paas 5 Mazahib yani Jews, Christians, Daherya, Majoosi aur Arab ke Mushrekin ke Numainde jama hue. Aur jaisa ke Ayat mein hai unhone apne Aqeede bayan kiye aur bahesen ki.

Yahoodiyon ne kaha ke Uzair isliye Khuda ke Beten hain kyonki unhone Torah ko uske khatm hone ke baad zinda kiya. Aap (saww) ne farmaya "to phir Musa (as) ke bare mein kya kahoge, woh to Sahib e Taurat hain. Ab agar tum maani o mafhoom mein Son of God kahte ho to tumne Khaliq mein Makhlooq ki Sifat ko tasleem kiya, is surat mein Allah Haadis qarar payega aur Haadis (Created) apne wujood ke liye kisi aur Khaliq (Creator) ka muhtaj hoga." Unhone kaha ke ham unhe ezaazi Beta (Ehteraman) maante hain, jaise koi bada aadmi ek ghair chhote ladke se kahta hai 'beta kaise ho'.

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

"Tumhari is misaal se to aur qabahaten janam lengi. Kabhi Admi kisi ghair ko pyar se Beta kahta hai aur Insaan apne Buzurg ko Chacha ya Abba kah kar mukhatib karta hai aur ye dastoor hota chala aya hai aur chalta rahega. Ab jabke Taurat ka Hafiz Farzande Khuda kahlata ho to Sahibe Taurat ko to nauzobillah Khuda ka Chacha, Maamu ya Buzurg kahna chahiye aur jab tum Sahibe Taurat ko in Alfaaz se yaad nahi karte to apne upar rahem karo aur Uzair (as) ko Khuda ka Farzand na kaho."

(Ehtejaaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Uzair (as) ko Wahy farmayi ke, _"Jab koi chhota sa Gunah karo to Gunah ke chhote-pan ko na dekho balke ye dekho ke Nafarmaani kiski hoti hai. Jab tumhen chhoti se Bhalaayi naseeb ho to us Bhalaayi ke chhote-pan ko na dekho balke ye dekho ke kis Kareem ne ye Bhalaayi ata ki hai. Jab tumhen koi takleef aaye to Meri Makhlooq se uska zikr na karo jaise Main apne Bandon ke Gunaho'n ka tazkera Apne Malaika se nahi karta."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p128)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى عُزَيْرٍ الَّذِيْ اَحْيَاهُ اللهُ بَعْدَ مَيْتَتِهٖ،...*

(Ziyarat Nahiya)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *1st Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

  *28th December 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*HAZRAT ESA BIN MARYAM (as)*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1380)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡیَهُودُ عُزَیۡرٌ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَـٰرَى ٱلۡمَسِیحُ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِۖ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ قَوۡلُهُم بِأَفۡوَ ٰ⁠هِهِمۡۖ یُضَـٰهِـُٔونَ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبۡلُۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ أَنَّىٰ یُؤۡفَكُونَ*

_"Yahoodiyon (Jews) ne kaha ke Uzair Allah ka Beta hai aur Esai (Christian) kahte hain ke Maseeh Allah ka Farzand hai. Ye Sab be-Haqeeqat baten hain jo woh apne Munh se nikal rahe hain. In baton mein ye unki misl hain jo unse pahle Kuffar kaha karte the. Un par Khuda ki Maar pade, ye kahan bahke chale jaa rahe hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 30)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd...)

Rasoole Khuda (saww) Jews ko jawab dene ke baad Christians se mukhatib hue:

_"Tumhara dawa hai ke Allah jo ke "Qadeem (Everlasting)" hai, Usne ek "Haadis (Created)" se ittehad (unity) kar liya hai. Is dawe se tumhari kya murad hai? Kya isse ye murad hai ke jab Qadeem ne Haadis se ittehad kiya to Woh Qadeem Apni Sifat e Qadamat se dastbardar hokar Haadis ban gaya ya basurat deegar Us Ittehad ki wajah se Qadeem ho gaya? Ya tumhare kahne ka matlab ye hai ke Allah ne use khusoosi Karamaat se sarfraz karte hue Apna Beta bana liya? Agar tum samajhte ho ke Qadeem Haadis ban gaya (Creator became Created) to ye mahaal (impossible) hai, isi tarah se Haadis ka Qadeem ban jana mahaal hai."_

Phir unhone bhi yehi kaha ke real mein nahi mazaji taur par kahte hain, to iska jawab wohi jo Yahoodiyon ko pahle de chuke hain.

Phir unhone kaha jaise Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ko Khaleelullah kahte hain waise hi Hazrat Esa (as) ko Ibnullah.

Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Tumne ghalat samjha. Ye sach hai Hazrat Ibrahim (as) Khaleelullah hain._

_1. Khullat yani Faqr o Faqa. Hazrat Ibrahim (as) sirf Allah se madad talab karte the. Yahan tak ke Jibrael (as) ki bhi madad nahi li jab Namrood ne unhe Aag mein dala. Makhlooq ki Beniyazi ki wajah se "Khaleelullah" kahlaye._

_2. Khaleel hone ki doosri wajah ye thi ke Hazrat Ibrahim (as) aise Asraar o Ma’arif (Secrets & Recognition) se aagah the jin se aur log waaqif nahi the._

_Hazrat Ibrahim (as) mein Khullat ke dono maani paye jaate hain lekin Khaleelullah aur Ibnullah mein kafi farq hai. Agar koi shakhs Raazon se waqif ho to Khaleel kahlayega, agar wohi shakhs gharz o ghayat doosron se karne lage aur Asraar o Ma'arif faramosh kar de to Lafz "Khaleel" salb ho jayega. Yani ye temporary Sifat hai jo lag bhi sakti hai aur juda bhi ho sakti hai. Jabke Farzand hona ye ek atoot Rishta hai. Beta apne Walid ka kitna hi nafarman kyon na ho khwah Walid ghar se nikal bhi de tab bhi woh uska beta hi kahlaya jayega._

_Agar Hazrat Esa (as) ke Mo'jezat ki wajah se kahte ho to Hazrat Musa (as) bhi Mo'jezat mein kam nahi the. To phir unko bhi Khuda ka Beta kaho!"_

Unhone kaha ke ye Aasmaani Kitabon mein kikha hai.

Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Ye Daleel khud tumhare Nazarye ko Baatil karne wali hai kyonki Hazrat Esa (as) ne tamam hazerin se kaha tha to ab tumhara kya khayal hai ke woh tamam hazerin bhi Khuda ke Farzand the? Aur agar bilfarz un sab ko farzand maan liya jaye to phir sawal uthega ke Maseeh to Allah ke khaas Bande the, Allah ne unhe apna farzand bana liya lekin us mehfil mein bhi Sahib e Mo'jezat afraad the jinhe khitab karke farmaya: "Mein apne aur tumhare Baap ke paas jaa raha hun?"_

_Asl baat ye hai ke tumne Maseeh ke qaul ka matlab nahi samjha. Is Jumle ka matlab ye ho sakta hai ke "Ab mein tumse juda ho raha hun, ab mein apne aur tumhare Baap Adam (as) wa Nooh (as) ki taraf jaa raha hun."_

AanHazrat (saww) ka ye jawab sun kar Christians khamosh ho gaye.

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Jab Yahoodiyon ne Uzair (as) ko Allah ka Beta kaha to un par Khuda ko bahut Ghussa aaya aur jab Nasaara (Christians) ne Maseeh bin Maryam ko Allah ka Beta kaha to un par Allah ka sakht Azaab nazil hua aur Allah ka us par sakht Azaab nazil hoga jo mera Khoon bahayega aur mujhe meri Itrat ke mutalliq aziyyat dega."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى عِيْسٰى رُوْحِ اللهِ وَ كَلِمَتِهٖ،...*

(Ziyarat e Nahiya)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *2nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

  *29th December 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*NOOR E ILAHI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1381)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یُرِیدُونَ أَن یُطۡفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَ ٰ⁠هِهِمۡ وَیَأۡبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّاۤ أَن یُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ*

_"Woh chahte hain ke *Allah ke Noor* ko apne Munh ke phoonkon se bujha den halanke Allah Apne Noor ko mukammal kiye baghair mannewala nahi, chahe Kafiron ko ye kitna hi nagawar guzre."_

(Surah Taubah: 32)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Ayaat Yahood o Naasara ke Zikr mein jaari hai.

Ye Ayat shaane Nuzool ke eitbar se Yahood o Nasaara ke liye nazil hui lekin is mein ek wasee Paigham bhi hai. Ye Ayat Quran mein do bar aayi hai, iska matlab ye hai ke Paigham Ahmiyyat ka haamil hai. Ye Ayat Aane waale Ahm Inquilab ki taraf ishaara karti hai aur woh hai Zahoor e Mahdi (atfs). Jab Aap (atfs) Zahoor karenge to Hazrat Esa (as) unka istiqbal karenge aur unke peechhe Namaz ada karenge.

Imam Baqar (as) is Ayat ke zel mein farmate hain:

_"Is Ayat mein jo Waada kiya gaya hai Mahdi e Aale Mohd (as) ke Zahoor ke waqt surat pazeer hoga. Us Din Rue Zameen mein koi nahi hoga magar ye ke woh Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ki Haqqaniyyat ka iqrar karega."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Namoona)

🚩

Paighambar e Islam (saww):

_"Duniya mein koi bhi Ghar jo Patthar aur Mitti ka, Chadar aur Kheme ka aur Oon aur Badalon se bana ho baqi nahi rahega magar ye ke Khuda Naam e Islam is mein dakhil kar dega."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer e Namoona)

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ki Qasam, is Ayat ke mazmoon ne amali surat ikhtiyar nahi ki aur aisa sirf us Zamane mein hoga jab "Qaem" khurooj karenge aur jab woh Qayam karenge to saari Duniya mein koi aisa shakhs baqi nahi ragega jo Khuda ka inkaar kare."_

(Noorus Saqlain, Vol 2, P-211, Tafseer e Namoona)

🚩

Abu Mohd ne Kenya ke Risala 'Rabta Alam e Islami' se Mahdi Muntazar (atfs) ke bare mein sawal kiya. Uske chief Mohd Al Saleh Al Qazaz (Sunni) ne jawab mein farmaya ke Ibne Taimiya (Bani e Wahabiyat) ne bhi Imam Mahdi (as) ke mutalliq Ahadis ka inkar nahi kiya hai. Is Risale ka mein likha hai:

"Duniya mein Fitna o Fasaad ke zahoor aur Kufr o Zulm ke phail jane par Khuda wande Alam uske (Mahdi as) ke zariye Duniya ko Adl o Insaaf se is tarah mamoor jar dega jis tarah wo Zulm o Jaur se bhari hogi. Woh un 12 Khulafa e Rashedin mein Akheri hai jinke mutalliq Paighambar (saww) ne Kutub e Sihaah mein khabar di hai."

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as) us shakhs ke bare mein kiya kahte hain jo Hadiyan e Barhaq ki Wilayat rakhta ho. Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Woh us shakhs ki tarah hai jo us Rahbare Inquilab ke Kheme mein ho."_

Phir farmaya:

_" Us shakhs ki tarah hai jo Paighambar e Islam (saww) ke saath un Maarko mein sharik ho."_

_"Woh us shakhs ki tarah hai jo Paighambar ke saath Shaheed hua."_

(Bihaarul Anwaar, Vol 13, P 136), Mahasin)

🚩

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

*افضل اعمال امتى انتظار الفرج من الله عزوجل.*

_"Meri Ummat ke afzal tareen Aamaal mein se Zahoor ka Intezar karna hai."_

*افضل العبادة انتظار الفرج.*

_"Zyada Fazilat wali Ibaadat Zahoor ka Intezar karna hai."_

(Bihaarul Anwaar, Vol-13, P-136,137)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَسْاَلُ اللهَ اَنْ يُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَنْ يَجْعَلَنِيْ مِنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِيْنَ لَكَ وَ التَّابِعِيْنَ وَ النَّاصِرِيْنَ لَكَ عَلٰى اَعْدَاۤئِكَ وَ الْمُسْتَشْهَدِيْنَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ فِيْ جُمْلَةِ اَوْلِيَاۤئِكَ يَا مَوْلَايَ يَا صَاحِبَ الزَّمَانِ صَلَوَاتُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰى اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ.....*

(Ziyarat e Imam e Zamana (as) baroz Juma)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

       *3rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *30th December 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*AALAMI ILAHI HUKUMAT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1382)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*هُوَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِینِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِیُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّینِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكُونَ*

_"Aur Woh Wohi to Khuda hai Jisne Apne Rasool ko Hidayat aur Deen e Haq ke saath bheja taake Woh Apne Deen ko tamam Adyaan par gjalib banaye (Overcome over all Religions) chahe Mushrekin ko nagawar hi kyon na lage."_

(Surah Taubah: 33)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat se silsila jaari hai. Guzishta Ayat mein Noor ke bhijhane ka zikr tha. Noor se murad Aimma (as) hain. Jisko rakhe saiyyan mar sake na koi. Jab Ummat ne 11 Aimma ko Shaheed kar diya to Barveh ko Allah ne chhupa diya aur Uske Hukm se zahir hoga aur puri Duniya mein uski Hukumat hogi.

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:

_"Khuda ki Qasam! Abhi tak is Ayat ki Taveel zahir nahi hui. Iski Taveel Hazrat Qaem e Aale Mohd (as) ke Zahoor ke waqt zahir hogi. Jab Qaem (as) khurooj karenge to har Mushrik o Kafir ko unka khurooj nagawar guzrega aur jab unka khurooj ho jayega to Islam ko tamam Adyaan par ghalba naseeb hoga aur Kafir o Mushrik agar us daur mein kisi chattan mein bhi chhupe honge to chattan wahan se guzarne wale Momin ko sada karke kahegi ke aye Momin! Mere andar Kafir chhupa baitha hai, mujhe tod aur use bahar nikal kar qatl kar de."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Husain (as):

_"Hamare andar 12 Mahdi (as) hain. Pahle Mahdi Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur Akheri Mahdi (as) meri Nasl mein se Nawa Imam hai aur woh Qaem Bil Haq hai. Uske zariye se Allah Murdah Zameen ko Zindagi ata karega aur uske haath se Allah Deen e Haq ko tamam Adyaan par ghalib karega. Agarche Mushrekin ko nagawar hi kyon na guzre."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Hamare Qaem (as) ki Rob se madad ki jayegi aur Nusrat e Ilahi se uski taeed hogi. Uske liye Zameen ki tanabee'n (ropes) samet di jayengi aur uske liye Khazane zahir kar diye jayenge. Uski Hukumat Mashriq o Maghrib (East West) tak hogi. Uske zariye se Khuda apne Deen ko tamam Adyaan par ghalba ata karega. Agarche Mushrekin ko nagawar hi kyon na lage. Har weeran Zameen uske daur e Hukumat mein abaad ho jayegi. Roohullah Esa bin Maryam (Jesus Christ) nazil ho kar unke peechhe Namaz padhenge."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Is Amr ka Maalik apne uzr ke wazeh hone ke baad ghayeb ho jayega kyonki us waqt Dilon mein Fitna rach bas chuka hoga aur haalat ye hogi ke unka qareeb tareen shakhs bhi unke haathon apne Nabi ke Deen ko tamam Adyaan par ghalib karega agarche Mushrekin ko nagawar hi kyon na lage."_

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ عَظُمَ الْبَلَاۤءُ وَ بَرِحَ الْخَفَاۤءُ وَ انْكَشَفَ الْغِطَاۤءُ وَ ضَاقَتِ الْاَرْضُ بِمَا وَسِعَتِ السَّمَاۤءُ وَ اِلَيْكَ يَا رَبِّ الْمُشْتَكٰى وَ عَلَيْكَ الْمُعَوَّلُ فِي الشِّدَّةِ وَ الرَّخَاۤءِ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ الَّذِيْنَ اَمَرْتَنَا بِطَاعَتِهِمْ وَ عَجِّلِ اللّٰهُمَّ فَرَجَهُمْ بِقَاۤئِمِهِمْ وَ اَظْهِرْ اِعْزَازَهُ....*

(Dua e Imam e Zaman (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *4th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *31st December 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

             ♦ _*12 MONTHS*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1383)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثۡنَا عَشَرَ شَهۡرࣰا فِی كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ یَوۡمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۡهَاۤ أَرۡبَعَةٌ حُرُمࣱۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلدِّینُ ٱلۡقَیِّمُۚ فَلَا تَظۡلِمُوا۟ فِیهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمۡۚ وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ كَاۤفَّةࣰ كَمَا یُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمۡ كَاۤفَّةࣰۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ*

_"Jis Din se Allah ne Aasmaano aur Zameen ko paida kiya hai us Din se hi *Khuda ke nazdeek Mahino ki tadaad 12 hai.* Un mein 4 Mahine Mohtaram hain. Yehi Seedha aur Mustahkam Din hai. Lehaza un Mahino mein apne upar Zulm na karna aur Mushrekin se tum sab milkar lado jaisa ke woh milkar tumse ladte hain aur Jaan lo ke Allah Ahle Taqwa ke hi saath hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 36)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aaj Solar Month ka Last Day hai.

Duniya mein do qism ke Mahine raej hain. Aksar qaumen aur aur milal ke haan Shamsi Mahine (Solar Months) raej hain. Jabke Islami Ibaadat bilkhusoos Roze aur Hajj ka talluq Qamari Mahino (Lunar Months) se hai. Qamari Mahine ka daromadar Chand ke dekhne par hai. Ek Shamsi Saal (Solar Year) 365 Din ka hota hai. Jabke har 4 Saal ke baad is mein mazeed ek Din ka izafa kar diya jata hai. Aur Qamari Saal taqreeban 354 Dino par mushtamil hota hai aur Qamari Mahina kisi khaas Mausam ka paband nahi hota.

🗒

Jazeera Arab mein Loot Maar ka aam riwaj tha aur aksar Tribes ki Economy Loot Maar par mabni thi. Qabila Muzir Rajab ke Mahine ko Mohtaram maanta tha. Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Baitullah ke Hajj ko riwaj diya. Isliye 3 Mahine yani Zilqad, ZilHajj aur Muharram Mohtaram maane jaate the. In Mohtaram Mahino mein koi kisi par Hamla nahi karta tha. Lekin Arab mein ek burai thi wo ye ke woh in Mahino ko aage peechhe ya change kar dete the. Misal ke taur par is Saal Muharram nahi Safar ka Mahina mohtaram hoga, apne matlab ke mutabiq. Allah Ta'ala ne is harkat ko Kufr mein izaafe se taabir kiya hai.

🗒

Qadeem zamane mein Calendar koi bade Event se shuru hota tha. Yani woh Us important Event se Din ginte the. Sabhi Calendar koi na koi event se jude hue hain. Jaise Gregorian Calender Hazrat Esa (as) ki Wiladat se shuru hota hai. Arab Abraha ke waqae se Aamul Feel jaari raha. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Hijrat se Hijri Calendar shuru hua jiska pahla Mahina Rabiul Awwal tha jisko doosre Khalifa ne badal kar Muharram kar diya.

For More Information Read in detail:

*Calendar:*

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calendar

*Islamic Calendar:*

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_calendar

*Gregorian Calender:*

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregorian_calendar

🤲🏻

*وَ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي شَهْرِنَا هٰذَا الْمُرَجَّبِ الْمُكَرَّمِ وَ مَا بَعْدَهُ مِنَ الْاَشْهُرِ الْحُرُمِ...*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕

🌹 *HAPPY NEW YEAR 2020* 🌹

***********************************

💐 *WILADAT JANABE ZAINAB (sa) MUBARAK*💐

(Ba Riwayat DOB: 05/05/05, D/M/Y)

📩📩📩📩📩📩📩📩📩📩

*CONGRATULATION SHIA CHANNEL COMPLETES 7 SUCCESSFUL YEARS AT YOUR SERVICE FI SABEELILLAH*

With more than 15,000 members.

💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐

         *5th Rabius Sani 1441*

 *1st January 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

             ♦ _*CALENDAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1384)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثۡنَا عَشَرَ شَهۡرࣰا فِی كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ یَوۡمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۡهَاۤ أَرۡبَعَةٌ حُرُمࣱۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلدِّینُ ٱلۡقَیِّمُۚ فَلَا تَظۡلِمُوا۟ فِیهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمۡۚ وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ كَاۤفَّةࣰ كَمَا یُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمۡ كَاۤفَّةࣰۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ*

_"Jis Din se Allah ne Aasmaano aur Zameen ko paida kiya hai us Din se hi *Khuda ke nazdeek Mahino ki tadaad 12 hai.* Un mein 4 Mahine Mohtaram hain. Yehi Seedha aur Mustahkam Din hai. Lehaza un Mahino mein apne upar Zulm na karna aur Mushrekin se tum sab milkar lado jaisa ke woh milkar tumse ladte hain aur Jaan lo ke Allah Ahle Taqwa ke hi saath hai."_

(Surat Tauba: 36)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Calender ke 12 Mahino ka tazkara jaari hai.

🗒

Imam Sadiq (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:

_"Kitab e Takween mein Mahino ki tadaad 12 hai jis Din se Usne Aasmano aur Zameen ko paida kiya hai. Is mein 4 Mahine Hurmat wale hain. 12 Mahino ke Naam ye hain: Muharram, Safar, Rabiul Awwal, Rabiul Akhir, Jamadi ul Awwal, Jamadi ul Akhir, Rajab, Shaban, Ramzan, Shawwal, Zilqad aur Zilhajj. Aur in mein Hurmat wale 4 Mahine ye hain: Zilhajj ke Akheri 20 Din, Muharram, Safar, Rabiul Awwal aur Rabius Sani ke pahle 10 Din."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🗒

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Mahine 12 muqarrar farmaye aur unke Dino ki tadaad usooli taur par 360 Din banti thi lekin is mein se Takhleequl Arz o Samaa (Creation of Heaven & Earth) ke 6 Din nafi (minus) kiye gaye. Isiliye Qamari Saal (Lunar Year) ke Din 360 se kam hain."_ (354 Days)

(Noorus Saqlain)

🗒

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jabir! 'Saal' mere Nana Rasoole Khuda (saww) hain aur iske 12 Mahino se ham 12 Imam hain jinka pahla fard Hazrat Ali (as) aur Akheri fard Hazrat Mahdi (atfs) hain. Ye sab Khalqe Khuda par Hujjat hain aur AanHazrat (saww) ki Wahy aur unke Ilm ke Ameen hain aur un mein 4 Mohtaram Mahino se woh Imam murad hain jinka naam Ali (as) hai yani Hazrat Ali (as), mere Walid Ali Zainul Abedin (as), phir Ali bin Musa (as), phir Ali bin Mohd  (as). Chunanche unka iqrar hi Deen e Qayyem hai. Un mein 'apni Jaano par Zulm na karo.' maqsad ye hai ke sab ki Imamat ka Aqeeda rakho taake tum Hidayat Yafta ban sako."_

(Kitabul Ghaibah, Noorus Saqlain)

🗒

For more info click:

*Calendar:*

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calendar

*Islamic Calender:*_

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_calendar

*Gregorian Calendar:*

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregorian_calendar

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🌍

Imam Ali (as)

_"Duniya Momin ka qaid-khana, Maut uska tohfa aur Jannat uski manzil hai. Duniya kaafiro'n ki Jannat hoti hai aur maut usay is (jannat) se judaa karnewali  aur Aag uski manzil hoti hai."_

(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)

🌏

Imam Sadiq (as)

_"Duniya Akherat ke liye behtareen madadgaar hai."_

(Wasaail ush Shia, v12, p50)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hamare liye Naya Saal khushiyon bhara ho jis mein hamari Nekiyon mein aur izaafa ho.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *6th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *2nd January 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*ZAKHIRA - HOARDING*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1385)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ إِنَّ كَثِیرࣰا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡبَارِ وَٱلرُّهۡبَانِ لَیَأۡكُلُونَ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡبَـٰطِلِ وَیَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱلَّذِینَ یَكۡنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلۡفِضَّةَ وَلَا یُنفِقُونَهَا فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِیمࣲ * یَوۡمَ یُحۡمَىٰ عَلَیۡهَا فِی نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكۡوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمۡ وَجُنُوبُهُمۡ وَظُهُورُهُمۡۖ هَـٰذَا مَا كَنَزۡتُمۡ لِأَنفُسِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡنِزُونَ.*

_"Aye Ahle Imaan! Ahle Kitab ke aksar Ulama aur Darwesh logon ke Maal Baatil tareeqe se khaate hain aur Allah ki Raah rokte hain aur woh log jo Sone Chaandi ka zakhira karte hain aur use Rahe Khuda mein kharch nahi karte, Aap unhe Dardnak Azaab ki Bashaarat de den. Jis Din woh Sona Chaandi Aatish e Dozakh mein tapaya jayega aur usse unki Peshaniyon aur unke pehluon aur unki pushton (Back) ko dagha jayega ke ye wo Zakhira hai jo tumne apne liye jama kiya tha. Ab apne Zakhire ka maza chakhu."_

(Surah Taubah: 34 - 35)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs apne Maal ki Zakat ada Kare to wo Zakhira nahi hai. Agarche Satveen Zameen ke neeche bhi uska Maal kyon na rakha ho. Aur jis Maal ki Zakat ada na ki gayi ho to wo Zakhira (Hoarding) hai. Agarche wo Zameen ke upar hi kyon na rakha ho."_

(Amaali Shaikh Tusi, Noorus Saqlain)

🏅

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Halakat hai Chaandi ke liye."_  (3 bar repeat kiya.)

Umar ne poochha kausa Maal apne paas rakhen?

Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Tum apne paas Zikr karne wali Zaban, Shukr karne wala Dil aur Sahibe Imaan Biwi rakho, jo har shakhs ko Deen ke liye madadgar sabit hogi."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🥇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Hamare Shiyo ko ikhtiyar hai jo kuchh unke haath mein hai use achhe tareeqe se kharch karen lekin jab hamara Qaem (atfs) ka Zahoor hoga to har zakhira andoz (hoarders) par uska Zakheere ko Haraam kar denge aur use hazir karne ka hukm denge aur uske zariye se Dushman ke khilaf madad hasil karenge. Jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (9:35)"_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🥇

Zaid bin Wahab naql karte hain ke mein Rabza mein Abu Zar Ghafari se sawal kiya ke aapko is sar Zameen par kis cheez ne utara?

Unhone farmaya:

"Ham Sham mein ye Ayat padhte the (9:35)."

Moaviya ne kaha ye Ayat hamare mutalliq nazil nahi hui. Ye Ahle Kitab ke liye nazil hui hai.

Abu Zar ne kaha: "Nahi, Sab ke liye yaksaan nazil hui hai."

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اخْلُفْ عَلَيَّ نَفَقَتِيْ وَ انْفَعْنِيْ بِمَا رَزَقْتَنِيْ فِيْ دُنْيَايَ وَ اٰخِرَتِيْ لِيْ وَ لِاِخْوَانِيْ وَ اَبَوَيَّ وَ جَمِيْعِ عِتْرَتِيۤ اَسْتَوْدِعُكَ اللّٰهَ....*

(Ziyarat Sahibul Amr - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *7th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

       *3rd January 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*MOHTARAM MAHINE*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1386)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّسِیۤءُ زِیَادَةࣱ فِی ٱلۡكُفۡرِۖ یُضَلُّ بِهِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ یُحِلُّونَهُۥ عَامࣰا وَیُحَرِّمُونَهُۥ عَامࣰا لِّیُوَاطِـُٔوا۟ عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ فَیُحِلُّوا۟ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُۚ زُیِّنَ لَهُمۡ سُوۤءُ أَعۡمَـٰلِهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یَهۡدِی ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ*

_"Mohtaram Mahino ki Taqdeem o Takheer (postponement) Kufr mein mazeed Kafirana harkat hai jisse Kafir Gumrahi mein mubtila kiye ja rahe hain ke woh ek Saal use Halaal bana lete hain aur doosre Saal use doosre Haraam kar dete hain taake Allah ke Haraam karda Mahino ki tadaad poori kar de aur Allah ka Haraam kiya hua Halaal bhi kar len. Unke bure Aamal unke liye Khushnuma bana diye gaye hain aur Allah Kafir logon ki Hidayat nahi karta."_

(Surah Taubah: 37)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Mushrekin ki aadat thi ke har Saal ke do Mahino mein Hajj karte the, maslan woh Zilhajj mein do Saal Hajj karte the, phir do Saal Muharram mein Hajj karte the, phir do Saal Safar mein Hajj karte the, yun Saal ke do Mahine Hajj karte the. Hujjatul Wuda ke ek Saal pahle Mushrekin ne Zilqad ke Mahine mein Hajj kiya tha, phir 10 Hijri mein AanHazrat (saww) ne Hujjatul Wuda kiya to us Saal Mahe Zilhajj mein hi hona tha isi liye Nabi Akram (saww) ne apne Khutbe mein ye Alfaaz ada farmaye: "Aaj Zamana apni gardish mukammal karke usi maqam par pahunch gaya jis maqam par woh Arz o Samaa (Heaven & Earth creation) ke takhleeq ke waqt tha. Ek Saal ke 12 Mahine hain. Un mein se 4 Mahine Hurmat wale hain jin mein se Zilqad, Zilhajj aur Muharram ek doosre ke saath paiwasta (attached) hain aur inke alawa Mahe Rajab Hurmat wala Mahina hai jo ke Jamadi ul Akhir aur Shabaan ke darmiyan hai." In Alfaaz se AanHazrat (saww) ne darasl ye Paigham diya tha ke Hurmat wale Mahine ab apne asl maqam par pahunch chuke hain aur Hajj apne sahih Mahine Zilhajj mein aa chuka hai aur Taqdeem o Takheer ka qanoon Baatil hai."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

Hajj ki Rasm Kuffar o Mushrekin mein bhi raej thi jisko Islam ne bhi jaari rakha kyonki ye Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ki Sunnat hai.

Jabke Kafir o Mushrekin bhi Muharram ko Mohtaram Mahina maante the aur in Mahinon mein woh Jang o Jidal band rakhte the lekin ye kaise Musalman the jo Kafiron se bhi badtar the jinhone Muharram ka koi paas o lihaz na rakhte hue Imam Husain (as) ko Shaheed kiya aur Ahlo Ayal ko aseer kiya. Haif hai un Musalmano par jo Yazeed ki taeed karte hain jo is lihaz se Kafir se bhi badtar tha.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Abdullah ibne Zubair ne Imam Husain (as) se arz kiya, "Yabna Rasulallah (saww)! Agar aap Makkah Moazzama tashreef le jaate hain to Haram e Kaaba mein rahiye". Imam Husain (as) ne farmaya, "Aye Abdullah! Main nahi chahta ke Hurmat e Ka'aba meri wajah se zaaye' ho aur agar main ret ke teele par qatl hun, to mere nazdeek behtar hai is se ke Haram e Kaaba mein maara jaun."_

(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v1, p139)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"(Aye Ma'bood!) Mujhe Apne mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda Saalon mein bhi naseeb farma aur mujhe Apne wus'at waale fazl se kushaada Rizq de."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimaali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *8th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *4th January 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*JANG KE LIYE AMAADGI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1387)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَا لَكُمۡ إِذَا قِیلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُوا۟ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱثَّاقَلۡتُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ أَرَضِیتُم بِٱلۡحَیَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا مِنَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِۚ فَمَا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلۡحَیَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا فِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِیلٌ *  إِلَّا تَنفِرُوا۟ یُعَذِّبۡكُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِیمࣰا وَیَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَیۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَیۡـࣰٔاۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ قَدِیرٌ*

[Surat At-Tawbah 38 - 39]

_"Aye Ahle Imaan! Tumhe kya ho gaya hai ke jab tumhe Allah ki Rah mein nikalne ke liye kaha gaya to tum log Zameen se chipak kar baith gaye? Kya tumne Akherat ke evaz Duniya par qana'at kar li hai? Duniyavi Zindagi ka saaz o samaan Akherat ke muqabile mein intihai kam hai. Agar tum na uthoge to Khuda tumhe dardnak Azaab dega aur tumhare badle doosri qaum ko le aayega aur tum Khuda ka kuchh nahi bigad sakoge. Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhne wala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 38 - 39)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Ayat Jange Tabuk ke bare mein nazil hui. Rasoole Khuda (saww) Taif se laute hi the ke Musalmano ko Romans Empire ke khilaf Jang karne ke liye hausla diya. Ye Ayat aaj ke haalat e hazra par bhi mutabiq ho rahi hai. Jo aaj India wa Iran o Iraq mein ho raha hai aur Islam Dushman America apni sazishen Gulf region mein kar raha hai aur Musalman khamoshi se muzahira kar rahe hain. Roman bhi English log the yani West. Islam ka parcham jab Arab par lehraha to Roman ne khatra mehsoos kiya aur meqabile par utar aaye. Musalmano ka Dushman West aur unke hamnawa kal bhi the aur aaj bhi hain.

🚩

Is Jang ki ek khas baat ye bhi hai ke jaise har Jang mein Ali (as) ne apni Shuja'at ke jauhar dikhaye lekin is Jang mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne unhe sharik nahi kiya balke unhe Madina ki Safety ki zimmedari saunpi. Medina mein ya to Rasoole Khuda (saww) khud rah sakte ya phir unke Wasi jo ke unhone Hazrat Ali (as) ko ye zimmedari saupi aur farmaya:

*أما ترضى أن تكون مني بمنزلة هارون من موسى*

*أنتَ مِنّی بِمَنزلةِ هارونَ مِنْ مُوسی، اِلّاأنـّه لانَبیّ بَعدی*

_"Aye Ali! Kya tum is baat par raazi nahi ke tumhari Manzilat wohi hai jo Haroon (as) ko Musa (as) se thi, siwai iske mere baad koi Nabi nahi hoga."_

Ye Hadis Hadis e Manzilat ke naam se mashhoor o maaroof hai aur tamam Ahl Sunnat ki Kutube Sihah mein bhi maujood hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Khuda tum par rahem kare apne Dushmano se ladne ke liye chal pado aur sust ho kar Zameen se chimte ba raho. Warna yad rakho ke Zulm o Sitam sehte rahoge aur zillat mein pade rahoge aur tumhara hissa intihai past hoga. Suno! Jang Azma hoshiyar o bedar raha karta hai aur jo so jata hai Dushman usse ghafil ho kar soya nahi karta."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَحَلَّهٗ مَحَلَّ ھَارُوْنَ مِنْ مُوْسٰی فَقَالَ لَهٗ اَنْتَ مِنِّیْ بِمَنْزِلَۃِ ھَارُوْنَ مِنْ مُوْسٰی اِلَّاۤ اَنَّهٗ لَا نَبِیَّ بَعْدِیْ....*

(Dua-e-Nudba - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *9th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

     *5th January 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*ILAHI MADAD*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1388)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِلَّا تَنصُرُوهُ فَقَدۡ نَصَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَهُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثَانِیَ ٱثۡنَیۡنِ إِذۡ هُمَا فِی ٱلۡغَارِ إِذۡ یَقُولُ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ لَا تَحۡزَنۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَنَاۖ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِینَتَهُۥ عَلَیۡهِ وَأَیَّدَهُۥ بِجُنُودࣲ لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلسُّفۡلَىٰۗ وَكَلِمَةُ ٱللَّهِ هِیَ ٱلۡعُلۡیَاۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِیزٌ حَكِیمٌ.*

_"Agar tum Paighambar (saww) ki madad na karoge to koi baat nahi, Khuda ne to us waqt unki Madad ki hai jab Kafiron ne unhe nikal diya tha. Jab do mein se doosra tha (aur us waqt bhi madad ki) jab Gaar (Cave) mein woh do the (aur Khuda ne us waqt bhi Madad ki) jab woh apne saathi se kah rahe the Ranj na karo. Khuda hamare saath hai. Us waqt Allah ne un par Apni taraf se Sakina (Taskeen) nazil ki. Aur unki taeed un Lashkaron se ki jo tumko nazar na aate the. Allah ne Kafiron ka bol neecha kar diya aur Allah ka Bol to Ooncha hi hai. Allah Ghalib aur Hikmatwala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 40)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat mein Allah Jang e Tubuk ke amada hone ki targheeb de raha hai, wahin ye bhi batana cha raha hai ke Allah unki madad ka zarooratmand nahi hai jabke Allah khud direct bhi Madad ka chuka hai

Is Ayat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Hijrat ki hi Raat ke 3 aise mauqon ka zikr kiya hai jahan sirf Allah ne hi Madad ki hai.

1. Rasool (saww) ke Ghar mein do the aur Mushrikon ne us Ghar ko gher rakha tha. Hazrat Ali (as) ka Rasool (saww) ke Bistar par sona aur Allah ka unki Hifazat karna. Rasool e Akram (saww) ka Ghar se nikalna aur  Dushmanon ke narghe mein se bach kar nikal jana.

2. Gaar (Cave) mein bhi do the ek Rasoole Khuda (saww) aur doosra ek Munafiq. Asteen ke Sanp ko saath mein rakha kahi ye kuchh gadbad na kar de.

3. Jab Kafir dono ke Qadmon ke nishan dekhte hue Gaar pahunche. Lekin Gaar mein Saathi dar ke mare rone laga. Rone ki awaz Kafiron tak pahunch jati to poora mission fail ho jata.

Lekin is sab ke bawajood Allah ki Madad ne Kafiron ka mansooba nakaam kiya.

(Ye Doosra Munafiq saathi Abu Bakr tha.)

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as):

"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne apne saathi se farmaya: 'Pur sukoon raho! Jabke Aapke saathi par kapkapi taari thi aur use kisi tarah ka sukoon nahi aa raha tha. Jab AanHazrat (saww) ne Saathi ki ye haalat dekhi to farmaya kya tumhe mein Ansaar saathi dikhaon jo apni mahafil mein mahve guftugu hain ya tumhe Jafar ibne Abi Talib aur unke saathi jo Samandar mein ghota khori kar rahe hain. Unse kaha haan to uske Chehre par haath phera to usne ye sab dekha."

(Rauza e Kaafi, Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Umar ki Shura mein bhi iska sabhi se sawal kiya ke Rasool (saww) ke Bistar par kaun soya tha?

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

"Ek Yahoodi Chief ne Hazrat Ali (as) se sawal kiya ke Nabi (saww) ki Zindagi mein Aapki kitni bar azmayish hui. Aap (as) ne farmaya: 7 bar. Un mein doosra marhala Shabe Hijrat Rasool (saww) ke bistar par sona."

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Hazrat Abu Talib (as) ne Tahaffuz e Paighambar (saww) ki Maslahet ke pesh nazar apne Imaan ko makhfi rakha tha. Jab unki wafat ho gayi to Allah ne apne Paighambar (saww) ko Wahy farmayi ke ab Aap Makkah chhod den ab Aapka yahan koi madadgar nahi hai."

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اللهم العن صنمى القريش و جبتيها و طاغوتيها و افكيها و ابنتيها....*

_"Allah ki La'anat ho do Quraish ke Buton aur unki betiyon par."_

(Dua Sanama e Quraish)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *9th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *6th January 2020, Monday*

       *Yaum e Jang e Jamal*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*JANG KI MASLAHATEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1389)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافࣰا وَثِقَالࣰا وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِكُمۡ وَأَنفُسِكُمۡ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكُمۡ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ.*

_"Niklo khwah halke ho ya bojhal aur Rahe Khuda mein  apne Maalon aur Jaano ke saath Jihaad karo. Yehi tumhare haq mein behtar hai agar tum jaante ho."_

(Surah Taubah: 41)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat ka mafhoom ye hai ke agar Jawan ho to bhi Jihaad ke liye niklo aur agar Boodhe ho tab bhi niklo.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

Aaj agar Imam (as) Zahir hote aur Jihaad ka Hukm dete to ham par is Ayat ru se bhi wajib hota ke ham Dushman ke khilaf uth khade hon aur poora inteqam len.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

_*Question and Answer:*_

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

"Sa'ad! Tumhare mukhalif ne apne nazariye ke isbaat (proofs) aur tumhare Aqeede ke ibtaal (Rejection) mein tumhare saamne ye Daleel pesh ki hai ke jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Zindagi ko khatra lahaq hua to Aapne Hijrat ki aur apne saath ek Buzurg ko apna saathi banaya uski wajah ye thi Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne dekha ke jitni zaroorat Islam ko meri zaroorat thi utna hi us saathi ki zaroorat thi kyonki usko Ummat ki bagdod sanbhalna tha. Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne socha Ali (as) ka wujood ek bojh hai agar rahe to rahe warna unki koi zaroorat nahi hai unko Dushmanon narghe mein unhe Rasool ke Bistar par chhod diya aur unki Jaan ki koi hifazat nahi ki. Kyonki Rasool jaante the jo karname Ali (as) ne kiye woh to koi bhi ada kar sakta hai."

Saad ne farmaya Maula Mukhalefin yehi kahte hain.

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Unko ye jawab do ke tumhara Aqeeda 4 Khulafa par hai. Aur Rasool (saww) ne farmaya ke Khilafat mere baad 30 baras tak rahegi. Aur 4 Khulafa Rashedeen kahlate hain. Is hisab se Rasool ke baad Charon ko Khalifa hona tha. Bhala is mein kya hikmate amali thi ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne ek Khalifa ko bachane ki itni fikr ki jabke baqi 3 ko Islam mein ghair zaroori samjha? Is jawab se mukhtalif ka istedlal poori tarah bikhar jayega."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Jange Jamal mein to mukhlifeen se muqabila kiya to apne pichhle 3 mukhalefin se Jang kyon nahi ki?

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Mein apne Mukhalefin se Jang na karke 6 Anbiya ki Sunnato par amal kiya..... "_(Guzishta mein same hadis bayan kar chuke hain)

_"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko khatra lahaq hua to Hijrat ki. Pas jab Nabi e Akram (saww) ne apne Mukhalefin se Jang nahi ki to mein kyon karta."_

(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَنَّكَ اَقَمْتَ الصَّلَاةَ وَ اٰتَيْتَ الزَّكَاةَ وَ اَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوْفِ وَ نَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ وَ عَبَدْتَ اللهَ مُخْلِصًا وَ جَاهَدْتَ فِي اللّٰهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِ حَتّٰى اَتَاكَ الْيَقِيْنُ فَعَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ مِنِّيْ مَا بَقِيْتُ وَ بَقِيَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهَارُ وَ عَلٰى اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ۔..*

 (Ziyarat Imam Husain (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

   *11th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *7th January 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                ♦ _*JIHAAD*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1390)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَوۡ كَانَ عَرَضࣰا قَرِیبࣰا وَسَفَرࣰا قَاصِدࣰا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَـٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُۚ وَسَیَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡنَا لَخَرَجۡنَا مَعَكُمۡ یُهۡلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ یَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ.*

_"Agar asaani se milne wala fayda hota to woh zaroor tumhare peechhe chalne par amaada ho jate. Magar unke liye raaste ki taweel masafat (Long Journey) mushkil ban gayi hai aur ye anqareeb Khuda ki Qasam khaa kar kahenge agar hamare bas mein hota to ham Aapke saath zaroor nikal padte. Woh apne aap ko halakat mein dal rahe hain. Allah Jaanta hai ke woh Jhoote hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 42)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

AanHazrat (saww) ne ailane Nabuwwat ke baad itna lanba safar nahi kiya siwai Jange Tubuk ke. Ye Jang Roman Empire ke khilaf thi. Roman Empire us waqt aisa tha jaisa ke aaj US/Israel ya aur koi English Empire. Munafiq Musalmano ko darane lage ke itne bade Super Power se muqabila theek nahi. Isliye kuchh Musalman unke bahkave mein aa kar alag alag excuse/bahane banane lage. Lekin phir bhi Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne hukm diya ke Jang ki tayyari karen. Jabke Musalmano ki pai dar pai Jang jaari thi. In logon mutalliq ye Ayat nazil hui. Ek Masoom Rahbar ka Hukm manna Wajib ho jata hai kyonki Masoom jo bhi Hukm dega woh Hikmat se khali nahi hoga.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚔

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Woh log Jihad ke liye safar karne ki Isteta'at (ability) rakhte the lekin woh do wajah se jana pasand nahi karte the: pahle ye ke Maale Ghanimat par yaqeen nahi tha, doosre raaste ki doori."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ek shakhs Rasulallah (saww) ke paas aaya aur kaha, "Main Jihad ke liye raaghib (khwaish-mand) hoo'n lekin mere Waledain maane' (rukaawat) hain jo mujh se bahut uns (Mohabbat) rakhte hain". Aap (saww) ne farmaya, "Apne Waledain ke saath raho. Wallah, tumhara un dono ke saath ek din Raat rehna, ek saal ke Jihad se afzal hai."_

(Almustashaar Abdul Haleem Jundi (Misri), p205)

⚔

Imam Ali (as):

_"Tamaam Nek kaam hatta Raah e Khuda mein Jihad karna, Amr bil Maroof aur Nahi Anil Munkar ke muqabile mein aise hi hai jaisa ek wasee (vast) samandar ke saamne ek qatrah ho."_

(Aasmani Nasihatein, v1, p79)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَیْكَ یَا اَمِیْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ جَاهَدْتَ فِی اللّٰهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهٖ وَ عَمِلْتَ بِكِتَابِهٖ وَ اتَّبَعْتَ سُنَنَ نَبِیِّهٖ صَلَّی اللّٰهُ عَلَیْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ حَتّٰی دَعَاكَ اللّٰهُ اِلیٰ جِوَارِهٖ فَقَبَضَكَ اِلَیْهِ بِاِخْتِیَارِهٖ وَ اَلْزَمَ اَعْدَاۤئَكَ الْحُجَّۃَ مَعَ مَالَكَ مِنَ الْحُجَجِ الْبَالِغَۃِ عَلٰی جَمِیْعِ خَلْقِهٖ....*

(Ziyarat e Aminullah - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

   *12th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *8th January 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*ISMAT E ANBIYA*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1391)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ یَتَبَیَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِینَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡكَـٰذِبِینَ*

_"Allah Aap (saww) se Darguzar kare! Aapne unhe peechhe rahne ki ijazat kyon de di (tumhe chahiye tha ke unhe us waqt tak rukhsat na karte) yahan tak ke Aap par sach bolne wale wazeh hote aur jhooto ko bhi Aap maloom kar lete."_

(Surah Taubah: 43)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Islami pukhta Aqeeda ye hai ke Anbiya / Imam (as), Hadiyan e Haq sab Masoom (Infallible) hote hain. Agar Masoom nahi hote to Gunah ya mistakes karte. Agar aisa hota to unke qaul ki reliability, etemad, authenticity khatm ho jati. Iska natija ye hota jo Ahadis hoti, hatta ke Qur'an bhi motabar nahi mana jata.

👉🏻

Imam Reza (as) se Mamoon Rashid ne Ismat e Anbiya (Infallibility of Prophets) ke bare mein is Ayat ka hawala dete hue sawal kiya. Means agar Anbiya/Imam Masoom hain to unhone kaunsa Gunah kiya ke woh Tauba o Isteghfar karte hain aur Allah Ma'af kar raha hai?

Imam (as) ne jawab mein farmaya:

_"Qur'an mein kuchh aisi bhi Ayaat hain jinka khitab to Nabi Akram (saww) se to hai lekin isse murad unki Ummat hai aur ye Ayat bhi unhi mein shamil hai. Isi tarah ki doosri Ayaat bhi hain:_

_"Agar tu ne Shirk kiya to tere amal barbad ho jayenge aur tu nuqsan uthane walon mein se ho jayega."_ (17:74)

_"Aur agar Ham Aapko Sabit Qadam na rakhte to Aap bhi unki taraf zaroor mael ho jate."_

_" Aisi Ayaton ka mafhoom bhi yehi hai."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Imam Baqir (as) is Ayat ke zimn mein farmate hain:

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Nabi Akram (saww) se farmaya ke unhe ijazat us waqt dete jab Aapko maloom ho jata ke un mein se mazoor kaun hai aur baghair uzr e sharai (legal excuse) ke ghar mein baithne ka khwahish mand kaun hain? "_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Imam e Masoomeen (as) ke naqkhe qadam par chalne ki Taufeeq ata farma.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *14th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *10th January 2020, Friday*

*SHAHADAT JANABE FATEMA ZEHRA (sa)*

(Be Riwayat 75 Din)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SHAK - DOUBT*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1392)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

 *لَا یَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِینَ یُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ أَن یُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمُۢ بِٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ * إِنَّمَا یَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِینَ لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ وَٱرۡتَابَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِی رَیۡبِهِمۡ یَتَرَدَّدُونَ*

_"Jo log Allah aur Roze Akherat par Imaan rakhte hain woh hargiz Aap se ye darkhwast na karenge ke unhe apni Jaan o Maal ke saath Jihad karne se ma'af rakha jaye. Allah Muttaqeen ko achhi tarah jaanta hai. Aisi ijaazat to sirf wo log talab karte hain jo Allah aur Roze Akherat par Imaan rakhte aur jinke Dilon mein shak hai aur woh apne shak mein hi ulat palat rahe hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 44 - 45)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jo apne Shak mein ulatta palatta rahega to pahle isse sabqat hasil kar lenge aur peechhe aanewale ise mil jayenge aur Shayateen ke sum iske wujood ke tukde tukde kar dalenge."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Zaalikal Kitaabu La Raiba Fih, Hudal Lil Muttaqin' 'Ye Wo Kitaab hai jisme shak ki gunjaaish nahi, ye muttaqeen ke liye saraapa hidaayat hai' (2:2) yani ye hamare Shiyo'n ke liye hidaayat hai."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p59)

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo shakhs hamare Dushmano'n aur hum par Zulm karne waalo'n ke Kufr mein Shak kare, wo khud Kafir hai."_

(Aeteqadaat - Shaikh Sadooq, p107)

📝

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Shak ke mauqe par kirdar aur guftaar se baaz rehna is baat se behtar hai ke apne aap ko khatre mein daala jaye. Aur aisi Hadees ka naql na karna tere liye behtar hai is surat mein Riwayat (forward) karne se ke iske tamaam ajza tere dimaagh mein mehfooz na hon."_

(Al Kaafi, v1, p104)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَظْهِرْ بِهِ مَا غُيِّرَ مِنْ حُكْمِكَ حَتّٰى يَعُوْدَ دِيْنُكَ بِهِ وَ عَلٰى يَدَيْهِ غَضَّا جَدِيْدًا خَالِصًا مُخْلِصًا لَا شَكَّ فِيْهِ وَ لَا شُبْهَةَ مَعَهُ وَ لَا بَاطِلَ عِنْدَهُ وَ لَا بِدْعَةَ لَدَيْهِ.*

(Salwat Abul Hasan Zarab Al Isfahani - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM ZAINUL ABEDIN (as)*

💐 *WILADAT MUBARAK* 💐

**********************************

    *15th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *11th January 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*MISSION KI TAYYARI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1393)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَوۡ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةࣰ وَلَـٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِیلَ ٱقۡعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلۡقَـٰعِدِینَ*

_"Agar ye nikalne ke khwahishmand hote to woh iske liye kuchh tayyari bhi karte lekin Khuda ko unka nikalna hi pasand nahi hai aur un se kaha gaya ke tum baithne walo ke saath baithe raho."_

(Surah Taubah: 46)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat mein un logon ka bayan tha jo shak mein mubtila rahte hai. Woh shak mein pade rahte hain aur kuchh tayyari nahi karte.

Agar sahi mein apne Ghaib Imam ka Intezar kar rahe hain, to Intezar khud amaadgi aur Tayyari ka naam hai. Sachcha Muntazir wohi hai jo har waqt apne Aqa ke liye tayyar rahe.

🚩

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jo Shak mein ulatta palatta raha to Shayateen ke sum use pamal kar denge."_

_"Is Ayat (9:46) mein *لَأَعَدُّوا۟* se murad "Niyyat" hai. Maqsad ye hai ke agar unka iraada nikalne ka hota to Dil mein nikalne ka qasd karte lekin unhone to aaj tak is tarah qasd hi nahi kiya."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Jab tum Hajj ka iraada karo to Safar ka samaan ki kharidari karo kyonki Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: "Agar unka iraad nikalne hota to woh uski tayyari to karte.(9:46)"_

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye mere Aaqa! Meri Aarzu badi aur mera amal bura hai. Pus, afw se kaam le kar meri Aarzu poori farma aur bure Aamal par meri giraft na kar, kyunki Tera karam gunah-gaaro'n ki sazao'n se bahut buland o baala hai aur Tera hilm kotaahi karne waalo'n ki sazaao'n se azeem-tar hai."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

 *16th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

  *12th January 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*FITNA GAR*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1394)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَوۡ خَرَجُوا۟ فِیكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمۡ إِلَّا خَبَالࣰا وَلَأَوۡضَعُوا۟ خِلَـٰلَكُمۡ یَبۡغُونَكُمُ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ وَفِیكُمۡ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لَهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمُۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ*

_"Agar woh tumhare saath Jihad par nikalte to tumhare andar kharabi ke siwa kisi cheez ka izafa na karte aur woh tumhare darmiyan Fitna pardazi ke liye daud dhoop karte aur tumhare andar aise log maujood hain jo in baaton ko kaan laga kar sunte hain (spy), Allah Zalimon ko achhi tarah Jaanta hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 47)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Ayat bhi guzishta Ayat se paiwast hai. Pahle kaha gaya ke Munafiqeen Jang mein na jaane ka bahana banate hain, Jang mein jaane ki koi tayyari nahi hai, lekin is Ayat mein zikr hai ke achha hua ye log Jang mein shamil nahi hai warna apas mein bahut Fitna barpa karte, Jasoosi karte.

Hame agah kiya gaya hai ke aise logon ko apne kam mein shamil nahi karna chahiye jiska Fitna ya Jasoosi ka andesha ho.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jo fitne ki aag bhadkayega wo khud uski lapett mein aa jayega."_

(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Fitna)

⚔

Imam Ali (as):

_"Meri Jaan ki qasam, (mustaqbil / bhavishya mein) aise fitne utth khade honge jinki aag mein Momin halaak honge aur gair-Muslim unse bache rahenge."_

(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Fitna)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ احْفَظْنِيْ مِنْ كُلِّ مُصِيْبَةٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ بَلِيَّةٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ عُقُوْبَةٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ فِتْنَةٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ بَلَاۤءٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ مَكْرُوْهٍ وَ مِنْ كُلِّ مُصِيْبَةٍ...*

(Dua e Mubahela Ramazan - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

   *17th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *13th January 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*FITNAGAR*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1395)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَقَدِ ٱبۡتَغَوُا۟ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلۡأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَاۤءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمۡ كَـٰرِهُونَ.*

_"Isse pahle bhi unhone Fitna angezi ki koshishen ki hain aur tumhe nakaam karne ke liye har tarah ki tadbeeren (Planning) ka ulat pher kar chuke hain yahan tak ke Haq aa gaya aur Hukm e Khuda Ghalib aa gaya aur ye log use na pasand hi karte rah gaye."_

(Surah Taubah: 48)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat mein Jang e Uhud ki ishara hai lekin iske matalib kul Ummat ke liye hain.

Munafiqeen (Hypocrites) har daur mein rahe hain aur Ummat mein yehi log Fitnagar hote hain. Guzishta aur aage aane wali Ayaton mein Allah inki kartooton ki bare aagah kar raha hai ke ye kis kis tarah ke harbe apnate hain. Inse koi khul kar to muqabila kar nahi sakta kyonki ye bhi hamare hamshakl nazar aate hain. Dushman hamesha inhi logon ko istemal karta hai. Saare Fitno ki jad yehi log hain. Lekin Allah ki Qudrat ke aage kisi ki nahi chalti aur aaj tak Allah inki tadbeeron ko na-kam karta aya hai..

Agar Jahiliyyat ke daur se murad len to Rasool Khuda (saww) ke aane ko Haq ka aana bataya hai.

Phir Duniya mein Zulm o Jaur urooj par pahunchega aur ek aur Nijaat Dahinda (Imam Mahdi (atfs) aayega aur Duniya ko Adl o Insaan se bhar dega aur awaaz aayegi Haq aa gaya aur Baatil chala gaya, phir saare Fitne bhi khatm ho jayenge.

Aaj ham jo inse bache hue is wajah sirf yehi hai ke Imam ka wujood baqi hai jo har waqt hamara nigehban hai. Hamara Imam Zinda hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

*قال الامام المهدى (عج):*

*إنا غير مهملين لمراعاتكم، ولا ناسين لذكركم، و لو لا ذلك لنزل بكم اللأواء و اصطلمكم الأعداء.*

_"Ham tumhari sarparasti aur dekh bhal mein kotahi (delay) nahi karte, aur tumhari yaad ko kabhi nahi bhulate, agar ham aisa na karte to tum par balayen aur musibaten nazil ho jaati aur Dushman tum ko bilkul neest o nabood kar dete."_

(Kamaluddin, Vol 2, P-441, H-12, Al Ghaiba Tusi, P-246, H-215, Biharul Anwaar, Vol 52, P-30, H-25, Vol 53, P-175, H-7, Ehtejaaj, Vol 2, P-323, Al Kharaej wal Haraej, Vol 2, P-903)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Teri Hujjat ke Ansaar mein shamil hone ki taufeeq ata farma.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *18th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *14th January 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

             ♦ _*MUNAFIQ*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1396)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنۡهُم مَّن یَقُولُ ٱئۡذَن لِّی وَلَا تَفۡتِنِّیۤۚ أَلَا فِی ٱلۡفِتۡنَةِ سَقَطُوا۟ۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِیطَةُۢ بِٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ*

_"Aur in mein woh bhi hain jo kahta hai mujhe rahne ki ijazat dijiye aur mujhe azmayish mein mat daliye. Sun rakho! Ye log Fitne mein hi to pade hue hain aur Yaqeenan Dozakh kafiron ka ahata kiye hue hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 49)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

_*Shaane Nuzool:*_

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) Jang e Tabuk ki tayyari kar rahe the tabhi Bani Salma Qabile ke Sardar Jadd bin Qais jo ke Munafiq tha usne kaha ke mujhe ijazat den ke mein Jang mein hazir nahi jaon aur yehin rahun kyonki mujhe Aurton se zyada pyar hai aur meri nazar Roman ladkiyon par padi to ho sakta mein unhe apna Dil de dun, uska ashiq ho jaon aur Jang se haath khech lun.

Uske is excuse par Paighambar e Akram (saww) ne ijazat de di tab ye Ayat nazil hui.

(Tafseer e Namoona)

👉🏻

Isse Munafiqeen ki ek aur khusoosiyat ki taraf ishara hota hai ke kaise woh apni zimmedari se bhagne ke liye bahane dhoondte hain. Allah ne in Munafiqeen ke liye Aag tayyar kar rakhi hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Main apni Ummat mein 3 cheezon se darta hoo'n:_

_(1) Aalim ki galati se,_

_(2) Munafiq se jo apne galat muddua (daawe) ka saboot Quran se pesh kare,_

_(3) Duniya se jo tumhari gardan maar de aur uska ilzaam (bhi) tumhare upar lagaye."_

(Khisaal, p94)

📝

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Munafiq ka Ilm uski Zabaan par aur Momin ka Ilm uske Amal mein hota hai."_

(Kirdaar Saazi, v2, p15)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ كُنْتَ خَلِيْفَتَهُ حَقًّا لَمْ تُنَازَعْ بِرَغْمِ الْمُنَافِقِيْنَ وَ غَيْظِ الْكَافِرِيْنَ وَ ضِغْنِ الْفَاسِقِيْنَ...*

(Ziyarat 27th Rajab - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *19th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

  *15th January 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*BHALAAI WA TAKLEEF*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1397)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِن تُصِبۡكَ حَسَنَةࣱ تَسُؤۡهُمۡۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡكَ مُصِیبَةࣱ یَقُولُوا۟ قَدۡ أَخَذۡنَاۤ أَمۡرَنَا مِن قَبۡلُ وَیَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُمۡ فَرِحُونَ * قُل لَّن یُصِیبَنَاۤ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰنَاۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡیَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ*

_"Agar Aapko koi Bhalai pahunchti hai to inhe nagawar guzarti hai aur agar Aap par koi Musibat aa jaye to kahte hain hamne apna mamla pahle hi durust kar liya tha aur woh khush o Khurram wapas chale jate hain."_

_"Aap kah den ke hame to bas wohi Bhalai ya Takleef pahunchegi jo Khuda ne hamare liye likhi hui hogi. Wohi hamara Sarparast hai, aur Ahle Imaan ko Allah par Bharosa karna chahiye."_

(Surah Taubah: 50 - 51)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat ki tarah is Ayat mein bhi Munafiq ki ek aur Nishani batayi gayi hai wo ye ke jab woh Rasool/Imam wa Islam ki Kamyabi par ranjeeda hote hai aur unki Musibat mein sochta hai ke ham to unse zyada hoshyar hain ke ham is takleef se bache rahe. Jabke Allah yahan takeed ye kar raha hai ke saari khushhaali wa Takleef ye sab Allah ne pahle hi likh di hai wo to hona hi hai. Bas Allah par Takawakkal karna hai Woh jis haal mein rakhe. Hamara farz hai ke Uske saamne apna Sar kham rakhen. Jitna zyada Uski Uboodiyat mein izaafa hoga utna hi Uski taraf se Bhalai mein bhi izaafa hoga.

👉🏻

Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi ke mutabiq is Ayat mein Bhalai se murad Maal e Ghanimat aur Aafiyat hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Takleef ka makhfi (secret) rakhna mardaangi ka saboot hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p44)

🕌

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jis qalb (Dil) mein khushoo (humbleness) na ho aur jis Aa'nkh se aa'nsu na nikle ho'n aur jis Ilm ka koi faayda na ho, usme koi khair o bhalaai nahi hai."_

(Adaab e Islami, v2, p60)

🕌

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jisme ye 4 aadaten hongi wo Allah Ta'ala ke Noor e Azeem mein hoga:_

_(1) Allah ke Yekta (Akele) hone aur mere Allah ke Rasool hone ki Gawaahi de ("Ash'hadu al La Ilaha Illallah Wa As'hadu Anna Muhammadar Rasulullah" kahe),_

_(2) Jab musibat aur Takleef ho to "Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Raajioon" kahe,_

_(3) Jab Bhalaai mile to "Al Hamdo Lillahi Rabbil Aalameen" kahe_,

_(4) Jab Gunah sar-zad ho to "Astagfirullah Wa Atoobu Ilaihi" kahe."_

(Khisaal, p120)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Bakshne waale! Tere hi Noor se humein hidayat mili. Tere fazl se hum malamaal hue. Aur Teri Rehmat ke saath hum subh o shaam karte hain. Hamare Gunah Tere saamne hain. Aye Allah!
