Hum Tujh se unki bakshish chaahte hain aur Tere huzoor Tauba karte hain. Tu Ne'mato'n ke zariye humse Mohabbat karta hai aur unke muqaabil hum Teri na-farmaani aur Gunah karte hain. Teri Bhalaai hamari taraf aa rahi hai aur hamari Buraai Teri taraf jaa rahi hai. Tu hamesha ke liye izzat wala badshah hai. Tere paas hamare bure Aamaal jaate hain, to bhi wo Tujhe hum par Apni Ne'mato'n ki baarish se rok nahi sakte aur hum par Apni ataaein badhaata rehta hai."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *20th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *16th January 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*BHALAAI KA INTEZAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1398)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلۡ هَلۡ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَاۤ إِلَّاۤ إِحۡدَى ٱلۡحُسۡنَیَیۡنِۖ وَنَحۡنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمۡ أَن یُصِیبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابࣲ مِّنۡ عِندِهِۦۤ أَوۡ بِأَیۡدِینَاۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوۤا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ*

_"Aap kah den tum hamare mutalliq jis baat ka Intezar kar rahe ho wo to hamare liye do mein se ek Bhalaai ki haisiyyat rakhti hai jabke ham tumhare liye is baat ke Muntazir hain ke Khuda Apni taraf se ya hamare Haatho se tumhe Azaab mein mubtila kare. Ab tum Intezar karo Ham bhi tumhare saath Intezar kar rahe hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 52)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat ki tarah is Ayat mein bhi Munafiq ka tazkara hai:

🕌

Allah Ta'ala ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se farmaya: _"Aap Munafiqeen se kah den jo is Amr ke Muntazir hain ke ya to unhe Fatah (Victory) milegi ya ye qatl ho jayenge. Ye dono baten hamare liye Bhalaai ka darja rakhti hain kyonki agar hamen Fatah mili to ham Kamyab rahenge aur agar bilfarz Kalma e Haq ke liye maare bhi gaye to bhi ye hamare liye nuqsandeh nahi hai Kyonki Shahadat hamare liye baes e iftekhar hai. Dono suraton mein hamara fayda hi fayda hai jabke hamen tumhare mutalliq do umoor mein se ek ka Intezar kar rahe hain. Hamen tumhare mutalliq Azaab e Khuda ka Intezar hai aur doosra Intezar ye hai ke Khuda hamare Haatho tumhe Azaab de."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as) ne apne Shiyon ko tasalli dete hue farmaya:

_"Tumhare Mukhalefin tumhare mutalliq do mein se ek baat ke Muntazir hain.  Pahli baat to ye hai ke tum Ita'at e Ilahi mein mar jaoge aur ye surat tumhare liye ek Bhalaai ka darja rakhti hai. Tumhare Mukhalefin tumhare mutalliq doosra Intezar ye kar rahe hain ke tum Zahoor e Imam (as) ko hasil kar loge aur ye baat bhi tumhare liye baes e ezaz hai jabke hame unke mutalliq do baaton ka Intezar hai. Pahla to ye hai ke Khuda Apni taraf se Azaab bhej kar unko maskh kar dega aur doosra Intezar ye hai ke Khuda hame un par Ghalba de kar unhe hamare Haatho se qatl kara dega. Allah Ta'ala ne Apne Nabi (saww) se farmaya (9:52) yahan *تَرَبَّصُ* Dushmano par Azmayish nazil hone ke Intezar ko kaha jata hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Isi tarah se woh Musalman jo Baddiyanati se Paak daman ho, do achhaiyon mein se ek ka Muntazir rahta hai ya Allah ki taraf se bulawa aaye ya is shakl mein Allah ke yahan ki Ne'maten hi uske liye behtar hain aur ya Allah ki taraf se (Duniya ki) Ne'maten hasil hon to is surat mein uske Maal bhi hai aur Aulad bhi aur phir uska Deen aur Izzat e Nafs bhi barqarar rahe."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Mere Aaqa! Tere Ehsaan aur Bhalaai se mujhe jo gumaan hai usko na jhutlaana kyunki Tu hi meri Jaa e E'temaad hai aur mujhe Apni taraf ke Sawaab se mehroom na farma ke Tu meri mohtaaji se waaqif hai."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *21st Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

     *17th January 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*AMAL BILA IMAAN*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1399)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلۡ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡهࣰا لَّن یُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمࣰا فَـٰسِقِینَ *  وَمَا مَنَعَهُمۡ أَن تُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفَقَـٰتُهُمۡ إِلَّاۤ أَنَّهُمۡ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ* وَلَا یَأۡتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا یُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كَـٰرِهُونَ.

_"Aap kah den tum apne Maal khwah raazi khushi kharch karo ya karahiyyat se, baherhal wo qubool na kiye jayenge. Tum yaqeenan Fasiq log ho."_

_"Unke kharch kiye hue Maal ke qubool na hone ki iske alawa aur koi wajah nahi hai ke unhone Allah aur Uske Rasool ka inkar kiya hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 53 - 54)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaton se Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka zikr jaari hai.

In do Ayaton mein do Alamaton ka zikr hai.

Pahli Ayat mein Pahli Alamat ye hai ke ye jo Allah ki Raah mein kharch karte the us mein khalis Allah ki Niyyat nahi rakhte the.

Iske alawa inki ek Alamat ye thi ke ye Hazrat Ali (as) se Bughz rakhte the.

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ki Qasam! Agar koi shakhs poori Zindagi Din ke Roze rakhe aur Raaton ko qayam kare aur phir Khuda ke huzoor hamari Vilayat ke baghair pesh ho to Khuda uska koi Amal qubool nahi karega. Khuda aise shakhs par naraaz hoga aur us par La'anat karega. (9:53) Imaan ke saath Amal nuqsaan nahi deta aur Kufr ki maujoodgi mein koi Amal fayda nahi deta."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Har wo Amal jo Khuda ke muntakhib Bando ke alawa kisi aur ke haathon nafiz ho to Bando ke zaati qayem kardah Hudood o Qawaneen, Rusoom aur unke Aeen o Dastoor ki koi ahmiyyat nahi, wo qabile qubool nahi hain. Agarche zahiri taur par un par Imaan ke Alfaaz ka itlaaq hi kyon na hota ho. Har woh shakhs jo Auliya e Ilahi ke Haq ka Munkir ho to uska Khuda par Imaan lana uske liye faydemand sabit na hoga aur uske Amal zaye ho jayenge aur woh Akherat mein nuqsaan uthane walon mein se hoga."_

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ حَبِيْبِ اللّٰهِ صَلَّى اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ بِوِلَايَةِ اَمِيْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ الْاَئِمَّةِ الْمَهْدِيِّيْنَ الصَّادِقِيْنَ النَّاطِقِيْنَ الرَّاشِدِيْنَ الَّذِيْنَ اَذْهَبَ اللّٰهُ عَنْهُمُ الرِّجْسَ وَ طَهَّرَهُمْ تَطْهِيْرًا رَضِيْتُ بِهِمْ اَئِمَّةً وَ هُدَاةً وَ مَوَالِيَّ سَلَّمْتُ لِاَمْرِ اللّٰهِ لَاۤ اُشْرِكُ بِهِ شَيْئًا وَ لَاۤ اَتَّخِذُ مَعَ اللّٰهِ وَلِيًّا....*

(Dua Amaal e Masjid e Kufa - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *22nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *18th January 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*NAMAZ & MUNAFIQ*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1400)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَا مَنَعَهُمۡ أَن تُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفَقَـٰتُهُمۡ إِلَّاۤ أَنَّهُمۡ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا یَأۡتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا یُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كَـٰرِهُونَ.*

_"Unke kharch kiye hue Maal ke qubool na hone ki iske alawa aur koi wajah nahi hai ke unhone Allah aur Uske Rasool ka inkar kiya hai."_

_*Ye Namaz bhi susti aur kaheli (Lazy) ke saath baja laate hain aur bedili se Raahe Khuda mein kharch karte hain."*_

(Surah Taubah: 54)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaat mein Munafiqeen ki do Alamaton mein se ek ka zikr kiya gaya tha ke Munafiqeen ke Amaal qubool nahi kiye jate. Uski ek wajah ye thi ke woh Ahle Bait (as) se Bughz rakhte hain.

Munafiqeen ki doosri Alamat hai Namaz mein susti.

Jabke Momin ki pahchan ye hai ke woh apne shauq o Ikhlaas ke saath Namaz ko ada karta hai.

Paighambar e Akram (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Munafiq Masjid mein yun tang hota hai jaisa ke Parinda Pinjre mein tang hota hai aur Momin Masjid mein yun khush hota hai jaisa ke Machhli Paani mein khush hoti hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Is Ayat se ye bhi maloom hota hai ke Munafiqeen khwah kitne hi bure the aur aaj bhi hain lekin woh Badbakht Taarakus Salaat nahi the aur ab bhi Namaz ke bahut paband hain. Na jaane aaj ke Be Namazi Musalman kaise hain jo Mahino tak Namaz nahi padhte phir bhi apne aapko Islam aur Maula ka shaidai kahte hain. Jiski Namaz guarantee ke saath qubool hone ki umeed ho woh to na padhe aur jiske koi Amaal qubool hone ka koi imkaan na ho woh Namazon pe Namazen padhe jaye, ye aql ke pare hai. Kyonki qubooliyat ki shart Wilayat e Ahle Bait (as) hai. Rasool (saww) ne kah diya hai jo Ahle Bait (as) se Bughz rakhega woh Munafiq hai.

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Namaz mein susti o kaheli se khade na hona aur apne Dil mein bure khayal na laana. Zahen mein ye tasawwur karo ke tum Khuda ke saamne khade ho. Bande ki Namaz ka wohi hissa qubool kiya jayega jo us ne Ikhlaas se ada kiya hoga."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Har Namaz ke waqt ek Farishta logon ko awaaz deta hai ke "Utho aur wo Aag jo tumhare liye raushan ki gayi hai use apni Namazo'n se bujhaao."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq , p461)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي صَلَّيْتُ هٰذِهِ الصَّلٰوةَ ابْتِغَاۤءَ مَرْضَاتِكَ وَ طَلَبَ نَاۤئِلِكَ وَ رَجَاۤءَ رِفْدِكَ وَ جَوَاۤئِزِكَ فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ تَقَبَّلْهَا مِنِّيْ بِاَحْسَنِ قَبُوْلٍ وَ بَلِّغْنِيْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الْمَأْمُوْلِ وَ افْعَلْ بِيْ مَا اَنْتَ اَهْلُهُ يَاۤ اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ۔*

(Dua - Amaal Masjid e Sahla - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *23rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *19th January 2019, Sunday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MAAL O AULAD K ZARIYE AZAAB*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1401)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَلَا تُعۡجِبۡكَ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لُهُمۡ وَلَاۤ أَوۡلَـٰدُهُمۡۚ إِنَّمَا یُرِیدُ ٱللَّهُ لِیُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِی ٱلۡحَیَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَـٰفِرُونَ*

_"Unke Amwaal wa Aulad (Wealth & Children) aapko hairat mein na dal den. Khuda ka iraada to yehi hai ke unhi ke zariye se unhi ki Duniyavi Zindagi mein Azaab de aur inkaare Haq ki haalat mein hi unki Jaane niklen."_

(Surah Taubah: 55)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

Ham ye dekh kar tajjub karte hain ke Munafiqeen ke paas Maal o Daulat bhi hai aur Aulad bhi. Ye dono cheezen agarche Ne'mat hain lekin kabhi kabhi jo kisi ke liye Nemat hai wohi cheez doosre ke liye pareshani ka sabab ban jaati hai.

Allah Kafir o Munafiqeen ko unke Nek Amal ka Sawab isi Duniya mein de deta hai aur Akherat mein unke liye kuchh nahi bachta aur unke Kufr ka Azaab bhi is Duniya mein de deta hai.

Agar Maal mein Barkat ho, Nek o Saleh Aulad ho to ye uske Nek Amaal ka Sawab hai jabke agar kasir Maal o Daulat ho lekin Barkat se khaali ho, Aulad ho lekin Nalayaq ho to ye uske liye Azaab hai. Ham Munafiqeen ke Amir wa Maldaar hote dekh tajjab to karte hain ke ham Momin hote hue bhi Gharib kyon, lekin hame ye nahi maloom ke ye Maldaar shakhs sukoon ki Zindagi mein hai ya woh ab bhi pareshan hai. Duniya mein har shakhs ko gaur se dekhen to hame bahut si misaalen mil jayengi, zahiran to woh bahut Amir nazar aayenge lekin unka hi Maal unke kaam nahi aata nazar aayega, Aulad chhod kar jaa chuki hogi, tanhai ki Zindagi, lachaar o bebas nazar aayenge.

Ye sab Allah ki taraf se hai Allah Apni Ne'mat de kar bhi usko Azaab mein mubtila karta hai.

Quran mein do tarah ki Ayaten maujood hain:

_"Maal o Aulad to Duniya ki hi Zeenat hai albatta baqi rahne wali Nekiyan tere Rab ke nazdeek az rue Sawab hai."_ (Kahf:46)

_"Aur Jaan lo! Tumhare Amwaal wa Aulad dar haqeeqat samaane Azmayish hain."_ (Anfal:28)

Is tarah aur bhi bahut Ayaat maujood hain.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Raavi se farmaya:

_"Mein tujhe Khuda ke Taqwa aur Raast Guftaari (Speaking Truth), Parhezgari aur Jaddo Jahed ki Wasiyyat karta hun aur Jaan lo ke is Jaddo o Jahed ka koi fayda nahi jis mein Parhezgari na ho. Khabardar! Apne upar wali ki taraf na dekho aur hamesha Khuda ke is farman par nazar rakho (9:55)"_

💰👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Imam Ali (as):

_"Maal Maut tak saath deta hai, Aulaad Qabr tak aur Aamaal Hashr tak."_

(Khisaal, Chap 3)

🤲🏻

*اِلٰهِيْۤ اَذِقْنِيْ طَعْمَ عَفْوِكَ يَوْمَ لَا بَنُوْنَ وَ لَا مَالٌ هُنَالِكَ يَنْفَعُ*

_"Mere Malik! Maal aur Aulad jab be sood hon to Tu Apne Karam zayqa mujhe chakhana."_

(Munajaat Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) Sahifa e Alwiyyah - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *24th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *20th January 2019, Monday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1402)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَیَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمِنكُمۡ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَـٰكِنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ یَفۡرَقُونَ *  لَوۡ یَجِدُونَ مَلۡجَـًٔا أَوۡ مَغَـٰرَ ٰ⁠تٍ أَوۡ مُدَّخَلࣰا لَّوَلَّوۡا۟ إِلَیۡهِ وَهُمۡ یَجۡمَحُونَ*

_"Aur woh Allah ki Qasam kha kar kahte hain ke ye tumhi mein se hain halanke ye tum mein se nahi hain. Ye to buzdil qism ke log hain. Agar woh koi jaye panah apna len ya unhe koi kho ya ghus jane ki jagah mil jaye to woh bhag kar is mein jaa chipenge."_

(Surah Taubah: 56 - 57)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka zikr jaari hai.

Is mein ek aur Alamat (sign)  ka zikr hai woh ye ke Munafiq Jhooti Qasmen kha kar apna Imaan jatayega, apne aap ko pakka Musalman kahega, jabke Dil mein bughz e Ahle Bait (as) rakhega aur unke Dushmano ko follow karega. Ye majboor qism ke log hain. Majboori ye ke Kufr ka izhaar nahi kar sakte, itni quwwat nahi ke apni Dushmani ka khullam khalla izhaar karen, jo bhi wajah ho ye buzdil qism ke log hain. Agar buzdil nahi hote to ye saamne aa kar muqabila karte. Buzdil itne hain ke agar inhe chhipne ki koi kho, Ghaar ya gehra  tahkhana mil jaye to wahan jaa chupen. Lekin Musalmano ke darmiyan rah kar inhe Musalmano ka khoon choosna hai isliye har jagah inka dakhal rahta hai. Musalmano ko baatne ka kaam inhi logon ne kiya hai. Is Ayat mein nihayat umdah tabeer ke taur par Munafiqeen ki Bughz o Nafrat ki wazahat ki gayi hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Ali (as)! Aap se koi Mohabbat nahi karega siwaye Momin ke aur koi Dushmani nahi rakhega siwaye Munafiq ke. Khuda Wande Aalam farmata hai, "Munafeqeen Jahannum ke aakhri tabqe mein honge." (4:145)"_

(Manaaqib Ameerul Mo'meneen (as), p386)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ كُنْتَ خَلِيْفَتَهُ حَقًّا لَمْ تُنَازَعْ بِرَغْمِ الْمُنَافِقِيْنَ وَ غَيْظِ الْكَافِرِيْنَ وَ ضِغْنِ الْفَاسِقِيْنَ...*

(Ziyarat e Mahe Rajab - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *25th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *21st January 2020, Tuesday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ATA E ILAHI PAR RAAZI RAHNA*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1403)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنۡهُم مَّن یَلۡمِزُكَ فِی ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ فَإِنۡ أُعۡطُوا۟ مِنۡهَا رَضُوا۟ وَإِن لَّمۡ یُعۡطَوۡا۟ مِنۡهَاۤ إِذَا هُمۡ یَسۡخَطُونَ *  وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ رَضُوا۟ مَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُوا۟ حَسۡبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَیُؤۡتِینَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥۤ إِنَّاۤ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَ ٰ⁠غِبُونَ.*

_"Aye Nabi! Un mein se kuchh log Zakat ki taqseem ke liye Aap par etraz karte hai, agar unhe us mein se kuchh de diya jaye to kush ho jate hain aur inhe is mein se kuchh na mile to naraaz ho jate hain. Kya hi achha hota ke Allah aur Rasool ne unhe jo kuchh diya tha woh us par raazi rahte aur kahte ke Allah hamare liye kafi hai. Anqareeb Woh aur Uska Rasool apne Fazl o Ehsaan se hamen ata karenge. Ham yaqeenan Khuda ki taraf raghbat rakhne wale hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 58 - 59)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafeqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

Is Ayat ka talluq Jange Naherwan se hai. AanHazrat (saww) Maale Ghanimat taqseem kar rahe the to kisi ne  kaha ke Adl se kaam len. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: _"Tujh par afsos! Mein Adl nahi karunga to kaun karega?"_

Umar ne kaha bolo to iski gardan uda dun!

Rasool (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Ise rahne do, anqareeb iski ek Jamat hogi. Inki Namazon ke saamne tum apni Namazo ko haqeer samjhoge aur inke Roze ke saamne tum apne Rozon ko qaleel samjhoge. Woh Deen se yun nikal jayenge jaise Teer Kamaan se nikal jata hai, jab tum uske Phal ko dekhoge to tumhe kuchh bhi dikhai na dega. Unka Parcham ek siyam fam (Black) shakhs ke haath mein hoga jiske ek haath par Aurat ki Pistaan ki tarah se Pistaan hoga. Jab woh khurooj (attack) karen to tum unhe qatl kar dena. Chunanche uske mutalliq ye Ayat (9:58) nazil hui."_

Abu Saeed khudri ka bayan hai ke mein Gawahi deta hun ke meine ye baat Rasoole Khuda (saww) se suni thi aur mein ye bhi gawahi deta hun ke Hazrat Ali (as) ne hi unhe qatl kiya tha aur Jange Naherwan ke mauqe par mein maujood tha aur us shakhs ki Laash layi gayi to uske haath par Pistaan maujood tha aur wo sab Nishaniyan maujood thi jo Rasoole Akram (saww) ne batayin thi.

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

💰

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Logon ki ⅔rd aksariyat is Ayat (9:58) ke misdaq hai."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Husain (as) se puchha gaya, "Maaldaari kya hai?"

Aap (as) ne farmaya,

_"Aarzuo'n ka kam hona aur jitna uske liye kaafi ho jaaye uspar raazi rehna."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p103)

👉🏻

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah ne farmaya, "Aye Adam ke bete! Jo kuchh tumhe ataa huwa hai uspar raazi raho, to tum sabse maaldaar aadmi hoge."_

(Miskhat ul Anwaar)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aaya main is teddi-meddi zabaan se Tera shukr adaa kar sakta hun? Ya amal mein koshish kar ke Tujhe raazi kar sakta hun? Aye Parwardigaar! Teri Hamd ke muqaabil meri zabaan ki kya haisiyat hai aur Ne'mato'n aur Ehsaano'n ke saamne mere Amal ka kya wazn hai? Mere Maabud! Teri Sakhawat ne meri aarzu ko badhaaya aur Teri Qadr-daani ne mere Amal ko qubool farmaya hai."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *26th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

*22nd January 2020, Wednesday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MASARIF E ZAKAAT*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1404)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلۡفُقَرَاۤءِ وَٱلۡمَسَـٰكِینِ وَٱلۡعَـٰمِلِینَ عَلَیۡهَا وَٱلۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَفِی ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلۡغَـٰرِمِینَ وَفِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِیلِۖ فَرِیضَةࣰ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ.*

_"Sadaqat (Zakat) to dar asl Faqeeron aur Masakeen ke liye hain aur un logon ke liye jo Sadaqat ke kaam par mamoor hon, aur unke liye jahan Dilon ki Ulfat matloob ho, aur Gardano ki azadi ke liye, aur Qarzdaron ki madad karne mein, Raahe Khuda mein, ghurbatzafah Musafiron ke liye. Ye Allah ki taraf se Fareeza hai. Allah Khoob Jannewala aur Sahibe Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 60)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

📚📖 🙇 💰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Jo Musalman aur Momin mar jaye aur Qarz chhod jaye basharte ke woh Israaf (Fuzool kharchi) ya Fasaad ki wajah se Maqrooz na hua ho to Hakim ka farz hai ke uska Qarz ada kare. Agar Hakim ne uska Qarz ada na kiya to woh Gunehgar hoga kyonki Maqrooz ke liye Allah ne Zakat mein hissa rakha hai aur wo hissa Hakim ke paas hai aur Hakim ne uska hissa ada na kiya to Gunehgar qarar payega."_

_"Allah ne Daulatmand ke Maal mein utni raqam farz ki hai jo nadaron ke liye kafi hai aur agar woh kafi na hoti to Khuda aur farz karta. Ghareeb is liye Ghareeb nahi ke Khuda ne unke liye hissa thoda muqarrar kiya hai. Asl baat ye hai ke Daulatmand tabqa unka poora haq ada nahi kar raha jiski wajah se unki Ghareebi khatm nahi hui. Agar unke huqooq poore ada karte to sab log khairiyat se Zindagi basar karte."_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Faqeer woh hai jo logon se sawal na karta ho, Miskeen woh hai jo isse bhi zyada buri halat mein ho Baais woh hai jo Faqeer aur Miskeen se zyada tangdast ho. Allah ne tujh par jo Amal Farz kiya use barmala ada karna, chhup kar ada karne se behtar hai. Aur koi shakhs apni Wajib Zakat alal Ailan logon mein taqseem kare to uska ye Amal behtar aur achha hoga."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ ابْتَاعُوْا بِخُمْسِكُمُ الْخُمُوْرَ وَ صَرَفُوْا صَدَقَاتِ الْمَسَاكِيْنِ اِلَى الْمُضْحِكِيْنَ وَ السَّاخِرِيْنَ وَ ذٰلِكَ بِمَا طَرَّقَتْ لَهُمُ الْفَسَقَةُ الْغُوَاةُ، وَ الْحَسَدَةُ الْبُغَاةُ.....*

_" Aapke Khums se Sharab khareedi, Miskeeno ke Sadaqat ko Maskharon par kharch kiya aur ye wo cheez thi jiska raasta unke liye gumrah Fasiqon aur Baaghi Haasidon ne hamwar kiya tha...."_

(Ziyarat e Jame - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *27th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *23rd January 2020, Thursday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*TALEEF E QALB*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1405)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلۡفُقَرَاۤءِ وَٱلۡمَسَـٰكِینِ وَٱلۡعَـٰمِلِینَ عَلَیۡهَا وَٱلۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَفِی ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلۡغَـٰرِمِینَ وَفِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِیلِۖ فَرِیضَةࣰ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ*

_"Sadaqat (Zakat) to dar asl Faqeeron aur Masakeen ke liye hain aur un logon ke liye jo Sadaqat ke kaam par mamoor hon, aur unke liye jahan Dilon ki Ulfat matloob ho, aur Gardano ki azadi ke liye, aur Qarzdaron ki madad karne mein, Raahe Khuda mein, ghurbatzafah Musafiron ke liye. Ye Allah ki taraf se Fareeza hai. Allah Khoob Jannewala aur Sahibe Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 60)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafeqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

💰 💞

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Fiqra *ٱلۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُ* woh log hain jo Khuda ko Waahid samajhte hon aur Ghairullah (Other than Allah) ki Ibaadat se dastbardar ho chuke hon lekin unke Dilon mein Risalat e Muhammadiya ki Ma'arefat dakhil na hui ho. Rasoole Khuda (saww) unki taleef e Qalb farmate the (Reconciliation & bringing of heart together) taake woh Ma'arefat hasil karke pakke Musalman ban jayen."_

_"Woh aisi Qaum hai jo Khuda ko Waahid maanti ho aur Ghair e Khuda ki Ibaadat chhod chuki ho aur Munh se Kalme ki Gawahi bhi dete hon lekin Nabi e Akram (saww) ki kuchh talimaat mein shak ho. Allah Ta'ala ne Apne Nabi ko Hukm diya ke woh unki Maal o Daulat se Taleef e Qalb karen, taake woh achhe Musalman sabit hon  aur jis Deen mein dakhil hue hain woh is mein pukhta ho jayen. Chunanche Nabi (saww) ne Jange Hunain ke mauqe par Quraish aur Qabile Hazar ke Sardaron ki Taleef e Qalb ki thi. Aap (saww) ne Abu Sufyan bin Harb aur Ainiya bin Haseen Al Farazi jaise afraad ko bahut sa Maal e Ghanimat ata kiya tha jiski wajah se Ansaar naraaz hue the aur unhone ne Sa'ad bin Abaada se is baat ki shikayat ki thi. Sa'ad ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se arz kiya jo Maal ki taqseem Aap ne ki agar Hukm e Khuda Wandi se hai to ham maante hain warna nahi. Allah ne unke noor ko khatm ki aur Taleef e Qalb ka ek hissa Sadaqat mein se kara diya."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Wo baat jo Dil se nikalti hai Dil mein jaa kar hi thherti hai aur agar ye baat sirf zabaan se nikli hogi to Kaano'n se aage na badh paayegi."_

(Tajalliyaat e Hikmat, p415)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِىْ فِىْ قَلْبِىْ نُوْرًا وَ بَصَرًا وَ فَهْمًا وَ عِلْمًا اِنَّكَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ ۔*

(Dua e Haafza - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *28th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

    *24th January 2020, Friday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*SADQA AALE RASOOL (saww) par HARAAM hai*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1406)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلۡفُقَرَاۤءِ وَٱلۡمَسَـٰكِینِ وَٱلۡعَـٰمِلِینَ عَلَیۡهَا وَٱلۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَفِی ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلۡغَـٰرِمِینَ وَفِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِیلِۖ فَرِیضَةࣰ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ*

_"Sadaqat (Zakat) to dar asl Faqeeron aur Masakeen ke liye hain aur un logon ke liye jo Sadaqat ke kaam par mamoor hon, aur unke liye jahan Dilon ki Ulfat matloob ho, aur Gardano ki azadi ke liye, aur Qarzdaron ki madad karne mein, Raahe Khuda mein, ghurbatzafah Musafiron ke liye. Ye Allah ki taraf se Fareeza hai. Allah Khoob Jannewala aur Sahibe Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 60)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

_*Sadaqat Aale Rasool (as) par kyon Haraam hai?*_

👉🏻

Imam Reza (as) ne Mamoon ke Darbar mein farmaya:

_"Allah ne jo cheez Apne aur Apne Rasool (saww) ke liye pasand ki wohi cheez Zul Qurba AanHazrat (saww) ke Qarabatdaron ke liye bhi pasand farmayi. Allah ne Khums ki is Ayat (8:41) *فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِی ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ*  mein sab se pahle Allah ka zikr kiya gaya hai. Phir Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka zikr kiya hai, uske baad Huzoor (saww) ke Qarabatdaron ka zikr kiya gaya hai. Yehi tarteeb Ayah e Ita'at (4:59) mein hai, yehi tarteeb Ayah e Wilayat (5:55) mein hai. Allah ne Fai, Anfaal, Khums, Ita'at aur Wilayat mein Khandan e Muhammad (saww) ko AanHazrat (saww) ke saath shamil rakha aur jab Sadaqat ke taqseem ki bari aayi to Allah ne is mein Apne Aap ko shamil na kiya aur na hi Apne Rasool (saww) ko aur na unke Khandan ko shamil kiya. Allah Aale Rasool (as) par Sadaqat ko Haraam qarar diya hai kyonki Sadaqat logon ke haath ka mail kuchail hai jabke Aal e Muhammad (as) har mail kuchail se Paak hain. Allah Aal e Muhammad (as) ko Taharat di aur unhe muntakhab kiya hai. Isi liye Allah ne unke liye wohi Pasand kiya jo Apne liye Pasand kiya aur unke liye wohi na-pasand kiya jo Apne liye na-pasand kiya."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

💰

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Bani Hashim ke liye Sadqa Haraam hai. Albatta do maqam par jayez hai: Jab pyase hon to Paani pi len aur unka apas mein bahami Sadqa unke liye Halaal hai."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

8⃣th

Riwayat ke mutabiq " *سهم* - Sehm (hissa)" ka itlaaq Aathve (8th) hisse par hota hai. Agar koi shakhs apni Jaedaad ke ek Sahem ki Wasiyyat kare to isse uski Jaedaad ka Aathvan hissa murad hoga.

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Isi liye Sadaat e Aale Fatema Zehra (sa) par bhi Sadqa Haraam hai. Syed ko Sadqa nahi de sakte. Syed Syed ka Sadqa le sakta hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jin Sadaqaat ke liye Allah ne farmaya hai ke agar tum unhe chhupa kar haajat-mando'n ko do to ye tumhare liye zyada behtar hai. Un Sadaqaat ka talluq Zakaat se nahi hai kyunki Zakaat chhupa kar nahi di jaati balke alal-ailaan di jaati hai."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p560)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي اشْتَرَيْتُ بِهٰذِهِ الصَّدَقَةِ سَلَامَتِيْ وَ سَلَامَةَ سَفَرِيْ وَ مَا مَعِيَ اَللّٰهُمَّ احْفَظْنِيْ وَ احْفَظْ مَا مَعِيَ وَ سَلِّمْنِيْ وَ سَلِّمْ مَا مَعِيَ وَ بَلِّغْنِيْ وَ بَلِّغْ مَا مَعِيَ بِبَلَاغِكَ الْحَسَنِ الْجَمِيْلِ۔*

(Sadqa de kar Safar ke liye nikalte waqt ki Dua - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *29th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *25th January 2020, Saturday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*RASOOL (saww) ko AZIYYAT*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1407)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنۡهُمُ ٱلَّذِینَ یُؤۡذُونَ ٱلنَّبِیَّ وَیَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنࣱۚ قُلۡ أُذُنُ خَیۡرࣲ لَّكُمۡ یُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَیُؤۡمِنُ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَرَحۡمَةࣱ لِّلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمۡۚ وَٱلَّذِینَ یُؤۡذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمࣱ*

_"Aur un mein kuchh log aise bhi hain ko Paighambar (saww) ko aziyyat dete hain aur kahte hain ke wo to mehez Kaan ke kachche hain. Aap keh den wo tumhari bhalai ke liye Kaan hain. Woh Allah par Imaan rakhta hai aur Ahle Imaan ki baaton par etemad karta hai aur woh tum mein se Sahib e Imaan ke liye sarasar Rehmat hai aur jo log Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko aziyyat dete hain unke liye Dardnak Azaab hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 61)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖 👂🏻

Ek Munafiq tha jiska naam Abdullah bin Nufel tha woh AanHazrat (saww) ki baaton ko sunta tha aur apne Munafiq rafeeqon ko chughli karta tha. Jibrael (as) ne Rasool (saww) ko iski khabar di to Aap (saww) ne iske bare mein usse sawal kiya to usne inkar kiya to Rasool (saww) ne uski baat par etemad kiya aur ainda ke liye tanbi ki. Us Munafiq ne apne saathiyon ko is baat se agah kiya aur kaha Rasool (saww) to nire Kaan hi Kaan hain (yaani Kaan ke kachche hain) yani sab maloom hote hue bhi jab isne inkar kiya to iski baat ko maan liya. Tab ye Ayat nazil hui.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

👂🏻

Rasoole Akram (saww) Hazrat Ali (as) ke Manaaqib (Praise) bayan karte hain phir Munafiqeen ke bare mein farmate hain:

_"Munafiqeen ne mujhe itni aziyyaten din ke unhone mera naam hi "Kaan" rakh diya. Aur mein chahun to un logon ke naam bhi le sakta hun aur agar mein unki taraf ishara karna chahun to bhi mein kar sakta hun lekin mein phir bhi unka bharam rakh raha hun aur aisa nahi karunga."_

(Ehtejaaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

😭

Jis tarah Munafiqeen ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko aziyyaten din usi tarah unhone unki Dukhtar Janabe Zehra (sa) ko aziyyaten din.

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne yehi farmaya tha jisne Janabe Zehra (sa) ko aziyyat di usne mujhe aziyyat di. Aur Janabe Zehra (sa) ne apni Shahadat tak us Munafiq se kalam nahi kiya, jabke Musalmanon ki aksariyat us Munafiq ki Pairokar thi.

(Sahih Bukhari)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ne is Ayat mein Nabi ki ek Sifat bayan ki ke woh Mo'meneen ki baaton par etemad karta hai lehaza jab Momin tumhare paas kisi baat ki gawahi de to tum bhi un par etemad kiya karo."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

 *اَنْتَ اِلٰهِیْ وَ سَیَّدِیْ وَ مَوْلَایَ اغْفِرْ لِاَوْلِیَاۤئِنَا وَ كُفَّ عَنَّا اَعْدَاۤئَنَا وَ اشْغَلْهُمْ عَنْ اَذَانَا وَ اَظْهِرْ كَلِمَۃَ الْحَقِّ وَ اجْعَلْهَا الْعُلْیَا وَ اَدْحِضْ كَلِمَۃَ الْبَاطِلِ وَ اجْعَلْهَا السُّفْلیٰ اِنَّكَ عَلٰی كُلِّ شَیْئٍ قَدِیْرٌ۔*

(Ziyarat Aminullah, Kamiluz Ziyarah - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *30th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

   *26th January 2020, Sunday*

🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1408)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ لِیُرۡضُوكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥۤ أَحَقُّ أَن یُرۡضُوهُ إِن كَانُوا۟ مُؤۡمِنِینَ *  أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن یُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدࣰا فِیهَاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡیُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_"Ye log tumhe raazi karne ke liye Khuda ki Qasmen khate hain halanke agar ye Mo'meneen hain to inhe Allah aur Uske Rasool ko raazi karne ki fikr karni chahiye thi. Kya inhe maloom nahi hai ke jo Allah aur Uske Rasool ka muqabila karta hai uske liye Dozakh ki Aag hai jis mein woh hamesha rahega. Ye bahut badi ruswai hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 62 - 63)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Ye dono Ayaton mein ek aur Alamat (Sign) ka zikr hai: Woh Jhooti Qasmen bahut khate hain ke Allah hamse Raazi hai, Allah unse Raazi hai. *رضى الله عنه* Har waqt Allah ko Raazi karne ki baat karte hain. Jabke jisne Rasool (saww) ko raazi kiya usne Allah ko raazi kiya. Aur Rasool (saww) ne farmaya ke jisne Janabe Zehra (sa) ko raazi kiya usne Rasool (saww) ko raazi kiya. Jo log sirf Allah, Allah karte hain aur Rasool (saww) ko apne jaisa bana lete hain woh log Paighambar (saww) ko Allah ke muqabile par khada karte hain. Allah aur Rasool (saww) ki Raza judagana nahi hai. In Munafiqeen ke liye Dozakh ki Aag hai aur ek badi ruswai hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Yaad rakho! Jisne Ali (as) se Mohabbat ki usne dar-haqeeqat mujh se Mohabbat ki aur jisne mujh se Mohabbat ki usse Khuda Raazi hua aur jisse Khuda Raazi hua use sile (badle) mein Jannat ataa karega."_

(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p16)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ۟اِلْاَوْصِيَاۤءِ الرَّاضِيْنَ الْمَرْضِيِّيْنَ بِاَفْضَلِ صَلَوَاتِكَ وَ بَارِكْ عَلَيْهِمْ بِاَفْضَلِ بَرَكَاتِكَ وَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ عَلٰى اَرْوَاحِهِمْ وَ اَجْسَادِهِمْ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّٰهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهُ۔*

(Dua baad az Namaz e Subh - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *1st Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *27th January 2020, Monday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1409)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَحۡذَرُ ٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقُونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ سُورَةࣱ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِی قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ قُلِ ٱسۡتَهۡزِءُوۤا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡرِجࣱ مَّا تَحۡذَرُونَ *  وَلَىِٕن سَأَلۡتَهُمۡ لَیَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلۡعَبُۚ قُلۡ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَایَـٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ.*

_"Munafiq is baat se khaufzada hain ke kahin koi aisi Surah nazil na ho jaye jo unke Dilon ke bhed khol kar rakh de. Aap keh den ke tum mazaaq mat udao, Allah us cheez ko khol dene wala hai jiske khulne se tum dar rahe ho. Aur agar inse poochho ke tum ye kiya baaten kar rahe the to woh fauran keh denge ke ham to hansi mazaaq aur dil lagi kar rahe the. Aap keh den kya tumne Allah aur Uski Ayaat aur Uske Rasool ka hi mazaaq udaya hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 64 - 65)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka silsilewar tazkara Qur'an mein in Ayyam mein isliye bhi ba ejaz jaari hai ke Janabe Zehra (sa) ka Qatil bhi ek Munafiq tha.

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) Jange Tabuk ke liye rawana ho rahe the to Munafiqeen apas mein mazaaq uda rahe the ke us waqt ka Super Power Rome se muqabile ke liye rawana ho rahe hain, koi bhi bach kar aane wala nahi. Ek Munafiq ne us mehfil mein ek aur tanz kiya yaar aisa mat kaho, kahin Allah Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko hamari baat se agah kar de aur ek aur Ayat nazil ho jaye aur hamara bhed khul jaye.

Ammar Yasir ke zariye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne unko paigham pahuncha diya ke Rasool (saww) ko sab khabar hai aur ye Ayat nazil bhi ho gayi.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Salman! Jo meri Beti Fatima (sa) ko dost rakhe, wo Jannat mein mere saath hoga aur jo Dushman samjhega wo Naar e Jahannum mein hoga. Aye Salman! Fatima (sa) se Mohabbat ka 100 jagaho'n par faayda hai ke sabse aasaan cheez Maut, Qabr, Meezan, Mehshar, Siraat aur Muhasiba (Hisaab Kitaab) hai."_

(Maarefat e Zahra (sa), p71)

🤲🏻

 *وَ سَخِرُوْا بِاِمَامِكَ* 

_"Khudaya! Un logon par La'anat farma jinhone Tere Imam ka mazaaq udaya hai."_

(Kitab Allama Majlisi, Misbahuz Zayer, Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

    *2nd Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *28th January 2020, Tuesday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1409)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَا تَعۡتَذِرُوا۟ قَدۡ كَفَرۡتُم بَعۡدَ إِیمَـٰنِكُمۡۚ إِن نَّعۡفُ عَن طَاۤىِٕفَةࣲ مِّنكُمۡ نُعَذِّبۡ طَاۤىِٕفَةَۢ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ مُجۡرِمِینَ*

_"Uzr mat tarasho. Tum Imaan laane ke baad Kufr ikhtiyar kar chuke ho. Agar Hamne tum mein se ek Giroh ko Ma'af kar hi bhi diya to doosre Giroh ko Ham zaroor saza denge kyonki woh Mujrim hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 66)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Guzishta Ayat (9:65) ki ek shaane nuzool pesh kiya. Usi Ayat ka ek aur shaane nuzool hai.

Imam Baqir (as) ki rivayat hai:

Ye Ayaat (9:65)12 Munafiqeen ke bare mein nazil hui jinhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Shahadat ka mansooba banaya tha. Rasoole Khuda (saww) Jange Tabuk se laut rahe the. Jab Aap (saww) ek Ghaati se ek patle raaste se guzarte to inki sazish thi ke Rasool (saww) ke Naqe (She-Camel) ko bidka denge aur Aap (saww) us khaee mein gir jayenge. Chunanche woh us Ghaati mein chhip kar baith gaye aur Naqe ko bidkane ke liye Teen wa Drum roll kiye lekin woh apne mansoobe mein kamyab nahi hue. Allah ne Jibrael (as) ke zariye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko khabar di. Us waqt Huzaifa aur Ammar Yasir Aapke saath chal rahe the. AanHazrat (saww) ne in 12 Munafiqeen ke naam Huzaifa ko bata diye is shart ke saath ke is ko raaz mein rahne dena. Aap (saww) se Huzaifa ne poochha ke Aap inko qatl kyon nahi kar dete. Aap (saww) ne farmaya ke Ahle Arab ye sunna pasand nahi karenge ke Muhammad (saww) ne apni kamyabi ke liye inhe qatl kar diya.

Unka mansooba yehi tha ke agar kamyab hue to thik warna keh denge ham to mazaaq kar rahe the.

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

In 12 Munafiqeen mein ek Zehra (saww) ka Qatil bhi tha.

Ayat (9:66) mein bhi Allah Munafiqeen ko phitkar laga raha hai ke koi bahana nahi chalega. Agar kisi ko uske Tauba karne aur Seedhi Raah par aane ke liye Ma'af kar diya to doosre Munafiqeen ko Allah nahi Bakhshega.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Huzaifa woh sahabi e Rasool (saww) the jo Aap (saww) Sachche Razdar the. Woh chunke Ahle Bait (as) ke bahut qareeb the, kaafi hadisen umki riwayat se milti hain. Unhone logon ko Hidayat di ke Musalmano tum us giroh ke saath rahna jahan Ali (as) rahen. Jab Janabe Zehra (sa) ki Shahadat hui to Aap (sa) ne Wasiyyat ki thi ke unke Janaze ko Raat mein le jaana. Mere Namaz e Mayyat wa Dafn mein kisi ko sharik na karna siwai mere bete Hasan o Husain (as), Abbas, Salman, Ammar, Miqdaad, Abu Zar aur Huzaifa ke.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Huzaifa! Mere baad Ali ibne Abi Taalib tum par Hujjat e Khuda hai. Ali (as) ka inkaar Allah ka inkaar hai. Ali (as) ki Wilayat mein gair ko shareek karna, Allah ke saath shareek banaana hai. Ali (as) mein shak, Allah mein shak hai. Ali (as) se udool (tauheen) karna, Allah se udool karna hai. Ali (as) par Imaan lana, Allah par Imaan lana hai, kyun ki wo Rasool (saww) ka bhai hai aur Rasool (saww) ka Wasi hai, Ummat ka Imam aur Maula hai. Wo Allah ki wo mazboot rassi hai jo toot'ne waali nahi hai. Ali (as) ke mutalliq 2 qism ke log halaak ho jayenge halaa'nki usme Ali (as) ka koi qusoor nahi hoga: Ek to Ghaali mohib aur dusra muqassir dushman. Aye Huzaifa! Ali (as) se juda na hona warna mujh se juda ho jaoge. Ali (as) ki mukhalifat na karna warna mere mukhalif ban jaoge. Ali (as) mujh se hai aur main Ali (as) se hoo'n. Jisne usay naraaz kiya usne mujhe naraaz kiya. Jisne Ali (as) ko raazi kiya, usne mujhe raazi kiya."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p123)

🤲🏻

*وَ بِاُمِّكَ فَاطِمَةَ سَيِّدَةِ نِسَاۤءِ الْعَالَمِيْنَ اَلَا لَعَنَ اللّٰهُ قَاتِلِيْكَ وَ لَعَنَ اللّٰهُ ظَالِمِيْكَ وَ لَعَنَ اللّٰهُ سَالِبِيْكَ وَ مُبْغِضِيْكَ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرِيْنَ وَ صَلَّى اللّٰهُ عَلٰى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ۔*

(Ziyarat e Mahe Rajab - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *4th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *30th January 2020, Thursday*

**********************************

  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1410)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ بَعۡضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡضࣲۚ یَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَیَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَیَقۡبِضُونَ أَیۡدِیَهُمۡۚ نَسُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِیَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقِینَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقُونَ *  وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقِینَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۚ هِیَ حَسۡبُهُمۡۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابࣱ مُّقِیمࣱ*

_"Munafiq Mard aur Munafiq Aurten sab ek doosre ke ham jins hain. Burai ka hukm deye hain aur Bhalai se mana karte hain aur apne Haathon ko Raahe Khuda mein kharch karne se rokte hain. Unhone Allah ko bhula diya hai, Allah ne bhi unhe Nazarandaz kar diya hai. Munafiq hi Fasiq hain. Allah ne Munafiq Mardon aur Munafiq Aurton aur Kuffar se Naare Jahannum ka Waada kiya hai jahan woh hamesha rahenge, wohi unke liye mauzun hai aur Allah ne in par La'anat ki hai aur inke liye qayem rahne wala Azaab hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 67 - 68)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Jaisa ke bata chuke hain Janabe Zehra (sa) ke qatil bhi Munafiq the.

Is Ayat mein Munafiq ke ek ye nishaani ka zikr hai ke inhone Allah ko bhula diya hai. Allah ki inke liye saza ye hai ke Allah bhi inko Nazarandaz kar dega. Allah kabhi bhoolta nahi. Balke usko uske haal par chhod deta hai.

👉🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Is Ayat ka maqsad ye hai ke unhone Duniya mein rehte hue Khuda ko faramosh (forget) kar diya aur Allah ki ita'at na ki. Allah ne unhe Qayamat mein Nazarandaz kar diya yani Allah ne unke liye Qayamat mein koi hissa na rakha aur unhe har Bhalai se Nazarandaz kar diya gaya hai."_

Arabi Mahavron mein 'Nisyaan' Bhoolne aur Nazarandaz ke maani mein istemal hota hai.

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) par Wahy ki ke Maal ki kasrat (excess / zyada paisa hone) se khush na ho. Mere Zikr ko har haal mein yaad rakho. Maal ki zyadati Gunaho'n ko bhula deti hai. Meri yaad ko chhorne se Dilo'n mein sakhti paida hoti hai."_

(Khisaal, p45; Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p174)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Mere Allah! Agar Tu ne mujhe zanjeero'n mein jakadd diya aur dekhti Aa'nkho'n mujh se Apna Faiz rok diya, aur logo'n ke saamne meri ruswaaiya'n zaahir kar di aur mere Jahannum ka hukm jaari kar diya aur Tu mere aur nek logo'n ke darmiyaan haail ho jaaye to bhi main Tujh se ummeed na todunga, Tujh se Afw o Darguzar ki ummeed rakhne se baaz na aaunga aur mere Dil se Teri Mohabbat khatm na hogi. Main duniya mein di gayi Teri Nemato'n aur Gunaho'n par Teri parda-poshi ko hargiz nahi bhool sakta."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *5th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *31st January 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1411)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كَٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ كَانُوۤا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمۡ قُوَّةࣰ وَأَكۡثَرَ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لࣰا وَأَوۡلَـٰدࣰا فَٱسۡتَمۡتَعُوا۟ بِخَلَـٰقِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِخَلَـٰقِكُمۡ كَمَا ٱسۡتَمۡتَعَ ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِكُم بِخَلَـٰقِهِمۡ وَخُضۡتُمۡ كَٱلَّذِی خَاضُوۤا۟ۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَـٰلُهُمۡ فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا وَٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرُونَ.*

_"Tumhari misal tum se pehle walon ki si hai jo tumse zyada taqatwar the aur woh tumse zyada Maaldar aur Sahibe Aulad bhi the. Phir unhone Duniya mein apne hisse ke maze loot liye aur tumne bhi apne hisse ke maze isi tarah loote jaise unhone loote the. Aur tum bhi waisi Baheson mein pade jaisi Baheson mein woh pade the. Unke Aamaal Duniya aur Akherat mein tabah ho gaye aur wohi log khasaara uthane wale hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 69)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Ab yahan is Ayat se Munafiqon ko Tarikh ka Aeena dikhaya jaa raha hai. Yaani Munafiq sirf Paighambar e Islam (saww) ke hi zamane mein nahi the balke guzishta zamane mein bhi aise afraad guzren hai.

Yahan inke liye do baaten pesh ki hai: Duniya se Muhabbat jis mein woh kamyab the. Lekin yehi log Akherat mein tabah ho jayenge.

Hamare liye bhi yehi sabaq hai. Ham jitna chaahe Duniya ke maze loot len lekin Akhirkar Akherat ka saamna to sab ko karna. Agar Akherat ke liye hamne kuchh nahi kiya to yaqeenan ham khasaare mein hain. (Surah Wal Asr)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs is Duniya mein bade maze ke saath behuda baaten aur gaali galoch karta hai, Jahannum mein uske Munh se puss aur khoon bahega."_

(Greater Sins 1, Qazaf)

👉🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Jo koi apne Momin bhai se Allah ki khaatir milne jaata hai to 70000 Farsihte uske saath jaate hain aur ek Farishta uski peethh pichhe kehta hai "Ye tum ne achcha kaam kiya, ab Jannat ke maze lena". Jab wo Momin usse Musafeha (hand-shake) karega, to woh Allah ki Rehmat mein doob jayega."_

(Miskhat ul Anwaar)

🤲🏻

*اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ الْحُجَّةُ عَلٰى مَنْ مَضٰى وَ مَنْ بَقِيَ وَ اَنَّ حِزْبَكَ هُمُ الْغَالِبُوْنَ وَ اَوْلِيَاۤءَكَ هُمُ الْفَاۤئِزُوْنَ وَ اَعْدَاۤءَكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُوْنَ...*

_"Mein Gawahi deta hun un logon par Hujjat hain jo guzar gaye aur jo baqi hain. Beshak Aapka group ghalib hain aur Apke Dost hi Faaiz hain, Aapke Dushman Khasaare mein hain..."_

(Ziyarat e Sabibul Amr (atfs) in Sardab - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *6th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *1st February 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1312)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَلَمۡ یَأۡتِهِمۡ نَبَأُ ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَوۡمِ نُوحࣲ وَعَادࣲ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوۡمِ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ وَأَصۡحَـٰبِ مَدۡیَنَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَـٰتِۚ أَتَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَیِّنَـٰتِۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِیَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوۤا۟ أَنفُسَهُمۡ یَظۡلِمُونَ.*

_"Kya unke paas unse pahle wale log Qaum e Nooh, Aad, Samood, Qaum e Ibrahim, Ashaab e Madyan aur Ulat di Jaanewali Bastiyon ki Tarikh nahi pahunchi. Jinke paas unke Rasool wazeh Nishaniyan le kar aaye the. Phir ye Allah ka kaam na tha ke un par Zulm karta lekin woh apne aap par khud hi Zulm karte the."_

(Surah Taubah: 70)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Guzishta Ayat se marboot Allah Munafiqeen ko tanbeeh kar raha ke unho pichhli Qaumon ko nahi dekha kis tarah Allah ne in par Azaab nazil kiya. Qaum e Nooh par Toofan aaya, Qaum e Aad (Qaum e Hud) par tez Aandhiyon se, Qaum e Samood (Qaum e Saleh) par Zalzale se, Ashaab e Madyan (Qaum e Shuaib) par Aag barsaane wale Baadal se, Qaum e Lut ki Bastiyon ulat se Allah ne Azaab diya. Jabke inko sabaq lene ke liye be Jaan Jism aur bosida Hadiddiyan mitti ke ya Paani ke niche maujood hain. Aise tarikhi waqe'at padh par Insaan ke Dilon ko hilane ke liye kaafi hain.

🌆

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ulat di gayi Bastiyam' *ٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَـٰتِۚ* se Qaum e Lut murad hai jinhe Khuda ne ulta diya tha."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🌆

Raavi ka bayan hai ke ham Hazrat Ali (as) ke saath Khwarij se Jang karne ke liye gaye the, jab ham sar Zameen e Babil (Babylon) par pahunche to Namaz e Asr ka waqt hua. Aap (as) apni sawari se utre aur log bhi apni sawari se utre. Aap (as) ne Irshad farmaya:

_"Logon! Ye Zameen Mal'oon hai. Is Dharti par 3 martaba Khuda ka Azaab nazil ho chuka hai."_

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Main apni Ummat ke liye na to Momin se darta hun aur na Mushrik se darta hun, kyunki Momin ka Imaan usko gumraahi se bachaa lega aur Mushrik ko uska Shirk tabaah kar dega. Albatta main apni Ummat ke silsile mein us Munafiq se darta hun jiski Zabaan Ilm ka mazhar nazar aaye, jo baat to Neki ki karta hai aur Amal burai ke karta hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p87)

🤲🏻

*یَا مَنْ نَجٰی نُوْحًا مِنَ الْغَرَقِ یَا مَنْ اَهْلَكَ عَادًا نِ الْاُوْلٰی وَ ثَمُوْدَ فَمَا اَبْقٰی وَ قَوْمَ نُوْحٍ مِّنْ قَبْلُ اِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا هُمْ اَظْلَمَ وَ اَطْغٰی وَ الْمُؤْتَفِكَۃِ اَهْوٰی یَا مَنْ دَمَّرَ عَلٰی قَوْمِ لُوْطٍ وَّ دَمْدَمَ عَلٰی قُوْمِ شُعَیْبٍ....*

_"Aye Woh Jisne Nooh ko doobne se bachaya aur Aad o Samood ko halaak kar diya aur baqi na rehne diya aur isse pahle Qaum e Nooh ko bhi halaak kar diya ke ye sab Zalim aur Sarkash the aur Ahle Ifk ko bhi tabaah kar diya. Aye Woh Jisne Qaum e Lut ko barbad kar diya, Qaum e Shuaib par Azaab nazil kar diya..."_

(Dua e Mashlool - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *7th Rabi us Sani 1441*

     *2nd February 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MOMIN & MOMINA*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1413)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِیَاۤءُ بَعۡضࣲۚ یَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَیَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَیُقِیمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَیُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَیُطِیعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۤۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ سَیَرۡحَمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِیزٌ حَكِیمࣱ.*

_"Momin Mard aur Momin Aurten sab ek doosre ke Madadgar hain. Woh Neki ka Hukm dete hain aur Burai se rokte hain aur Namaz qayem karte hain aur Zakat ada karte hain aur Allah aur Uske Rasool ki ita'at karte hain, un par anqareeb Khuda Rehmat karega. Yaqeenan Allah Ghalib aur Hikmatwala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 71)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiq ke opposite Momin hota hai. Ayat 67 mein jis tarah Munafiqeen ka zikr kiya gaya hai us tarah is Ayat mein Mo'meneen ka zikr kiya gaya hai. Munafiq aur Momin kaun hai ye ham kai bar zikr kar chuke hain.

👉🏻

Safwan Al Jamal ne Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya:

"Mere Maa Baap Aap par fida hon, ek Muslim Aurat mere paas aati hai jo ke mere Amal aur meri Nek Naami se agah hai aur mein bhi uske Islam aur uski Muhabbat e Ahle Bait (as) aur Aqeede Wilayat se waqif hun aur uske saath koi Mehram na ho to kya mein use Oont par sawar kar sakta hun?"

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Jab tumhare paas koi Musalman Aurat aaye to tum use sawar kar lo kyonki Momin Mard aur Momina khatoon ka Mehram hai. Phir ye Ayat padhi (9:71)"_

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Momin ka Chirag hamare Haq ki Ma'arefat hai aur badtareen Andhapan hamare fazl se Aa'nkhein band kar lena hai."_

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)

🕌

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Ali (as)! Aap se koi Mohabbat nahi karega siwaye Momin ke aur koi Dushmani nahi rakhega siwaye Munafiq ke. Khuda Wande Aalam farmata hai, "Munafeqeen Jahannum ke aakhri tabqe mein honge" (4:145)."_

(Manaaqib Ameerul Momeneen (as), p386)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Momin Momin ka bhai, uski Aa'nkh aur uska Rehbar hai, na uske saath Khayanat karta hai, na Zulm karta hai, na Milawat karta hai aur na Waada-khilaafi karta hai."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Momin mein 4 baaten nahi hongi: Paagal nahi hoga, logo'n ke darwaazo'n par bheek nahi maangega, zina-zaada (haraam-zaada) nahi hoga, usse Lawaat (sodomy) nahi ki jayegi."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p277)

🕌

Imam Ali (as):

_"Momin uske saath bhi insaaf karta hai jo uske saath insaaf nahi karta."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p137)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Momin ki haajat rawaayi 20 Hajjo'n se afzal hai."_

(Tafseer e Anwaar e Najaf, v2, p136)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اطْلُبْ بِذِحْلِهِمْ وَوِتْرِهِمْ وَدِمَآئِهِمْ وَكُفَّ عَنَّا وَعَنْهُمْ وَعَنْ كُلِّ مُؤْمِنٍ وَمُؤْمِنَةٍ بَاْسَ كُلِّ بَاغٍ وَطَاغٍ....*

(Salwat Mahe Ramazan - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *8th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *3rd February 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*MOMIN KA AJR O SAWAB*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1414)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَیِّبَةࣰ فِی جَنَّـٰتِ عَدۡنࣲۚ وَرِضۡوَ ٰ⁠نࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ*

_"Allah ne Momin Mardon aur Momin Aurton se Waada kiya hai ke Woh inhe aise Baghaat dega jinke neeche Nehren behti hongi aur woh is mein hamesha rahenge aur sada bahar Baghon mein unke liye Pakeeza Rihaishgahen hongi aur sab se badh kar ye ke unhe Khuda ki Khushnoodi hasil hogi, yehi bahut badi Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 72)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaat mein Munafiqeen ka Azaab dekha, ab Mo'meneen ka Ajr dekhiye:

👉🏻

Imam Zainul Abedin (as):

_"Jab Ahle Jannat Jannat mein jayenge aur Khuda ke pyare apne Baghaat o Masakin mein dakhil honge, har Momin Gao Takiye par takiya laga kar baith jayega to unke hashm o khuddam unhe gher lenge aur Jannat ke Mewe un par jhuk jayenge aur unke gird Jannat ke Chashme phoot rahe honge aur unke neeche Nehren beh rahi hongi aur unke liye Bistar bichh jayenge aur unke Khuddam kuchh talab karne ke qabl Ne'maat unke saamne pesh karne mein masroof honge aur unhe Hoor e Ain ke Jalwe mayassar honge. Jitni der Khuda chahega woh us haalat mein rahenge. Phir Khuda wand Jabbar unki taraf mutawajjah ho kar unse farmayega: "Aye Mere pyaron! Aye Mere Ita'at Guzaron! Aye Mere Jaware Quds mein Meri Jannat mein Rihaish pazeer Logon! Kya in Ne'maat se bhi badi Ne'mat ke mutalliq Mein tumhe khabar na dun?" Us waqt Ahle Jannat kahenge: "Parwardigar! Bhala isse badhkar aur Ne'mat kya ho sakti hai jo is waqt hamen poori tarah se mayassar hai. Hamen har wo Ne'mat mayassar hai jiski ham khwahish karte hain aur Tere Jawar e Quds mein hamari Ankhon ki thandak ka har samaan maujood hai." Allah Ta'ala phir Apni Baat ko dohraiga. Us waqt woh kahenge: "Ji haan Parwardigar! Teri Raza aur hamse Teri Muhabbat hamare liye tamam Ne'maat se behtar hai."_

Phir Imam (as) ne ye Ayat tilawat farmayi (9:72)

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Ahle Shura se kaha:

_"Tum logon ko Khuda ki Qasam de kar poochhta hun ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne ye nahi farmaya:_

_"Jo mere jaisi Zindagi jeene ka khwahish mand ho woh aur jo mere jaisi Maut marne ka mushtaq ho aur jo mere saath us Jannat e Adn mein rehne ka khwahish mand ho, jise mere Rab ne Apne Haath se kaasht kiya hai, phir 'Kun' kaha to wo ban gayi. Jise ye Sa'adat hasil karne ki khwahish ho, to woh Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) aur uske baad uske Ausiya se Muhabbat rakhe." Kye ye irshaad mere liye kaha tha ya tumhare liye?"_

Sabhi Ahle Shura ne kaha Aapke liye!!!

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Nabi e Akram (saww):

_"Adn - *عدن*" Allah ka wo Ghar hai jis jaisa Aankh ne dekha nahi hai aur kisi Insaan ke Dil ne iska tasawwur tak bhi kabhi nahi kiya. In mein Teen Tabaqat ke akawa aur koi Rihaish nahi rakhega. Is mein Anbiya, Siddiqeen aur Shohada ki rihaish hogi. Allah farmata hai: "Uske liye Khush khabari hai jo tujh mein dakhil ho."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Parwardigaar! Teri Hamd ke muqaabil meri Zabaan ki kya haisiyat hai aur Ne'mato'n aur Ehsaano'n ke saamne mere amal ka kya wazn hai? Mere Ma'bood! Teri sakhawat ne meri Aarzoo ko badhaaya aur Teri Qadr-daani ne mere amal ko qubool farmaya hai."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *9th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *4th February 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                 ♦ _*JIHAAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1415)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلنَّبِیُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقِینَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِیرُ.*

_"Aye Nabi! Kuffar aur Munafiqeen se Jihaad kijiye  aur un par sakhti kijiye. Akhirkar unka thikana Dozakh hai jo Badtareen thikana hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 73)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ka tazkara jaari hai.

📖

Is Ayat mein AanHazrat (saww) ko do tabaqat se Jihaad ka Hukm diya hai: Kuffar aur Munafiqeen se. Aap (saww) ne Kuffar se Talwar se Jihaad kiya, jabke Munafiqeen se Talwar ki bajaye Zabaan se Jihaad kiya. AanHazrat (saww) ne Munafiqeen se kabhi Jang nahi ki kyonki unka Kufr Baatini tha.

Aimma (as) ki Tafseer mein *ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقِینَ* ke beech ka waw *و* Waw e Atf - *واو عطف* nahi hai, balke *مع* hai.

👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ne Apne Paighambar (saww) ko Hukm diya tha ke jab woh Kuffar se Jang ke liye jaayen to Munafiqeen ko bhi apne saath le kar jayen. AanHazrat (saww) ne poori Zindagi Munafiqeen se Jang nahi ki thi. Iske baraks (on the contrary) Aap unki Taleef e Qalf farmaya karte the."_

_"Munafiqeen se Jihaad ka ek mafhoom ye bhi hai ke Allah ne AanHazrat (saww) ko Hukm diya ke Aap un par faraez aaed karke unse Jihaad karen."_

_"Is Ayat ke ek hisse par Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne amal kiya tha aur doosre hisse par Hazrat Ali (as) ne amal kiya tha aur Hazrat Ali (as) ka Jihaad bhi dar asl Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka hi Jihaas tha."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Amali e Tusi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 ⚔

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Afzal jihad khwaishaat ke khilaaf Nafs ki jihad hai aur Dunyavi lazzato'n ko chhorna (Jihad) hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

⚔

Imam Ali (as)

Raah e Khuda mein apne haatho'n se Jihad karo. Agar aisa nahi kar sakte to apni zabaano'n se Jihad karo. Aur agar ye bhi nahi kar sakte to phir apne dil se Jihad karo.

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2, p209)

🤲🏻

*اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ يَاۤ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ جَاهَدْتَ فِيْ اللّٰهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِ حَتّٰى دَعَاكَ اللّٰهُ اِلٰى جِوَارِهِ وَ قَبَضَكَ اِلَيْهِ بِاخْتِيَارِهِ وَ اَلْزَمَ اَعْدَاۤءَكَ الْحُجَّةَ بِقَتْلِهِمْ اِيَّاكَ لِتَكُوْنَ الْحُجَّةُ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ مَعَ مَا لَكَ مِنَ الْحُجَجِ الْبَالِغَةِ عَلٰى جَمِيْعِ خَلْقِهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَاۤ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ عَبَدْتَ اللّٰهَ مُخْلِصًا وَ جَاهَدْتَ فِيْ اللّٰهِ صَابِرًا...*

(Ziyarat Aminullah - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *10th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *5th February 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*JHOOTE MUNAFIQEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1416)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَلَقَدۡ قَالُوا۟ كَلِمَةَ ٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بَعۡدَ إِسۡلَـٰمِهِمۡ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِمَا لَمۡ یَنَالُوا۟ۚ وَمَا نَقَمُوۤا۟ إِلَّاۤ أَنۡ أَغۡنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۚ فَإِن یَتُوبُوا۟ یَكُ خَیۡرࣰا لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن یَتَوَلَّوۡا۟ یُعَذِّبۡهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِیمࣰا فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا وَٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِۚ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن وَلِیࣲّ وَلَا نَصِیرࣲ.*

_"Ye log Khuda ki Qasam kha kar kehte hain ke hamne wo baat nahi kahi. Halanke unhone zaroor wo Kafirana baat kahi hai aur Islam laane ki baad unhone Kufr kiya hai aur unhone wo iraada kiya tha jise wo hasil na kar sake. Unhe ghussa hai to is baat par ke Allah aur Rasool ne apne fazl se unhe ghani kar diya hai. Ab agar woh Tauba kar len to unke Haq mein behtar hai. Aur agar woh Munh pher len to Allah un par Duniya aur Akherat mein Dardnak Azaab nazil karega aur rue Zameen par unka koi Sarparast aur Madadgar na hoga."_

(Surah Taubah: 74)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Is Ayat se woh log murad hain jinhe ne Ka'abe mein baith kar Qasam khayi thi ke Khilafat Bani Hashim mein nahi jane denge. Chunanche ye Kalma e Kufr tha. Inhi log ne Jange Tabuk se wapsi mein Rasool (saww) ko shaheed karne ki koshish ki thi.

Ayat (Mujadelah:18) ki zel mein mazkoor hai ke jab Qayamat ka Din hoga, Allah Ta'ala un afraad ko jama karega jinhone Aale Muhammad (as) ke Huqooq ghasb kiye. Unke Aamaal unke saamne pesh kiye jayenge to woh Khuda ki Qasam khaa kar kahenge ke hamne ye amal nahi kiya. Isi tarah unhone AanHazrat (saww) ke saamne jhooti Qasam khayi thi jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko Shaheed karne ka mansooba banaya tha. Ye unke Kufr ke kalemat the.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Raavi ka bayan hai ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ghadeer ke Maidan mein Ali (as) ki Wilayat ka Ailaan kiya. Sab sun kar chale gaye. Sirf Rasool (saww) ke Tent mein Sahabi Huzaifa saath the. Pados ke Tent mein 3 log the jo apas mein baat kar rahe the jisko Huzaifa ne sun liya. Woh Rasool (saww) aur Ali (as) ke bare mein nazeba alfaaz kah rahe the. Unke nazeba Kalemat sun kar Huzaifa ko ghussa aa gaya. Aur ye sab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko khabar karne ke liye kaha, to unhone kaha ke ham Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Khuda ki Qasam khaa kar kah denge ke hamne kaha hi nahi. Us waqt ye Ayat nazil hui.

Hazrat Ali (as):

"Ye jo chahe kahte phiren meri Pasliyon mein mera Dil hai aur meri Talwar meri Gardan mein maujood hai. Agar ye kuchh iraada kar sakte hain to jawab mein mein bhi iraada kar sakta hun."

Jibrael (as) ne Rasool (saww) se farmaya ke Aap Ali (as) ko aane wale halaat se agah kar den. To Aap (saww) ne khabar di to Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Agar Taqdeer e Khuda yehi hai to phir mein bhi Taqdeer ke Faisle par Sabr karunga."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Meri ummat ke taajir (businessmen) (dhande mein) sachchi jhooti qasam khaane ki wajah se balaao'n mein ghir jayenge."_

(Rizq - Haji Naji)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَاۤ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اٰمَنْتَ بِاللّٰهِ وَ هُمْ مُشْرِكُوْنَ وَ صَدَّقْتَ بِالْحَقِّ وَ هُمْ مُكَذِّبُوْنَ وَ جَاهَدْتَ [فِيْ اللّٰهِ‏] وَ هُمْ مُحْجِمُوْنَ [مُجْمِحُوْنَ‏] وَ عَبَدْتَ اللّٰهَ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ الدِّيْنَ صَابِرًا مُحْتَسِبًا حَتّٰى اَتَاكَ الْيَقِيْنُ اَلَا لَعْنَةُ اللّٰهِ عَلَى الظَّالِمِيْنَ.*

(Ziyarat Aminullah - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *11th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *6th February 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                  ♦ _*RIZQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1417)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ عَـٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَىِٕنۡ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِینَ *  فَلَمَّاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ.*

_"In mein baaz aise bhi hain jinhone Allah se Ahd kiya tha ke agar Usne Apne Fazl se hamko Nawaza to ham Uski Raah mein Sadaqa denge aur ham Saleh ban kar rahenge. Magar jab Allah ne Apne Fazl se unko Daulatmand bana diya to woh Bukhl par utar aaye aur Kinarakash ho kar palat gaye."_

(Surah Taubah: 75 - 76)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

In Ayat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Thaleba bin Khatib Ansari ki mazammat ki hai. Woh pahle intehai Muflis tha. Usne Ahd kiya ke agar Allah ise Rizq ki farawani dega to woh Zakat o Sadaqat ki pabandi karega. Lekin jab Allah ne use Rizq ata kiya to woh apne Ahd par qayem nahi reh saka, usne Bukhl (Kanjoosi) se kaam liya.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Thaleba ne Rizq ke liye Dua karne ke liye request ki to Aap (saww) usse farmaya:

_"Thaleba wo kam Rizq jiska tu Shukr ada kar sake wo us zyada Rizq se behtar hai jiska tumse Shakr ada na ho sake. Kya mein tere liye Uswa e Kamil (Perfect Roll Model) nahi hun? Mujhe Us Zaat ki Qasam jiske Qabza e Qudrat mein meri Jaan hai, agar mein iraada kar lun to ye Pahad Sone aur Chaandi ke ho jayen aur mere saath chalne lag jayen."_

Uske israar par Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Dua ki aur Dua qubool hui. Uske ghar Bakriyan thi, woh Bachcho pe Bachche paida karne lagi, itne Bachche hue ke use Medina chhota padne laga aur woh Madine ke bahar chala gaya. Jab zyada ifraat ho gayi to Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne kisi Numainde ko Zakat lene bheja to Jawab mila ye to Jizya Tax ki tarah hai aur inkar kar diya. Ye Jawab sun kar Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko afsos hua aur ye Ayat uske mazammat mein nazil hui."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jis mein ye 3 Nishaniya'n hon wo shakhs Munafiq (Hypocrite) hai, chaahe woh Roze rakhta ho, Namaz padhta ho aur apne aap ko Musalman samajhta ho:_

_(1) Amaanat mein Khayanat kare,_

_(2) Jab bole to Jhoot bole aur_

_(3) Jab Waada kare to Waada khilaafi kare."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v3, p605)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ اجْعَلْ يَا رَبِّ رِزْقَكَ لِيْ وَاسِعًا وَ مَطْلَبَهُ سَهْلًا وَ مَأْخَذَهُ قَرِيْبًا وَ لَا تُعَنِّنِي بِطَلَبِ مَا لَمْ تُقَدِّرْ لِي فِيْهِ رِزْقًا فَاِنَّكَ غَنِيٌّ عَنْ عَذَابِيْ [عَنَاۤئِي‏] وَ اَنَا فَقِيْرٌ اِلٰى رَحْمَتِكَ فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ جُدْ عَلٰى عَبْدِكَ بِفَضْلِكَ اِنَّكَ ذُوْ فَضْلٍ عَظِيْمٍ۔*

_"Khudaya! Mujhe nahi maloom ke mere Rizq ki manzil kiya hai. Mein to sirf un khayalat ke peechhe daudta raha jo mere Dil mein paida hote hain, chunanche is raah mein shaher shaher ke chakkar lagata hun aur mein apne maqsood ke liye hairan o pareshan hun. Mujhe nahi maloom hai ke mera Rizq Saihrah mein hai ya Pahad par, Zameen mein ya Asmaan par, Khushki mein ya Darya mein kiske haathon mein hai. Kiski taraf se aane wala hai. Haan ye jaanta hun ke iska Ilm Tere paas hai aur iske Asbaab bhi Tere hi haathon mein hain. Tu hi Apne Lutf se ise taqseem karta hai aur Apni Rehmat se iske Asbaab paida karta hai. Khudaya! Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) par Rehmat nazil farma aur Apne Rizq ko mere liye wasee bana de aur mujhe aise kisi Rizq ki justaju ki zehmat mein na dal dena jo Tu ne mere liye muqarrar nahi kiya hai isliye ke Tu mere Azaab se Be Niyaz hai aur mein Teri Rehmat ka Mohtaj hun."_

(Dua e Rizq baad Namaz e Isha - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *12th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

      *7th February 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                ♦ _*NIFAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1418)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَأَعۡقَبَهُمۡ نِفَاقࣰا فِی قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ یَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ بِمَاۤ أَخۡلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡذِبُونَ *  أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ یَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلۡغُیُوبِ*

_"Unke Bukhl (Kanjoosi) ne unke Dilon mein Nifaaq raasikh kar diya hai jo Khuda ke huzoor peshi ke Din tak unka peechha na chhodega kyonki unhone Khuda se Waada Khilaafi ki hai aur is ka sabab ye bhi hai ke woh Jhoot bolte the. Kya unhe ye baat maloom nahi hai ke Allah ko unke Makhfi Raaz aur Poshida sargarmiya (Hidden Secrets & Activities) Maloom hain aur Yaqeenan Allah Ghaib ki tamam baaton ko Jannewala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 77 - 78)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Guzishta Ayat se marboot ye Ayat mein bhi usi Munafiq zikr hai jisne Rizq milne par Sadaqat, Charity ka Waada to kiya par nibhaya nahi. Ab koi Khuda se Waada Khilaafi kare to uska kya hashr hoga ye samajhne ki zaroorat hai. Munafeqeen ko Khuda ke saamne peshi deni hai.

👉🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Qur'an Majeed mein jahan jahan 'Leqae Rab - Meeting with Lord' jaisi Ayaton mein 'لقاء - Leqa' se murad Mulaqaat nahi hai jis mein Ro'yat - dekhna shamil hoti ho. 'Leqa' means Khuda ke Huzoor mein Peshi murad hai."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jis mein 4 aadaten paayi jayengi woh Munafiq hai:_

_(1) Jab baat kare to Jhoot bole._

_(2) Waada kare to Waada Khilaafi kare._

_(3) Moaeda kare to Ghaddari kare._

_(4) Kisi se jhagda kare to Galiyaan de."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🎷🥁

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_" *Gina* / *Music* Dil mein Nifaaq (Hypocrisy) ko yun ugaati hai jaise Paani Sabzi-Tarkaari ko."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 7, p437)

🤲🏻

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

_'Aye Ma'bood! Hum aisi barkat waali Hukumat ki khaatir Teri taraf raghbat rakhte hain jisse Tu Islam aur Ahl e Islam ko Quwwat de, aur Nifaaq aur Ahle Nifaaq ko zaleel kare. Aur us Hukumat mein humen Apni ita'at ki taraf bulaane waale aur Apni rehnumaai karne waale qaraar de. Aur uske zariye humein duniya aur Akherat ki izzat de."_

(Dua e Iftitaah)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATES WAFAT OF UMMUL BANEEN (as)*

**********************************

     *13th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *8th February 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*KHAIR KHWAHON KA MAZAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1419)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلَّذِینَ یَلۡمِزُونَ ٱلۡمُطَّوِّعِینَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ فِی ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِینَ لَا یَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهۡدَهُمۡ فَیَسۡخَرُونَ مِنۡهُمۡ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمٌ.*

_"Woh log jo Raahe Khuda mein farakh Dili se hissa lene wale Mo'meneen aur un Ghareebon par jinke paas unki Mehnat ke alawa kuchh nahi hai ilzaam lagate hain phir unka Mazaaq udate hain, Allah un Mazaaq udane walon ka Mazaaq udata hai aur unke liye Dardnak Azaab hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 79)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Jab Nabi e Akram (saww) ne Ghazwa Tabuk ke liye Maali Ta'awun ka sawal kiya to Mo'meneen ne farakh Dili se madad ki aur mazdooron ne apni aadhi mazdoori de di. Ye dekh kar Munafiqeen kudhne lage. Ta'awun karne walon ka mazaq udate kahte ye shohrat pasand hain, Riyakar hain aur Ghareeb madad karta to kahte itni si raqam kya Jang jeet lenge. Is tarah ek Sahabi ne Khajooron ka atya kiya to Munafiqeen kahne lage Allah to Bada Ghani hai in Khajooron ka kiya karega.... waghaira.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Hazrat Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) ne ek shakhs ko Khajooron ki ujrat par Paani pilaya aur har Dol ke badle ek Khajoor ka dana ujrat tay kiya. Jab Aap (as) ko mazdoori mili to Aap (as) mazdoori ki Khajooren le kar Paighambar e Akram (saww) ki khidmat mein aaye aur arz kiya: Ya Rasoolallah! Ye Khajooren meri taraf se qubool farmayen. Us waqt Ibne Auf Darwaze par khada tha, usne aitraz kiya to ye Ayat (9:79) nazil hui.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Imam Reza (as):

_"Allah Mazaaq nahi karta, kisi ka thattha nahi udata, Woh Makar nahi karta, Woh kisi ko dhoka nahi deta albatta Allah un afa'al (action) ki Jaza deta hai. Allah isse kahin Buland o Bartar hai jo Zalim log Uske mutalliq bayan karte hain."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha gaya kaunsa Sadaqa afzal hai? Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Ek Muflis ki Khairat sab se afzal hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Imam Hasan (as):

_"Mazaaq haibat (awe / roab) ko khatm kar deta hai aur khamosh insaan ki haibat zyada hoti hai."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p85)

**********************************

◼ _*JANABE UMMUL BANEEN*_ ◼

Riwayat

Madina e Munawwara mein mukhaddaraat e ismat ke pahu'nchne ke baad Majlis e Gham ka silsila shuru huwa. Sab se pehli Majlis J. Ummul Baneen maadar e H. Abbas (as) ke ghar mein munaqqid huwi. Phir doosri Majlis J. Fatima Sughra ke ghar munaqqid ki gayi. Phir teesri Majlis Imam Hasan (as) ke ghar munaqqid ki gayi. Phir Muhammad e Hanafia ke ghar Majlis munaqqid huwi. Phir Rauza e Rasul (saww) par Majlis munaqqid ki gayi…"

(Fazaail al H. Abbas (as), p374)

🤲🏻

_*Marsiya by Ummul Baneen (sa):*_

*يَا مَنْ رَاَى الْعَبَّاسَ كَرَّ عَلَى جَمَاهِيْرِ النَّقَدِ*

*وَ وَرَاهُ مِنْ اَبْنَاۤءِ حَيْدَرَ كُلُّ لَيْثٍ ذِيْ لَبَدٍ*

*اُنْبِئْتُ اَنَّ ابْنِيْ اُصِيْبَ بِرَأْسِهِ مَقْطُوْعَ يَدٍ*

*وَيْلِيْ عَلٰى شِبْلِيْ اَمَالَ بِرَأْسِهِ ضَرْبُ الْعَمَدِ*

*لَوْ كَانَ سَيْفُكَ فِيْ يَدَيْكَ لَمَا دَنَا مِنْهُ اَحَدٌ*

*وَلھٰا ایْضاً*

*لَا تَدْعُوَنِّيْ وَيْكِ اُمَّ الْبَنِيْنَ تُذَكِّرِيْنِيْ بِلُيُوْثِ الْعَرِيْنِ*

*كَانَتْ بَنُوْنَ لِيْ اُدْعٰى بِهِمْ وَ الْيَوْمَ اَصْبَحْتُ وَ لَا مِنْ بَنِيْنَ*

*اَرْبَعَةٌ مِثْلُ نُسُوْرِ الرُّبٰى قَدْ وَاصَلُوْا الْمَوْتَ بِقَطْعِ الْوَتِيْنِ*

*تَنَازَعَ الْخِرْصَانُ اَشْلَاۤءَهُمْ فَكُلُّهُمْ اَمْسٰى صَرِيْعًا طَعِيًنَ*

*يَا لَيْتَ شِعْرِيۤ اَ كَمَاۤ اَخْبَرُوْا بِاَنَّ عَبَّاسًا قَطِيْعُ الْيَمِيْنِ*

(Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *14th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

    *9th February 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                  ISTEGHFAR

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1420)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ أَوۡ لَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ إِن تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ سَبۡعِینَ مَرَّةࣰ فَلَن یَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یَهۡدِی ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقِینَ.*

_"Aap unke liye Maghferat talab karen ya na karen, agar tum 70 martaba bhi Ma'af karne ki darkhwast karoge to Allah unhe hargiz Ma'af nahi karega. Iska sabab ye hai ke unhone Allah aur Uske Rasool ka inkaar kiya hai aur Allah Fasiq logon ko Hidayat nahi karta."_

(Surah Taubah: 80)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat 70 martaba se murad 70 martaba nahi balke zyad bar mein Arab Mohavre ke taur istemal hua hai. Jaise ham kahte hain 'agar tum hazaar bar bhi bolo to nahi karunga.' Ye Mohavara hai.

👉🏻

Imam Reza (as):

_"(Rasoole Khuda (saww) itne Meherban the ke) Allah ne unse keh diya tha ke agar Aap Munafiqeen ke liye 70 martaba bhi Maghferat talab karen to bhi Khuda unhe Ma'af nahi karega."_

Surah Munafeqoon mein bhi is baat ko dohraya hai. Na unke liye Namaz padhen, na unki Qabr par khade hun. In Ayat ke nazil hone ke baad Rasoole Khuda (saww) aisa karna chhod diya.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Ek bar Raeesul Munafiqeen beemar hua aur Maut o Hayat mein mubtila tha, uska bete jo Momin tha Rasoole Khuda (saww) se apne Baap ke liye Dua ki request ki, Rasoole Khuda (saww) uski ayadat ke liye gaye. Umar ne kaha Allah ne Munafiq ki Isteghfar ke liye mana kiya hai. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: Afsos tujh par! Isteghfar ka ikhtiyar diya hai. (Ma'afi ka ikhtiyar Allah ka hai). Aap (saww) uske Janaze mein tashreef le gaye, Umar ne phir toka. Aap (saww) ne farmaya: "Tujhe maloom hai meine Janaze mein kiya kaha? Meine kaha: 'Khudaya! Iski Qabr Aag se bhar de, iske Pet mein Aag bhar de, isko Dozakh mein dakhil kar.'

Phir Aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Jo kuchh mujhe maloom hai agar tumhe wo maloom ho jaye to tum kam se kam hansoge aur zyada se zyada ro'oge"_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jo Ali (as) se Mohabbat rakhe, uske liye Farishte Dua e Maghferat karte hain aur Jannat ke aatho'n (all 8) Darwaaze uske liye khol diye jaate hain ke jis Darwaaze se chaahe be-hisaab daakhil ho jaye."_

(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p17)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّكَ قُلْتَ وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ اِذْ ظَلَمُوْا اَنْفُسَهُمْ جَاۤءُوْكَ فَاسْتَغْفَرُوْا اللهَ وَ اسْتَغْفَرَ لَهُمُ الرَّسُوْلُ لَوَجَدُوْا اللهَ تَوَّابًا رَحِيمًا اِلٰهِيْ فَقَدْ اَتَيْتُ نَبِيَّكَ مُسْتَغْفِرًا تَاۤئِبًا مِنْ ذُنُوْبِي، فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ اغْفِرْهَا لِيْ يَا سَيِّدَنَا....*

(Ziyarat Rasoole Khuda (saww) - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *15th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *10th February 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*MUNAFIQ KE EXCUSES*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1421)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَرِحَ ٱلۡمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَقۡعَدِهِمۡ خِلَـٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوۤا۟ أَن یُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَنفِرُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡحَرِّۗ قُلۡ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرࣰّاۚ لَّوۡ كَانُوا۟ یَفۡقَهُونَ *  فَلۡیَضۡحَكُوا۟ قَلِیلࣰا وَلۡیَبۡكُوا۟ كَثِیرࣰا جَزَاۤءَۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ.*

_"Jin logon ko peechhe rahne ki Hidayat di gayi thi woh Allah ke Rasool ka saath na dene aur Ghar baith rahne par kush hue aur unhe gawara na hua ke Allah ki Raah mein apni Daulat aur Jaano se Jihaad karen. Unhone kaha: Garmi mein mat niklo. Aap keh den ke Dozakh ko Aag kahin zyada Garam hai. Kaash inhe iska sha'oor hota. Unko hansna kam aur rona zyada chahiye. Ye unke Aamaal ki jaza hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 81 - 82)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai:

📖

Guzishta Ayat ke zel mein ham is Ayat ki Tafseer kar chuke hai. Ye Ayat bhi guzishta Ayat se marboot hai. Munafiqeen ki is Ayat mein jis Alamat ka zikr hai woh Bahanebazi (Excuse). Is Ayat mein Manafiq Jihaad mein na jaane ke liye Bahanebazi kar rahe hain. Jabke aaj ke daur mein bhi aise log paye jate hain. Jab unse Shariyat par amal karne kiye kaha jata hai to tarah tarah ke bahane banate hain: Kapde Najis hain Namaz nahi padh sakte, Garmi shadeed hai Roza nahi rakh sakte, Duniyavi Entertainments mein khub paisa kharch karenge lekin Hajj ke liye kahenge ke Isteta'at nahi hai, Khums ke liye kuchh bachta nahi, apne aapko aise mahaul mein phasa lenge ke Najis khana pade phir kahenge kya karen majboor the. Khair Allah sabki Niyyaton se Waqif hai. Majboori Insaan apne liye khuda paida karta hai phir kahta hai ham majboor hain. Apni kartoot mein woh bahut khush hota hai. Isi liye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Jo kuchh mujhe maloom hai agar tumhe wo maloom ho jaye to tum kam se kam hansoge aur zyada se zyada ro'oge"_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Husain (as):

_"Jis fe'l (amal) par uzr-khwaahi karna (excuse / bahaane bataana) pade, wo kaam hi na karo is liye ke Momin na bura kaam karta hai na bahaane-baazi karta hai aur Munafiq roz bura kaam karta hai aur uzr-khwaahi karta hai."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p101)

🤲🏻

*..... وَ لَا مَفْزَعًا اَتَوَجَّہُ اِلَیْہِ فِیْ اَمْرِیْ غَیْرَ قَبُوْلِكَ عُذْرِیْ وَ اِدْخَالِكَ اِیَّایَ فِیْ سَعَۃِ رَحْمَتِكَ اَللّٰھُمَّ فَاقْبَلْ عُذْرِیْ وَارْحَمْ شِدَّۃَ ضُرِّیْ وَ فُكَّنِیْ مِنْ شَدِّ وَثَاقِیْ......*

(Dua-e-Kumail)

*...وَ اَسْاَلُكَ الْاَمَانَ يَوْمَ لَا يَنْفَعُ الظَّالِمِيْنَ مَعْذِرَتُهُمْ وَ لَهُمُ اللَّعْنَةُ وَ لَهُمْ سُوۤءُ الدَّارِ....*

(Munajaate Ameerul Mo'meneen - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *16th Jamadi us Sani 1441*
