   *11th February 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1422)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِن رَّجَعَكَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَىٰ طَاۤىِٕفَةࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنُوكَ لِلۡخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّن تَخۡرُجُوا۟ مَعِیَ أَبَدࣰا وَلَن تُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ مَعِیَ عَدُوًّاۖ إِنَّكُمۡ رَضِیتُم بِٱلۡقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةࣲ فَٱقۡعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلۡخَـٰلِفِینَ *  وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰۤ أَحَدࣲ مِّنۡهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدࣰا وَلَا تَقُمۡ عَلَىٰ قَبۡرِهِۦۤۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ*

_"Agar Allah Aapko unke darmiyan wapas le jaye aur ainda un mein se koi giroh Jihaad ke liye Aapse ijazat maange to saaf keh dena ke ab tum mere saath hargiz nahi chal sakte aur na mere saath tum kisi Dushman se ladayi kar sakte ho. Tumne pahle baith rahne ko pasand kiya tha to ab ghar baithne walon ke saath baithe raho."_

(Surah Taubah: 83 - 84)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Is Ayat mein Allah ne Munafiqeen ki Bahanebazi ki wajah se saaf taur par Rasoole Khuda (saww) se agah kar diya ke ab inke haal par rahne den. Baithe hain to baithe rahen, woh jab Jihaad nahi karna chahte to na karen. Allah unhe dekh raha hai aur Munafiqeen ki kya saza hogi woh bhi bata chuka hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Munafiq ki 3 Alaamatein (signs) hain: Uski zabaan uske dil ke mukhaalif hogi, uska Fe'l (Amal) uske qaul (baato'n) ke mukhaalif hoga, uska zaahir uske baatin ke mukhaalif hoga."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p185)

👉🏻

H. Isa (as)

se logo'n ne puchha, "Ya Ruhullah (as)! Humein kin logo'n ki sohbat mein baithhna chahiye?"

To Aap ne farmaya,

_"Unki sohbat mein jinko dekh kar tumhein Khuda ki yaad aaye aur jinka kirdaar tumhein Akherat ki taraf raaghib kar sakey."_

(Dosti, p33)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Imam Asr (atfs) ki nusrat karne ki Taufeeq ata farma. Aisa na ho ke woh (as) awaz dete rahen aur ham baithe rahen.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *17th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

 *12th February 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1423)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰۤ أَحَدࣲ مِّنۡهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدࣰا وَلَا تَقُمۡ عَلَىٰ قَبۡرِهِۦۤۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ*

_"Aur agar un mein se koi (Munafiq) mare to uski Namaz e Janaza na padhna aur na kabhi uski Qabr khade hona kyonki unhone Allah aur Uske Rasool ke saath Kufr kiya hai aur woh mare hain to is haal mein ke woh Fasiq the."_

(Surah Taubah: 84)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Is Ayat mein Allah ne Munafiqeen ki tashee' e Janaza aur unki Qabr ki Ziyarat se mana kiya hai. Ye Ayat Munafiqeen ke liye hain. Tafseer Ibne Kaseer mein bhi yehi hai.

Bahut se Saudi Wahabi Nawaz is Ayat ko istemal karte hain ke Qabr ki Ziyarat karna ya wahan Namaz padhna Bidat hai. Jabke ye Hukm Munafeqeen ki Qabr ke liye hai.

Jabke Momin ki Qabr ki Ziyarat karna aur wahan Namaz padhne ka zyada Sawab hai. Sabse zyada Sawab Aimma Tahereen (as) ki Quboor ki Ziyarat ka hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Yaqeen jaan lo ke Qabr Akherat ki manzilo'n mein pehli manzil hai. Agar insaan is se najaat paa gaya to uske baad tamaam maraahil uske liye aasaan honge aur agar najaat na paa saka to uske baad ke maraahil oos se kam nahi honge."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v8, p1)

⚰

Riwayat

(Qabr par aisi takhti nasb karna jis par mayyat ka naam likha ho, jaayez hai) Imam Mehdi (atfs) ki Walida (J. Narjis Khaatun (as)) ka inteqaal Imam Hasan Askari (as) ki zindagi mein inteqaal ho gaya aur unki qabr par ek takhti nasb ki gayi thi jis par likha tha Haaza Qabr Umme Muhammad (as)."

(Kamaluddin, Wasaail ush Shia, v2, p269)

🤲🏻

 *اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَدِيْلَةِ عِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ وَ مِنْ شَرِّ الْمَرْجِعِ فِي الْقُبُوْرِ وَ مِنَ النَّدَامَةِ يَوْمَ الْآزِفَةِ فَاَسْاَلُكَ اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَنْ تَجْعَلَ عَيْشِيْ عِيْشَةً نَقِيَّةً وَ مِيْتَتِيْ مِيْتَةً سَوِيَّةً وَ مُنْقَلَبِيْ مُنْقَلَبًا كَرِيْمًا...*

(Rajab Amaal Dua by Imam Musa Kazim (as) - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *18th Jamadi ul Awwal 1441*

  *13th February 2020, Thursday*

**********************************

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MAAL O AULAD K ZARIYE AZAAB*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1424)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تُعۡجِبۡكَ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لُهُمۡ وَأَوۡلَـٰدُهُمۡۚ إِنَّمَا یُرِیدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن یُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَـٰفِرُونَ.*

_"Aur unke Amwaal o Aulad (Wealth & Children) Aapko hairat mein na dal den. Allah to bas ye chahta hai ke Maal o Aulad ke zariye se unhe Duniya mein Azaab de aur unki Jaane is haal mein niklen ke woh Kafir hon."_

(Surah Taubah: 85)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

Ayat repeat ho rahi hai. (Surah Taubah: 55 ki Tafseer repeat kar rahe hain.)

📖

Ham ye dekh kar tajjub karte hain ke Munafiqeen ke paas Maal o Daulat bhi hai aur Aulad bhi. Ye dono cheezen agarche Ne'mat hain lekin kabhi kabhi jo kisi ke liye Nemat hai wohi cheez doosre ke liye pareshani ka sabab ban jaati hai.

Allah Kafir o Munafiqeen ko unke Nek Amal ka Sawab isi Duniya mein de deta hai aur Akherat mein unke liye kuchh nahi bachta aur unke Kufr ka Azaab bhi is Duniya mein de deta hai.

Agar Maal mein Barkat ho, Nek o Saleh Aulad ho to ye uske Nek Amaal ka Sawab hai jabke agar kasir Maal o Daulat ho lekin Barkat se khaali ho, Aulad ho lekin Nalayaq ho to ye uske liye Azaab hai. Ham Munafiqeen ke Amir wa Maldaar hote dekh tajjab to karte hain ke ham Momin hote hue bhi Gharib kyon, lekin hame ye nahi maloom ke ye Maldaar shakhs sukoon ki Zindagi mein hai ya woh ab bhi pareshan hai. Duniya mein har shakhs ko gaur se dekhen to hame bahut si misaalen mil jayengi, zahiran to woh bahut Amir nazar aayenge lekin unka hi Maal unke kaam nahi aata nazar aayega, Aulad chhod kar jaa chuki hogi, tanhai ki Zindagi, lachaar o bebas nazar aayenge.

Ye sab Allah ki taraf se hai Allah Apni Ne'mat de kar bhi usko Azaab mein mubtila karta hai.

Quran mein do tarah ki Ayaten maujood hain:

_"Maal o Aulad to Duniya ki hi Zeenat hai albatta baqi rahne wali Nekiyan tere Rab ke nazdeek az rue Sawab hai."_ (Kahf:46)

_"Aur Jaan lo! Tumhare Amwaal wa Aulad dar haqeeqat samaane Azmayish hain."_ (Anfal:28)

Is tarah aur bhi bahut Ayaat maujood hain.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Raavi se farmaya:

_"Mein tujhe Khuda ke Taqwa aur Raast Guftaari (Speaking Truth), Parhezgari aur Jaddo Jahed ki Wasiyyat karta hun aur Jaan lo ke is Jaddo o Jahed ka koi fayda nahi jis mein Parhezgari na ho. Khabardar! Apne upar wali ki taraf na dekho aur hamesha Khuda ke is farman par nazar rakho (9:55)"_

💰👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Imam Ali (as):

_"Maal Maut tak saath deta hai, Aulaad Qabr tak aur Aamaal Hashr tak."_

(Khisaal, Chap 3)

🤲🏻

*اِلٰهِيْۤ اَذِقْنِيْ طَعْمَ عَفْوِكَ يَوْمَ لَا بَنُوْنَ وَ لَا مَالٌ هُنَالِكَ يَنْفَعُ*

_"Mere Malik! Maal aur Aulad jab be sood hon to Tu Apne Karam ka zayqa mujhe chakhana."_

(Munajaat Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) Sahifa e Alwiyyah - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

     *19th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

    *14th February 2020, Friday*

**********************************

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN KI BAHANEBAZI*_♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1425)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَاۤ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٌ أَنۡ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَكَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلطَّوۡلِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَقَالُوا۟ ذَرۡنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡقَـٰعِدِینَ *  رَضُوا۟ بِأَن یَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا یَفۡقَهُونَ.*

_"Aur jab koi Surah nazil hoti hai ke Allah par Imaan lao aur Rasool ke saath shamil ho kar Jihaad karo to unke Sahibane haisiyyat Aapse darkhwast karne lag gaye aur unhone kaha ke hame chhod de ke ham baithe rahne walon ke saath rahen. Un logon ne ghar mein baithe waliyon ke saath rahne shamil hona pasand kar liya hai aur unke Dilon par Mohr laga di gayi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 86 - 87)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

📖

Is Ayat mein Munafiq ki ek aur Alamat jo bayan ki gayi hai woh pahle bhi uska zikr ho chuka hai. (Ayat 9:81) Is Ayat mein Allah ne Munafiqeen ke liye farma raha hai ke woh log jo Jihaad karne ki ability rakhte hain bahana bana kar Rasool (saww) ko chakma de rahe hain aur ghar mein chudhiya pahen kar baithne ke misdaaq hain.

Jaisa ke ham pahle bhi bata chuke hain in Ayaat ko padh kar ye na sochen ke ye to un logon ki baat ho rahi hai balke ham khud bhi apne galeban mein jhank kar denkhen kya ye alamaat (signs) hamare andar to nahi???

🏚

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Lafz *"ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ - Khawalif"* se 'Khananashin Aurten' murad hain. Munafiqeen ne AanHazrat (saww) ke saamne bahana banate hue kaha ke Aap hamen ghar rahne ki ijazat den, kyonki hamare ghar khali pade hain. Allah Ta'ala ne unki tardeed karte hue farmaya ke unke ghar khali nahi pade, log sirf bhagna chahte hain. Unke ghar har lehaz se mehfooz hain."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jo shakhs Kaahili (laziness) aur Susti se kaam leta hai woh apne Huqooq ko bhi barbaad kar deta hai aur jo Chugal-khor ki baat maan leta hai wo Doston ko bhi kho baithta hai."_

(Nahjul Balagah, p713)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Ma'bood! Main Teri panaah leta hun, Susti, bad-dili, Pareshani, Buzdili, Kanjoosi, Faramoshi, Sangdili, Khwaari aur Faqr o Faaqa se Teri Panaah leta hu'n. Aur tamaam sakhtiyo'n aur be-hayaai ke chhupe kaamo'n se Teri Panaah leta hun. Ser na hone waale Nafs par, pur na hone waale Shikam, Aajiz na hone waale Dil, Suni na jaane waali Dua aur Faayda na dene waale kaam se Teri Panaah leta hun."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE MARGE GHASIBE AWWAL*

(DOD: 23rd August 634 AD=22nd Jamadi us Sani 13 AH)

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

*DASTARKHWAN IMAM HASAN (as) MUBARAK*

🍲🍪🍛🥘🥯🥗🍿🍩🥩🍖

**********************************

      *22nd Jamadi us Sani 1441*

    *17th February 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*MO'MENEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1426)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخَیۡرَ ٰ⁠تُۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ *  أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_"Lekin Rasool aur un par Imaan laane walon ne apne Maal o Jaan se Jihaad mein shirkat ki hai. Saari Bhalaiyyan unhi ke liye hain aur wohi Falah paane wale hain. Allah ne unke liye aise Baghaat tayyar kiye hain jinke neeche Nehren beh rahi hain, woh un mein hamesha rahenge. Ye Azeemush Shaan Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 88 - 89)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari tha.

Ab darmiyan mein Allah Munafiq baraks Momin ka Zikr bhi karta hai. Momin ki khususiyat Munafiq ke baraks yani opposit mein hain.

Jahan Munafiqeen ne Jihaad ke liye bahanebazi ki, Maul o Daulat wa Aulad hote hue unhone ghar baithne mein ghanimat samjha wahi Mo'meneen ne Jihaad mein badh chadh kar hissa liya. Karbala mein dono log milenge. Ek taraf Munafiq the to doosri taraf Mo'meneen. Allah ne is Ayat mein Mo'meneen ke Ajr o Sawab, Reward ka zikr kiya hai. Allah ne Mo'meneen ko hi Kamyab bataya.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

🍲 _*EVENT OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_ 🍪

🙇

Aaj ghar ghar Niyaz o Dastarkhwan e Imam Hasan (as) ka ehtamam hai. Khushi ka mahaul hai kyonki aaj Munafiq e Ghasib e Haqqe Awwal, Qatil e Zehra (sa) wasil e Jahannum hua. Tarikh e Marg mein ikhtelaf hai lekin English date mein ittefaq hai yani 23rd Aug jise convert karne par urdu ki aaj ki date confirm hai.

Shuru'at to Mannat ki Nazr se hui thi aur kab se hui ye nahi maloom lekin ye buzurgo ki hikmat e amali thi ke hame ek aisa program de diya ke ham Bakre ka Ghosht par Niyaz de kar Mo'meneen ko dawat de kar us Bakre ko yaad karen aur is khushi mein shamil hon. Hare rang ka Dastarkhwan ho, ye rang aam Musalmano mein Islami rang mana jaata hai, Khulafa ka yehi rang hota tha. Tarikh mein Imam Hasan (as) ka Dastarkhwan mashhoor tha aur usi rivayat ko qayem rakha gaya. Ravadari ka lehaz rakhte hue buzurgo ne ye laye amal ikhtiyar kiya. Is mein kitni sachchai hai ye ham nahi kah sakte lekin sahi raasta ikhtiyar kiya.

_Kat ti hai apni zindagi aaram-o-chayn se,_

_Khana Hasan se milta hai paani Husain se._

Maula sab Mo'meneen ki Niyaz qubool farmaye.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

      *23rd Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *18th February 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*MA'ZOOR (MAJBOOR)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1427)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَجَاۤءَ ٱلۡمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ لِیُؤۡذَنَ لَهُمۡ وَقَعَدَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَذَبُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ سَیُصِیبُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمࣱ *  لَّیۡسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَاۤءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلۡمَرۡضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِینَ لَا یَجِدُونَ مَا یُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۚ مَا عَلَى ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِینَ مِن سَبِیلࣲۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ.*

_"Baddui Arabon mein se bhi Ma'azerat (excuse) karnewale aaye ke unhe bhi peechhe rahne ki ijazat di jaye. Isi tarah woh log bhi gharon mein baith gaye jinhone Allah aur Uske Rasool se Khoota Ahd kiya tha. Anqareeb un Kafiron par Dardnak Azaab nazil hoga."_

_"Jo log Kamzor hain ya Bimaar hain ya unke paas Raahe Khuda mein kharch karne ke liye kuchh nahi hai to unke baithe rahne mein koi harj nahi bashart ye ke woh Khuda aur Rasool ke Khair khwah hon. Nek Kirdar logon par koi ilzaam nahi hai. Allah Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 90 - 91)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafeqeen ki Alamat ke baad Mo'meneen ka Zikr jaari hai. Allah ne Munafiqeen ke excuses ki mazammat ki jabke Mukhlis Mo'meneen ke excuses ko qubool kiya.

👉🏻

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke paas 7 Mukhlis afraad aaye aur woh alag alag Qabile se the, Jange Badr mein bhi shirkat ki thi. AanHazrat (saww) ne logon se Jange Tabuk ke liye Fund jama karne ke liye kaha to inhone kaha: "Ya Rasoolallah! Mere paas hazir karne ke liye Daulat nahi hai. Mein apni Azmat o Aabru halaal karta hun." Maqsad ye tha ke mein logon ke liye apne uyoob bayan karna halaal karta hun. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: _"Allah ne tera Sadaqa qubool kiya hai."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

😟

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ki taraf se Taleef e Sharayii (Legal Responsibility) ba qadar e Isteta'at (according to ability) hoti hai aur jab kisi ke paas Isteta'at na ho to us par Sharayii Taleef hata di jati hai. Jaisake Allah ne Kamzor, Bimaar aur jinke paas Rahe Khuda mein kharch karne ki Isteta'at nahi thi, unko Jihaad aur Jihaad ki tayyariyon se mustashna (alag, exception) qarar diya tha aur isi tarah se Allah Ta'ala ne un Ahle Imaan ko bhi Jihaad se ma'zoor qarar diya tha jinhone AanHazrat (saww) se sawariyon ka mutaliba kiya tha." phir ye Ayat tilawat ki. (9:90)"_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Kuchh Qabile ke log Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Jang ke liye sawari ka mutaliba kiya tha lekin Rasool (saww) ke paas nahi thi to unhe wapas ghar lautna pada.)

(To be Cont'd.....)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ham Ahle Kabair Shiyon ki Shafa'at karenge jabke Tauba karne walon ke mutalliq Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: 'Nek Kirdar logon par koi ilzaam nahi hai."_

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)

🖐🏻

Hazrat Nabi e Akram (saww):

_"Jo mujhe 5 baaton ki zamanat de mein use Jannat ki Zamanat dunga:_

_(1) Allah Ta'ala ki Khair khwahi._

_(2) Allah ke Rasool ki Khair khwahi._

_(3) Kitab e Khuda ki Khair khwahi._

_(4) Allah ke Deen ki Khair khwahi._

_(5) Jamat e Muslemeen ki Khair khwahi."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اجْعَلْ جَاۤئِزَتَهُ فِيْ مَوْقِفِيْ هٰذَا غُفْرَانَكَ وَ تُحْفَتَهُ فِيْ مَقَامِيْ هٰذَا عِنْدَ اِمَامِيْ صَلَّى اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ اَنْ تُقِيْلَ عَثْرَتَهُ وَ تَقْبَلَ مَعْذِرَتَهُ وَ تَتَجَاوَزَ عَنْ خَطِيْۤئَتِهِ وَ تَجْعَلَ التَّقْوٰى زَادَهُ وَ مَا عِنْدَكَ خَيْرًا لَهُ فِيْ مَعَادِهِ وَ تَحْشُرَهُ فِيْ زُمْرَةِ.*

(Ziyarat in Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *24th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

 *19th February 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*MA'ZOOR (MAJBOOR)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1428)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِینَ إِذَا مَاۤ أَتَوۡكَ لِتَحۡمِلَهُمۡ قُلۡتَ لَاۤ أَجِدُ مَاۤ أَحۡمِلُكُمۡ عَلَیۡهِ تَوَلَّوا۟ وَّأَعۡیُنُهُمۡ تَفِیضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمۡعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا یَجِدُوا۟ مَا یُنفِقُونَ.*

_"Isi tarah se un logon par bhi aitraz ka koi mauqa nahi hai jinhone khud aa kar tumse darkhwast ki thi ke hamare liye sawariyan baham pahunchayi jayen aur jab tumne kaha ke mein tumhare liye sawariyon ka koi intezam nahi kar sakta to woh majbooran wapas gaye aur haalat ye thi ke unki Aankhon mein Aansu jaari the aur unhe is baat ka bada sadma tha ke woh apne kharch par sharike Jihaad hone ki Qudrat nahi rakhte."_

(Surah Taubah: 92)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Mo'meneen ki majboori ka Zikr jaari hai. Guzishta Topic jaari hai.

👉🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) Jange Siffin se wapas hue aur Nakhila se guzar kar Kufa ke qareeb pahunche to hame wahan ek buzurg dikhai diya jo ek ghar ki diwar ke saaye mein baitha hua tha aur uske chehre par bimaari ke asaar numaaya the. Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne use Salam kiya. Usne bawaqar tareeqe se Salam ka Jawab diya. Aap (as) ne usse sawal kiya ke kya tum hamare saath Jang mein the? Usbe jawab diya: "Ameerul Mo'meneen! Meri Dili khwahish thi ke mein. Aap (as) ke ham rakaab ho jar Jang mein shirkat karun, lekin bimaari ki wajah se mein shirkat na kar saka." Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne phir ye Ayat tilawat farmayi (9:91)

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd.....)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Hamare Shiyo par Gunahon aur Khataon ki Mohr sabt nahi ki jati. Woh Khuda ke chune hue log hain jinhe Khuda ne Apne Deen ki khidmat ke liye muntakhab kiya hai. Allah ne unhi ke liye farmaya hai: "Nek Kirdar logon par koi ilzaam nahi hai. (9:91)"_

(Noorus Saqlain)

😟

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab tum Naasibiyo’n mein pha’ns jaao aur majbooran unke paas baithhna ho to is tarah apne wahan se uthne tak bechayn raho goya tum jalte pattharo’n par baithhe ho, kyunki Khuda aise logo’n ka Dushman hai aur unpar La’anat karta hai. Aur jab dekho ke woh tumhare kisi Imam ki mazammat (ninda / condemn) kar rahe hain to wahan se khade ho jao kyunki Allah ka Azaab unpar naazil hoga."_

(Al Kaafi, v4, p348)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنْ يَسْمَعُ اَنِيْنَ الْوَاهِنِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ يَرٰى بُكَاۤءَ الْخَاۤئِفِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ يَمْلِكُ حَوَآئِجَ السَّآئِلِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ يَقْبَلُ عُذْرَ التَّآئِبِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ لَا يُصْلِحُ عَمَلَ الْمُفْسِدِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ لَا يُضِيْعُ اَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ، يَا مَنْ لَايَبْعُدُ عَنْ قُلُوْبِ الْعَارِفِيْنَ، يَا اَجْوَدَ الْاَجْوَدِيْنَ۔*

(Dua Joshan Kabir No. 63)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *25th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *20th February 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN KE EXCUSES*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1429)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِیلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِینَ یَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُونَكَ وَهُمۡ أَغۡنِیَاۤءُۚ رَضُوا۟ بِأَن یَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ *  یَعۡتَذِرُونَ إِلَیۡكُمۡ إِذَا رَجَعۡتُمۡ إِلَیۡهِمۡۚ قُل لَّا تَعۡتَذِرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكُمۡ قَدۡ نَبَّأَنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ أَخۡبَارِكُمۡۚ وَسَیَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَیُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Albatta aitraz to un logon par hai jo Maaldar hain. Phir bhi tumse darkhwast karte hain ke inhe shirkate Jihaad se ma'af rakha jaye. Unhone ne ghar baithne waliyon mein shamil hona pasand kar liya hai. Allah ne inke Dilon par Mohr laga di hai, isliye ab woh kuchh nahi jaante."_

_"Jab tum palat kar unke paas pahunchoge to ye tarah tarah ke Uzr pesh karenge. Aap (saww) inse keh dena ke bahane mat banao. Ham tumhari baaton ka etbar nahi karenge. Allah ne hame tumhare halaar se aagah kar diya hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 93 - 94)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton mein se ek unki uzr khwahi aur bahanebazi hai. Momin shakhs jo haqeeqat mein ma'zoor hai uske bare Allah ne guzishta Ayat mein Jihaad se bari kiya lekin jo sahibe Isteta'at hain phir bhi bahane bana rahe hain unki Allah mazammat kar raha hai. Aur bar bar is Ayaat ko dohraya ja raha hai. In par Allah ne Mohr laga di hai jiska zikr Sura Baqarah mein bhi ho chuka hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Aibdaar log apne Aibo'n ke liye Uzr (excuse / bahaana) talaash karne ki khaatir doosro'n ke Aibo'n ki tash'heer karenge (phailaayenge)."_

(Kirdaar Saazi, p31)

🕌

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jo koi Masjid mein Azaan sune aur bagair kisi Uzr (excuse) ke baahar chala jaaye Munaafiq hai, magar ye ke wapas aaye (aur Namaz adaa kare)."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p465)

🤲🏻

*.......لَا مَفْزَعًا اَتَوَجَّہُ اِلَیْہِ فِیْ اَمْرِیْ غَیْرَ قَبُوْلِكَ عُذْرِیْ وَ اِدْخَالِكَ اِیَّایَ فِیْ سَعَۃِ رَحْمَتِكَ اَللّٰھُمَّ فَاقْبَلْ عُذْرِیْ وَارْحَمْ شِدَّۃَ ضُرِّیْ وَ فُكَّنِیْ مِنْ شَدِّ وَثَاقِیْ یَا رَبِّ ارْحَمْ ضَعْفَ بَدَنِیْ وَ رِقَّۃَ جِلْدِیْ وَ دِقَّۃَ عَظْمِیْ یَا مَنْ بَدَءَخَلْقِیْ وَ ذِكْرِیْ وَ تَرْبِیَتِیْ وَ بِرِّیْ وَ تَغْذِیَتِیْ٠٠٠٠*

(Dua-e-Kumail)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *26th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *21st February 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MUNAFIQEEN KI JHOOTI QASMEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1430)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*سَیَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبۡتُمۡ إِلَیۡهِمۡ لِتُعۡرِضُوا۟ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَأَعۡرِضُوا۟ عَنۡهُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ رِجۡسࣱۖ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ جَزَاۤءَۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ *  یَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ لِتَرۡضَوۡا۟ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَإِن تَرۡضَوۡا۟ عَنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا یَرۡضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقِینَ.*

_"Ab Allah aur Uska Rasool tumhare tarze amal ko dekhega. Phir tum Uski taraf paltaye jaaoge Jo hazir o ghayeb ka Jannewala hai. Woh tumhe tumhare Aamal ki khabar dega."_

_"Anqareeb ye log tumhari waapsi par Khuda ki Qasmen khayenge taake tum unse darguzar karo. Tum inse sarfe nazar karlo. Ye mujassam Najasat hain aur inka thikana Dozakh hai jo inke kamai ke ewaz inhe naseeb hogi."_

_"Ye tumhare liye Qasmen khayenge ke kisi tarah se tum inse raazi ho jao, halanke tum inse raazi ho bhi gaye to Allah in Fasiq logon se raazi nahi hoga."_

(Surah Taubah: 95 - 96)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton mein se ek unki uzr khwahi, bahanebazi upar se Jhooti Qasmen khana hai. Ye Ayaten phir se dohrayi jaa rahi hain aur in Alamaton par Allah shiddat se zikr kar raha hai taake ham in se khabardar rahen.

Jaisa ke pahle bhi zikr kar chuke hain Jihaad sirf Jang karne ka hi naam nahi balke ye ek wasee maana rakhta hai. Jihaad literary means Koshish. Har Nek kaam ki taraf qadam badhane ko Jihaad kahte hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Nabi e Akram (saww):

_"Jo shakhs logon ko naraaz karke Allah ki Raza ko talaash kare to Allah bhi usse Raazi hoga aur logon ko bhi usse Raazi karega aur jo Khuda ko Naraaz karke logon ki razamandi talash kare to Allah us par Naraaz hoga aur logon ko bhi us par naraaz kar dega."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

نماز صبح کے بعد بغیر کوئی گفتگو کئے یہ دعا پڑھے تا کہ آئندہ جمعہ تک کے لئے اس کے گناہوں کا کفارہ قرار پائے:

*اَللّٰهُمَّ مَا قُلْتُ فِي جُمُعَتِيْ هٰذِهِ مِنْ قَوْلٍ اَوْ حَلَفْتُ فِيْهَا مِنْ حَلْفٍ اَوْ نَذَرْتُ فِيْهَا مِنْ نَذْرٍ فَمَشِيَّتُكَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْ ذٰلِكَ كُلِّهِ فَمَا شِئْتَ مِنْهُ اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ كَانَ وَ مَا لَمْ تَشَأْ مِنْهُ لَمْ يَكُنِ اللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ وَ تَجَاوَزْ عَنِّي اَللّٰهُمَّ مَنْ صَلَّيْتَ عَلَيْهِ فَصَلَوَاتِي عَلَيْهِ وَ مَنْ لَعَنْتَ فَلَعْنَتِيْ عَلَيْهِ۔*

(Aamaal e Roze Juma - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *27th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

   *22th February 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*'ARAAB - DIHAATI ARAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1431)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفۡرࣰا وَنِفَاقࣰا وَأَجۡدَرُ أَلَّا یَعۡلَمُوا۟ حُدُودَ مَاۤ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ*

_"Baddu (Dihaati) Arab Kufr o Nifaaq mein zyada sakht hain aur woh is qabil hain ke jo Kitab Khuda ne apne Rasool par nazil ki hai woh iske Hudood o Ahkam ko na pahchane. Allah Khoob Jannewala aur Sahibe Hikmat hai._

(Surah Taubah: 97)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafiqeen ki Alamaton ka Zikr jaari hai.

Ab Dihaati Arabon ka tazkara ho raha hai. Un mein bhi kuchh Munafiq hain, jabke kuchh Momin hain.

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Deen mein Samajh boojh hasil karo. Jise Deen mein Samajh boojh hasil na ho to woh " *اعرابى* - Araabi" hai. Jaisake Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (9:122)"_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Samajh boojh se murad Tafaqqoh ya Fiqh hai.

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Deen mein Samajh boojh hasil karni chahiye. 'Araab' mat bano. Jo Deen mein Samajh boojh se aari ho to Allah Qayamat ke Din uski taraf Nigah e Rehmat nahi karega aur uske Aamaal mein Pakeezgi paida nahi karega."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ham Bani Hashim hain aur hamare Shia " *عرب* - Arab" hain jabke doosre log " *اعراب* - Araab" hain."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Riwayat

Ek roz Paigambar e Akram (saww) Masjid mein daakhil hue to dekha ke kuchh log ek shakhs ko ghere hue baithe hain. Aap (saww) ne sawaal kiya, "Ye kaun hai?" Ashaab ne arz ki, "Ye 'Allamah' hai". Aap (saww) ne farmaya, "Kis cheez ka Aalim hai?" As'haab ne jawaab diya, "Arabo'n ke Ansaab (lineage / Shajra), Waaqiaat aur daur e Jahiliyyat ke ashaar ka ilm hai". To aap (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Ye to ek aisa Ilm hai ke agar koi isse jaahil ho to uska koi nuqsaan na hoga aur jo jaanta hai usko usse koi faayda hone waala nahi hai. Ilm sirf 3 tarah ka hota hai: Aqaaid, Akhlaaqiyaat aur Ilm e Ahkaam e Shari'at. Inke alaawa baaqi sab izaafi cheezein hain."_

(Adaab e Islami, v2, p44)

🤲🏻

*.....قَدْ وَتَرَ فِیْهِ صَنَادِیْدَ الْعَرَبِ وَ قَتَلَ اَبْطَالَھُمْ وَ نَاوَشَ ذُؤْبَانَھُمْ فَاَوْدَعَ قُلُوْبَھُمْ اَحْقَادًا بَدْرِیَّۃً وَّ خَیْبَرِیَّۃً وَّ حُنَیْنِیَّۃً وَ غَیْرَ ھُنَّ فَاَضَبَّتْ عَلٰی عَدَاوَتِهٖ وَ اَكَبَّتْ عَلٰی مُنَابَذَتِهٖ حَتّٰی قَتَلَ النَّاكِثِیْنَ وَ الْقَاسِطِیْنَ وَ الْمَارِقِیْنَ وَ لَمَّا قَضٰی نَحْبَهٗ وَ قَتَلَهٗ اَشْقَی الْاٰخِرِیْنَ یَتْبَعُ اَشْقَی الْاَوَّلِیْنَ....*

(Dua-e-Nudba)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *28th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *23rd February 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*'ARAAB - DIHAATI ARAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1432)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ مَن یَتَّخِذُ مَا یُنفِقُ مَغۡرَمࣰا وَیَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَاۤىِٕرَۚ عَلَیۡهِمۡ دَاۤىِٕرَةُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِیعٌ عَلِیمࣱ *  وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ مَن یُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِ وَیَتَّخِذُ مَا یُنفِقُ قُرُبَـٰتٍ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَصَلَوَ ٰ⁠تِ ٱلرَّسُولِۚ أَلَاۤ إِنَّهَا قُرۡبَةࣱ لَّهُمۡۚ سَیُدۡخِلُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِی رَحۡمَتِهِۦۤۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ.*

_"Unhi Araab mein aise log bhi hai jo Raahe Khuda mein mein kuchh kharch karte hain to woh use apne upar Tawaan (Compensation - Jurmana) samajhte hain aur tumhare liye Gardishe Zamana ka intezar kar rahe hain. Khud unhi par buri gardish ki maar hai aur Allah Khoob Sunnewala aur Jannewala hai."_

_"Aur un Araab mein woh bhi hain jo Allah aur Roze Akherat par Imaan rakhte hain aur jo kuchh kharch karte hain use Allah ki qurbat aur Rasool ki Dua e Rehmat ka zariya samajhte hain. Beshak ye unke liye samaane Qurbat hai. Khuda anqareeb unhe Apni Rehmat mein dakhil karega. Yaqeenan, Allah Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 98 - 99)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Dihaati Arabon ka tazkara jaari hai. Baddu Arabon ki kai Qismen hoti hain. Ek to Munafiq the jinka pahle zikr ho chuka, ek Ifaaq ko Jurmana samajhte hain jabke kuchh Mukhlis aur Momin bhi hain.

Jo Infaaq se bachte hain woh samajhte hain ke doosre Momin hazrat inhi Deeni kaamon mein lage rahenhe, Infaaq o Khairat karte karte jab inke paas koi paisa kaudi nahi bachega aur inki haalat gardish karne lagenge to hamare paas aayenge. Mominon ke aise halaat ke woh Muntazir hain. Jabke unko nahi maloom ke halaat ka badalne wala Allah hai. Ho sakta hai Allah ke Azaab mein yehi log mare jayen.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"(Aye Minhaal!) Aaj hamari wohi haalat hai jo Aal e Firoun mein Bani Israel ki thi. Aal e Firoun Bani Israel ke beto'n ko qatl karte the aur unki betiyo'n ko zinda rakhte the. Aaj isi tarah hamare bete qatl kiye jaa rahe hain aur hamari Aurato'n ko zinda rakha jaa raha hai. Hamare Dushmano'n ke liye khazano'n ke Mu'nh khule hue hain aur hamare Doston ko daraya dhamkaya jaa raha hai. Ajm Arabo'n ki is liye izzat karte hain ke Hazrat Muhammad Mustafa (saww) Arabi the aur Arab Quraish ka is liye ehteraam karte hain ke H. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ka talluq qabila e Quraish se tha. Lekin hum to H. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ka khandaan hain, iske bawajood koi hamara ehteraam nahi karta."_

(Maqtal e Mukarram, p12, Lahoof - Sayyid Ibne Taoos, p122)

🤲🏻

_"Aye Apni Makhlooq ko zer o zabar karne wale, hame aise halaat se mehfooz rakh ki kisi saamne ham haath phailayen."_

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿✿

*WAFAAT JANABE UMME KULSUM BINTE ALI (as)*

✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿✿

      *29th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *24th February 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*SABEQOON (FORMOST ONE)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1433)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهَـٰجِرِینَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحۡسَـٰنࣲ رَّضِیَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنۡهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_"Aur Muhajerin wa Ansaar mein se Sabqat karne wale (Formost Ones) aur jin logon ne Neki mein unki Pairavi ki hai un sab se Khuda Raazi hua aur woh Allah se Raazi hue. Allah ne unke liye aise Baugh tayyar kiye hain jinke neeche Nehren behti hongi. Woh us mein hamesha rahenge. Ye bahut badi Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 100)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as) se un Araab ke bare sawal kiya jo Nek kaam karte hain. Imam (as) ne jawab diya ke unko iska Sawab milega. Momin ke Imaan ke Darajat ke bare mein farmaya:

_"Jis tarah Ghodon ki daud (Horse Racing) ka muqabila hota hai usi tarah Allah ne Ahle Imaan ke darmiyan bhi Imaani Darajaat ka muqabila karaya hai. Phir jitna kisi ne sabqat ki use utne hi Darajaat se nawaza. Lehaza kisi Masbooq ko Sabiq par aur kisi Mafzool ko Fazil par koi sabqat nahi di gayi. Agar Imaan mein Sabqat karne walon ko Fazilat na di jaye to phir Ummat ke akhiri afraad Sabeqeen ke barabar payenge. Jabke Allah ne Imaan mein Sabqat hasil karne walon ko takheer karne walon par Fazilat di hai. Allah ne Imaani darjaat ki wajah se Sabeqeen ko muqaddam rakha aur Imaan mein takheer ki wajah se takheer karne walon ko muakhkhar (peechhe) rakha. Agarche kuchh Mutakhkharin (Late lateef) apne Sabeqeen se Namaz, Roze, Hajj, Zakat Jihaad, Infaaq jaise Aamaal mein zyada hain lekin phir bhi Fazilat ke zyada haqdar Sabeqeen (aage rahne wale) hi hain. Allah Akherin ko Sabeqeen ke darajat dene par Razamand nahi hai. Allah ki Sabiq ko Muakhkhar aur kisi Muakhkhar ko Sabiq ka Rutba dena nahi chahta. Imaani Darajaat ke liye Allah ka ye farman hai: (9:100). Allah Ta'ala ne Ayat ke aghaaz mein Muhajerin Awwalin ka zikr kiya. Unke baad doosre no. par Ansaar ka tazkara kiya aur teesre no. par Neki ke kaamon mein unki itteba karne walon (followers) ka tazkara kiya. Allah Ta'ala ne har tabqe ke alaihda alaihda darajat kiye hain."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as) ne daur e Khilafat e Usman Masjid e Nabavi ke andar Muhajerin o Ansaar ke darmiyan farmaya:

_"Mein tumhe Khuda ki Qasam de kar poochhta hun ke jab ye Ayat (9:100) aur (56:10-11) nazil hui to Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Sabeqeen ke mutalliq poochha gaya tha jiske jawab mein AanHazrat (saww) ne farmaya: "Allah ne ye Ayat Anbiya aur unke Ausiya ke mutalliq nazil farmayi hain. Mein tamam Anbiya aur Rusul se Afzal hun aur Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) tamam Ausiya se Afzal hain." To kya ye baat sach hai?"_

Masjid mein maujood Sahaba ne kaha:" Beshak, ye sach hai, Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne aisa hi farmaya tha."

(Kamaluddin, Kitab Sulaim bin Qais Al Hilali, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 _*Fazilat e Shia:*_

Imam Baqir wa Sadiq (as) ne Shiyon ke mutalliq farmaya:

_"Khuda ki Qasam! Mujhe tumhari khushboo aur tumhari Arwaah se Muhabbat hai. Tum Zuhd o Parhezgari ke zariye se meri madad karo aur tumhe maloom hona chahiye ke hamari Wilayat Zohd o Parhezgari ke baghair hasil nahi ho sakti. Tumne jise apna Imam tasleem kiya hai uske Aamaal ke mutabiq amal baja lao. Tum log Khuda ke Shia ho, tum log Khuda ke Ansaar ho. Tum "Sabeqoon Awwaloon" aur "Sabeqeen Aakherin" ho. Tum log Duniya mein Sabqat hasil karne wale ho aur tum log Akherat ke Din Jannat ki taraf Sabqat hasil karne wale ho."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِيْ مِنْ اَنْصَارِهِ وَ اَعْوَانِهِ وَ الذَّآبِّيْنَ عَنْهُ وَ الْمُسَارِعِيْنَ اِلَيْهِ فِيْ قَضَاۤءِ حَوَاۤئِجِهِ وَ الْمُمْتَثِلِيْنَ لِاَوَامِرِهِ‏ وَ الْمُحَامِيْنَ عَنْهُ وَ السَّابِقِيْنَ اِلٰۤى اِرَادَتِهِ وَ الْمُسْتَشْهَدِيْنَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ.*

(Dua-e-Ahd)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

      *30th Jamadi us Sani 1441*

     *25th February 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ALI (as): THE FIRST MUSLIM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1434)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهَـٰجِرِینَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحۡسَـٰنࣲ رَّضِیَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنۡهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_*"Aur Muhajerin wa Ansaar mein se Sabqat karne wale (Formost Ones)* aur jin logon ne Neki mein unki Pairavi ki hai un sab se Khuda Raazi hua aur woh Allah se Raazi hue. Allah ne unke liye aise Baugh tayyar kiye hain jinke neeche Nehren behti hongi. Woh us mein hamesha rahenge. Ye bahut badi Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 100)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Musalmano mein is baat ka tazkara zyada hota hai sab se pahle kisne Islam qubool kiya aur phir Age ke mutabiq numbering di jati hai. Kaha jata hai ke Bachchon mein Hazrat Ali (as) ne sab se pahle Islam qubool kiya. Kuchh rivayat aisi bhi hain ke Monday ko Rasoole Khuda (saww) mab'oos hue aur Tuesday ko Aap (as) ne Islam qubool kiya. Yahan qubool karne ka matlab ye nahi ke pahle Musalman nahi the, ab hue.

Hazrat Ali (as) ke Islam mein Kufr shamil nahi hai Kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) bachpan mein hi Hazrat Ali (as) ko Abu Talib (as) se utha kar ke gaye the aur AanHazrat (saww) ne unki apni aghosh mein tarbiyat ki thi. Hazrat Ali (as) hamesha Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke saath rahte the, yahan tak ke Aspko Nabi mab'oos kiya gaya. Hazrat Abu Talib ne apne bete Imaan ko dekh kar farmaya: _"Muhammad (saww) hamesha bhalai ki dawat dete hain, Aap (as) unke saath wabasta raho."_

Hazrat Ali (as):

*انا عبد الله و اخو رسوله و انا الصديق الاكبر لا يقولها بعدى إلا كذاب مفتر  صليت قبل الناس بسبع سنين.*

_"Mein Allah ka Banda hun aur Uske Rasool ka Bhai hun aur mein hi Siddiq e Akbar hun. Mere baad jo bhi Siddiq e Akbar ka dawa karega woh jhoota aur muftar (jaali) hai. Meine logon se Saat Baras qabl Namaz padhi hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrar Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Poore Saat Baras tak Malaika mujh par aur Ali (as) par Rehmat bhejte rahe kyonki is poore arse mein mere aur Ali (as) ke siwa koi Namaz padhne wala nahi tha."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as) ne daur e Khilafat e Usman Masjid e Nabavi ke andar Muhajerin o Ansaar ke darmiyan farmaya:

_"Mein tumhe Khuda ki Qasam de kar poochhta hun ke jab ye Ayat (9:100) aur (56:10-11) nazil hui to Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Sabeqeen ke mutalliq poochha gaya tha jiske jawab mein AanHazrat (saww) ne farmaya: "Allah ne ye Ayat Anbiya aur unke Ausiya ke mutalliq nazil farmayi hain. Mein tamam Anbiya aur Rusul se Afzal hun aur Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) tamam Ausiya se Afzal hain." To kya ye baat sach hai?"_

Masjid mein maujood Sahaba ne kaha:" Beshak, ye sach hai, Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne aisa hi farmaya tha."

(Kamaluddin, Kitab Sulaim bin Qais Al Hilali, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Awwalin aur Aakherin mein se sirf wohi Jannat mein daakhil hoga jo Hazrat Ali (as) ko dost rakhta hai aur Awwalin aur Aakherin mein sirf wohi Jahannum mein daakhil hoga jo H. Ali (as) se dushmani rakhta hai. Pus Ali (as) Jannat aur Jahannum ke taqseem karne waale hain."_

(Manaqib Ameerul Mo'meneen (as), p385)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُمْ وَ اَهْلِكْ عَدُوَّهُمْ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرِيْنَ۔*

(Amal e Shabe Juma: Salwat - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WILADAT OF IMAM BAQIR (as)*

🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊

🌹 *WILADAT MUBARAK*🌹

_*Read on Lifehistory of Imam Baqir (as), Click:*_

https://www.al-islam.org/story-of-the-holy-kaaba-and-its-people-shabbar/fifth-imam-muhammad-ibn-ali-al-baqir

💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐

**********************************

            *1st Mahe Rajab 1441*

  *26th February 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ALI (as): THE FIRST MUSLIM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1435)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهَـٰجِرِینَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحۡسَـٰنࣲ رَّضِیَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنۡهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_*"Aur Muhajerin wa Ansaar mein se Sabqat karne wale (Formost Ones)* aur jin logon ne Neki mein unki Pairavi ki hai un sab se Khuda Raazi hua aur woh Allah se Raazi hue. Allah ne unke liye aise Baugh tayyar kiye hain jinke neeche Nehren behti hongi. Woh us mein hamesha rahenge. Ye bahut badi Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 100)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Musalmano mein is baat ka tazkara zyada hota hai sab se pahle kisne Islam qubool kiya aur phir Age ke mutabiq numbering di jati hai. Kaha jata hai ke Bachchon mein Hazrat Ali (as) ne sab se pahle Islam qubool kiya. Yahan qubool karne ka matlab ye nahi ke pahle Musalman nahi the, ab hue. Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) apne bare mein kya farmate hain mulaheza karen:

👉🏻

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Meine to Bachpan mein hi Arab ka Seena paiwand e Zameen kar diya tha aur Qabila Rabia wa Hazar ke ubhre hue Seengon ko tod diya tha. Tum jaante hi ho ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) se qareeb ki Azeezdari aur makhsoos Qadr o Manzelat ki wajah se mera maqam unke nazdeek kiya tha. Mein Bachcha hi tha ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne mujhe god mein le liya tha. Aap (saww) mujhe apne Seene se chimtaye rakhte the. Aap (saww) mujhe Bistar mein apne pahlu mein jagah dete the. Apne Jisme Mubarak ko mujh se mas karte the aur apni khushboo mujhe sunghate the. Pahle Aap (saww) kisi cheez ko chabate phir uske Luqme bana kar Munh mein dalte the. Unhone na to meri kisi baat mein jhoot ka shayba paya, na meri kisi kaam laghzish o kamzori dekhi. Allah ne Aapki (saww) Doodh  bhadhayi ke waqt se hi Farishton mein se ek Azeemul Martabat Mulk (Roohul Quds) ko Aap (saww) ke saath laga diya tha jo unhe shab o roz  buzurg khaslaton aur Pakeeza Seeraton ki Rah par le chalta tha aur unke peechhe peechhe yun laga rahta tha jaise Oontni ka Bachcha apni Maa ke peechhe."_

_"Aap (saww) har roz mere liye Akhlaq e Hasna ke Parcham buland karte the aur mujhe unki pairavi ka hukm dete the aur har saal (Kohe) Hira mein kuchh arse qayam farmate the. Wahan mere alawa koi unhe nahi dekhta tha. Usi waqt Rasoole Khuda (saww) aur Ummul Mo'meneen Hazrat Khadeejatul Kubra (sa) ke Ghar ke alawa kisi Ghar ki chardiwari mein Islam maujood nahi tha. Albatta un mein Teesra Fard mein tha. Mein Wahy o Risaalat ka Noor dekhta tha aur Nabuwwat ki Khushboo soonghta tha."_

_"Jab Aap (saww) par (pahle pahel) Wahy nazil hui to meine Shaitan ki ek cheekh suni jis par meine poochha ke Ya Rasoolallah)(saww)! Ye kaisi awaz hai?"_

_"Aap (saww) ne farmaya ke ye Shaitan hai jo apne pooje jaane se mayoos ho chuka hai. Ay Ali! Jo mein sunta hun tum bhi sunte ho aur jo mein dekhta hun tum bhi dekhte ho. Farq itna hai ke tum Nabi nahi ho balke (mere) Vazir o Janashin ho aur yaqeenan Bhalai ki Raah par ho."_

(Khutba Nahjul Balagha)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 *Imam Baqir (as):* 

_"Jis Aalim ke Ilm se faayda haasil kiya jaaye wo 70000 Aabid ki Ibadat se afzal hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v6, p687)

🤲🏻

*يَا اَبا جَعْفَرٍ يَا مُحَمَّدَ بْنَ عَلِيٍّ اَيُّهَا الْبَاقِرُ يَا بْنَ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ يَا حُجَّةَ اللهِ عَلٰى خَلْقِهِ يَا سَيِّدَنَا وَمَوْلٰينَا اِنَّا تَوَجَّهْنَا وَاسْتَشْفَعْنَا وَتَوَسَّلْنَا بِكَ اِلَى اللهِ وَقَدَّمْنَاكَ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ حَاجَاتِنَا يَا وَجِيْهًا عِنْدَ اللهِ اِشْفَعْ لَنَا عِنْدَ اللهِ۔*

(Dua-e-Tawassul - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *2nd Mahe Rajab 1441*

   *27th February 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*MOMIN KI TAUBA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1436)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِمَّنۡ حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ مُنَـٰفِقُونَۖ وَمِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِینَةِ مَرَدُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ لَا تَعۡلَمُهُمۡۖ نَحۡنُ نَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَّرَّتَیۡنِ ثُمَّ یُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظِیمࣲ *  وَءَاخَرُونَ ٱعۡتَرَفُوا۟ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ خَلَطُوا۟ عَمَلࣰا صَـٰلِحࣰا وَءَاخَرَ سَیِّئًا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن یَتُوبَ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمٌ.*

_"Tumhare gird Badduyon (Bedouins) mein Munafiq maujood hain aur isi tarah khud Madina ke Bashindon (Inhabitants) mein bhi Munafiq maujood hain jo Nifaaq mein ada hue hain. Tum inhe nahi jaante Ham unko Jaante hain."_

_"Kuchh aur log hain jinhone apne Gunahon ka etraaf kar liya hai. Unhone Nek aur Bure Aamaal makhloot (mix) kar diye hain. Anqareeb Khuda unki Tauba qubool kar lega. Beshak Allah Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 101 - 102)

📚📖 🙏🏻

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jab AanHazrat (saww) ne Bani Qareeza ke muhasera kar rakha tha tab unke kahne par unhi ka Saathi Sahabi Abul Babah mediator ki haisiyyat se bheja. Lekin usne unko ghalat paigham diya ke tum apne Qile se niche utar aao lekin woh tumhare Qatl ka faisla kar chuke hain. Lekin baad mein woh apni is harkat par nadim hua aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke paas wapas aane ke bajaye Masjid e Nabavi mein ja kar ek pillar se apne aap ko baandh diya aur Ahd kiya ke jab tak uski Tauba qubool nahi hogi tab tak woh bandha rahega. Is Pillar ko aaj bhi " *أسطوانة توبة* - Pillar of Repentance" kaha jata hai. Rasoole Khuda (saww) is bare mein ittelaa mili to Aap (saww) ne farmaya ke agar woh hamare paas aata to ham uski Maghferat ke kiye Khuda se darkhwast karte ab woh jaane uska Khuda Jaane. Woh roz Din ko Roza rakhta. Isi tarah Din guzarte gaye. Ek Din Rasoole Khuda (saww) Janabe Umme Salma (sa) ke ghar mein the  ye Ayat (9:102) nazil hui. Uski Tauba qubool hui aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne khud ja kar usko piller se uski Rassiyan kholi aur azaad kiya.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🙏🏻

 *Imam Baqir (as):*

(Jinhone Nak o Bad Aamaal ke Makhloot kar diya hai)

_"Ye Mo'meneen ka woh Giroh hai jo aise Gunah saranjaam dete hain jinhe Momin Aib shumar karte hain aur unse karahiyyat karte hain, in logon ke mutalliq Tauba ki qubooliyyat ka imkan hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🙏🏻

 *Imam Baqir (as):*

_"Ayat (9:102) hamare Gunahgar Shia Momin murad hain."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🙏🏻

 *Imam Baqir (as):*

_"Qatil e Momin se Tauba ki Taufeeq salb kar li jati hai albatta Allah Bandon ki aarzoo munqata nahi karta."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ خَلَطَتِ الْحَلَالَ بِالْحَرَامِ وَ اسْتَخَفَّتْ بِالْاِيْمَانِ وَ الْاِسْلَامِ.....*

_"(Munafiqeen ne) Haraam ko Halaal mein mix kar diya. Imaan o Islam ko ruswa kiya."_

(Ziyarat e Jame - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATES SHAHADAT OF IMAM ALI NAQI (as)*

**********************************

          *3rd Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *28th February 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*SADAQA - TAUBA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1415)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ صَدَقَةࣰ تُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّیهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَیۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنࣱ لَّهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِیعٌ عَلِیمٌ *  أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ یَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَیَأۡخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِیمُ.*

_"Aye Nabi (saww)! Aap unke Amwaal se Sadqa lekar unhe Pak karen aur unka Tazkiya karen aur unke haq mein Dua karen. Yaqeenan Aapki Dua unke liye taskeen ka baes hai aur Khuda sab kuchh Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."_

_"Kya unhe Ilm nahi hai ke Allah hi Apne Bando ki Tauba qubool karta hai aur unki Khairat ko Qubuliyat ata karta hai aur Yaqeenan Allah hi Tauba Qubool Karnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 103 - 104)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat ke zel Rasool ke Sahabi Abul Babah ki Tauba ka tazkara hua tha.

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne uski Tauba Qubool hone par uski bandhi hui Rassiyan kholi tab usne Aap (saww) se daryaft kiya: 'Kya mein apna saara Maal Rahe Khuda mein Sadqa kardun? Aap (saww) ne farmaya: Nahi. Phir do tihai ke liye poochha. Aap (saww) ne phir nahi farmaya. Phir usne Ek Tihai ke liye farmaya to phir Aap (saww) ne farmaya : Ji haan. Phir ye Ayat (9:103-104) ki Tilawat farmayi.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as) ne farmaya ke jis tarah ye Hukm Nabi (saww) ke liye tha usi tarah Nabi (saww) ke baad ye Hukm Imam (as) ke liye hai.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo shakhs ye guman kare ke Imam logon ke Maal ka mohtaj hota hai to woh Kafir hai. Iske baraks log is baat ke mohtaj hain ke Imam (as) unse qubool kare. (9:103)"_

_"Mein tum mein se kisi ek se Dirham leta hun, jabke mein poore Madina ka Maaldar Insaan hun. Iske bawajood mein tumse sirf isliye Dirham leta hun taake tum Paak ho sako."_

_"Ye Zakat ki Ayat (9:103) Mahe Ramazan mein nazil hui. Tab Namaz ki tarah Zakat bhi Wajib hui._

_Allah ne logon par Sona, Chaandi, Oont, Gaaye, Bakri, Genhu, Jaw, Khajoor aur Munaqqa mein se Zakat Wajib ki hai. Iske alawa baqi cheezon par Zakat Ma'af kar di gayi."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Agar Duniya mein Bhalai hai to sirf do afraad ke liye hai. Pahla shakhs woh hai jiski Bhalai mein rozana izaafa hota hai aur doosra shakhs woh hai jo apne Gunahon ki talafi Tauba se karta ho. Magar Tauba ki qubooliyyat ho to kaise ho? Khuda ki Qasam! Agar koi shakhs itne Sajde kare ke uski Gardan toot jaye *jab tak uske Dil mein hamari Wilayat na hogi us waqt tak Khuda uski Tauba aur Sajdon ko qubool nahi karega."*_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

 *يَا مَنْ يَقْبَلُ التَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِ،......*

(Dua e Joshan e Kabir No. 67 - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *4th Mahe Rajab 1441*

   *29th February 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

               ♦ _*SADAQA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1416)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ صَدَقَةࣰ تُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّیهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَیۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنࣱ لَّهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِیعٌ عَلِیمٌ *  أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ یَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَیَأۡخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِیمُ.*

_"Aye Nabi (saww)! Aap unke Amwaal se Sadqa lekar unhe Pak karen aur unka Tazkiya karen aur unke haq mein Dua karen. Yaqeenan Aapki Dua unke liye taskeen ka baes hai aur Khuda sab kuchh Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."_

_"Kya unhe Ilm nahi hai ke Allah hi Apne Bando ki Tauba qubool karta hai aur unki Khairat ko Qubuliyat ata karta hai aur Yaqeenan Allah hi Tauba Qubool Karnewala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 103 - 104)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚 📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jab tum Saael ko kuchh ata karo to usse kaho ke woh tumhare haq mein Dua kare, kyonki uski Dua tumhare haq mein qubool ki jaati hai, jabke uski Dua khud uske haq mein qubool nahi hoti, kyonki woh Jhoot bolte hain aur ata karne wale ko chahiye ke usne apne jis haath se Khairat di hai woh apne us haath ko bosa de, kyonki jab koi shakhs Khuda ki Raah mein kuchh deta hai to woh cheez Saael ke haath mein baad mein jaati hai pahle woh Khuda ke Haath mein jaati hai jaisake Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (Ayat 9:104)"_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

Note: 'Ayat *یَأۡخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ* ka ye matlab nahi ke Allah Sadaqat Apne Haath mein leta hai balke iska maqsad ye hai ke Allah Ahle Sadaqat ka Sadqa qubool karta hai aur unhe Sawab deta hai.'

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

💰

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ne jitni bhi cheezen paida ki hain unka koi na koi Khazin (Treasurer) hota hai siwai Sadqa ke. Allah Ta'ala Sadqe ko directly apni tahveel (qabze) mein le leta hai. Mere Waalid (as) ka dastoor tha ke jab woh kisi Saael ko Sadqa dete to phir uske haath se wo Sadqa utha lete aur use bosa dete the aur us cheez ki khushboo soongha karte the. Uske baad dubara wo cheez Saael ke haath mein thamate the."_

(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Zainul Abedin (as) bhi aisa hi karte the.

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Har cheez ke liye Allah ne koi na koi Farishta muakkal kiya hai, magar Sadqe par koi Farishta muakkal nahi hai, Sadqa direct Khuda ke Haath mein jata hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

💰

Hazrat Rasoole Akram (saww):

_"Do Khaslaten aisi hain ke mein un mein kisi ko apne saath sharik (share) karna pasand nahi karta. Pahli cheez mera Wuzu hai, kyonki iska talluq meri Namaz se hai aur doosri cheez mera Sadqa hai jise mein apne haath se Saael ke haath mein deta hun, kyonki Sadqa directly Khuda ke Haath mein jaata hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Ghar se nikalte waqt Sadqa de aur ye Dua padhe:

 *اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي اشْتَرَيْتُ بِهٰذِهِ الصَّدَقَةِ سَلَامَتِيْ وَ سَلَامَةَ سَفَرِيْ وَ مَا مَعِيَ اَللّٰهُمَّ احْفَظْنِيْ وَ احْفَظْ مَا مَعِيَ وَ سَلِّمْنِيْ وَ سَلِّمْ مَا مَعِيَ وَ بَلِّغْنِيْ وَ بَلِّغْ مَا مَعِيَ بِبَلَاغِكَ الْحَسَنِ الْجَمِيْلِ۔*

(Safar ki Dua - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM ALI NAQI (as)*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

**********************************

         *5th Mahe Rajab 1441*

      *1st March 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

               ♦ _*AAMAAL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1417)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقُلِ ٱعۡمَلُوا۟ فَسَیَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَیُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Aap kah dijiye tum log Amal karte raho tumhare Amal ko Allah aur Uska Rasool aur Ahle Imaan (Aimma) dekh rahe hain. Phir tum Uski taraf paltaye jaaoge Jo hazir o ghayeb ka Jannewala hai. Woh tumhe tumhare Aamal ki khabar dega."_

(Surah Taubah: 105)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚 📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab Qayamat ka Din hoga to Arsh ki dahni janib ek Minbar nasb kiya jayega, jis ki 24 Seedhiyan hongi. Itne mein Hazrat Ali ibne Talib (as) aayenge, unke haath mein 'Lewa e Hamd' (Flag) hoga aur woh us Minbar par baithenge. Makhlooq unke saamne pesh ki jayegi. Jo Ali (as) ko pahchanta hoga woh Jannat mein dakhil kiya jayega aur jo Ali (as) ka Na-aashna hoga use Dozakh mein dala jayega. (Other Meaning: Jise Ali (as) pahchanenge woh Jannat mein jayega aur jisko Ali (as) na pahchanege woh Dozakh mein dala jayega. Isliye Ali (as) Qaseemul Jannah wan Naar hain). Aur iska ishaara Allah ne Qur'an Majeed ki is Ayat mein hai (9:105)"_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya ke is Ayat mein *مؤمنون* se maani Aimma  (Imams) hain.

(Usoole Kaafi)

Imam Baqir (as): ' *مؤمنون* se murad Hazrat Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) hain.

(Noorus Saqlain)

📖

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Har Subah Nek aur Bad afraad ke taman Aamaal Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein pesh kiye jate hain.....Logo! Tum Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko kyon takleef dete ho? Kya tum nahi jaante ke tumhare Aamaal unki Khidmat mwin pesh kiye jaate hain? Jab AanHazrat (saww) un mein se koi Ma'siyyat (Gunah) dekhte hain to unhe isse aziyyat pahunchti hai. Lehaza Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko aziyyat na pahunchao. Unhe khush karne ki koshish karo."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

📝

Imam Baqir (as):

"Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Ayat (8:32) ke bare mein sawal kiya ke 'Aap (saww) ka wujood jab tak hai Azaab nazil nahi hoga. Aap (saww) ka juda hona bhi behtar hai' wo kaise?

AanHazrat (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Tumhare Aamaal har Jumerat aur Somwar ke Din mere saamne pesh kiye jate hain. Mein tumhare Aamaal mein jab Bhalai dekhta hun to Allah ki Hamd karta hun aur jab Burai dekhta hun uske liye Khuda se tumhare liye Maghferat talab karta hun."_

_"Allah har Momin ke Gunah Ma'af kar deta hai, albatta jiske aur uske Bhai ke darmiyan Bughz ho to use Ma'af nahi karta."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Kitab Jafar bin Mohd Ad dawarleti, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Maabud!........ Mere Sardaar! Shayad ke Tu ne mujhe Apni bargaah se hattka diya aur Apni khidmat se door kar diya hai. Ya shayad Tu ne dekha ke maine Tujh se mu'nh pher liya hai to mujhe bura samajh liya. Shayad Tu ne dekha ke main jhooto'n mein se hoo'n, to mujhe mere haal par chhor diya. Ya shayad, Tu dekhta hai ke main Teri ne'mato'n ka shukr adaa nahi karta to mujhe mehroom kar diya hai. Ya shayad Tu ne mujhe Ulema ki majlis (gathering) mein nahi paaya to is bina par Tu ne mujhe zaleel kar diya hai. Ya shayad Tu ne mujhe gaafil dekha to uspar mujhe Apni Rehmat se maayus kar diya hai. Ya shayad Tu ne mujhe bekaar ki baatein karne waalo'n mein dekh to mujhe unhi mein rehne diya. Ya shayad, Tu meri Dua ko sun'na pasand nahi karta to mujhe parey kar diya. Shayad Tu ne mujhe mere jurm o gunah ka badla diya hai. Ya shayad maine Tujh se hayaa karne mein kami ki, to mujhe ye sazaa mili."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *6th Mahe Rajab 1441*

      *2nd March 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*AMR-E-ILAHI KE UMMEEDWAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1418)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا یُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا یَتُوبُ عَلَیۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمࣱ.*

_"Kuchh doosre hain jinka mamela abhi Khuda ke Hukm par thehra hua hai chahe to inhe saza de aur agar chahe to unki Tauba qubool kare. Allah sab kuchh Jannewala aur Hikmatwala hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 106)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚 📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Isse woh log murad hain jo pahle Mushrik the, aur unhone Zamana e Shirk mein Hazrat Hamza (as) aur Hazrat Jafar (as) jaise afraad ko Shaheed Kiya. Phir unhone Islam qubool kar liya aur Tauheed e Khuda par Imaan laaye aur Shirk ko chhod diya lekin unke Dilon mein Imaan ki Hararat dakhil na ho saki isliye woh Momin e Kamil na ban sake aur ke unke liye Jannat Wajib hoti aur Kufr o Shirk ko chhod chuke the. Isiliye unhe Kafir bhi nahi kaha jaa sakta aur unhe Dozakhi bhi nahi jaha ja sakta. Unka mamla Hukm e Khuda par thehra hua hai chahe to Woh unhe Azaab de aur chahe to Woh unli Tauba qubool kare."_

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Usoole Kaafi, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ye Ahle Wilayat hain. Ye Wilayat Deeni nahi hai, albatta Nikah, Miraas aur Ikhtelat ki Wilayat hai. Kyonki woh Momin nahi hain aur woh Kafir bhi nahi hain. Unka mamla Hukm e Khuda par thehra hua hai."_

(Kiyan Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Anjaam e Akherat ke lehaz se logon ki 6 aqsaam hain:_

_(1) Ahle Imaan (2) Ahle Kufr (3) Mustaz'afeen (4) Hukm e Ilahi ke Ummeedwar (5) Apne Gunahon ke etraaf karnewale jinhone Nek Bad mix kar diye hain (6) Ahle Aaraaf."_

_"Ahle Imaan se Jannat ka Waada hai. Ahle Kufr se Dozakh ka waada hai. Baqi chaaron ka maamla Khuda par thehra hua hai, chahe to Woh unhe Azaab de, chaahe to unhe Ma'af kar de, aur unki Tauba qubool kare."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Hamari Mohabbat ke baaz daawedaar hamare Shiyo'n ke liye Dajjaal se bhi zyada zarar-rasaa'n (harmful) hain."_

Raawi ne kaha, "Farzand e Rasul (as.), wo kaise?" Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Hamare Dosto'n se dushmani karte hain aur hamare Dushmano'n se dosti karte hain. Aur jab aisa hone lage to Haq baatil ke saath makhloot (mix) ho jaata hai aur Momin o Munafiq ki pehchaan khatm ho jaati hai."_

(Ausaaf ush Shia - Shaikh Sadooq, p33)

🤲🏻

*يَا خَيْرَ مَدْعُوٍّ وَ اَكْرَمَ مَرْجُوٍّ......*

(A part of Dua of Dahwul Arz - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *7th Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *3rd March 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MASJID-E-ZERAAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1419)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مَسۡجِدࣰا ضِرَارࣰا وَكُفۡرࣰا وَتَفۡرِیقَۢا بَیۡنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَإِرۡصَادࣰا لِّمَنۡ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُۚ وَلَیَحۡلِفُنَّ إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَاۤ إِلَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَٱللَّهُ یَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ *  لَا تَقُمۡ فِیهِ أَبَدࣰاۚ...*

_"Aur jin logon ne Masjid e Zeraar banai ke iske zariye Islam ko nuqsaan pahunchayen aur Kufr ko Taqwiyyat bakhshen aur Mo'meneen ke darmiyan Tafreeq paida karen aur ise us shakhs ke liye Kamingah banayen jo isse pahle Khuda aur Rasool ke khilaaf barsare paikar rah chuka hai. Woh zaroor Qasmen kha kar kahenge ke hamara iraada to Bhalai ke siwa kisi doosri cheez ka na tha, halanke Khuda Gawahi deta hai ke ye sab jhoote hain. Aap is mein hargiz khade na hon."_

(Surah Taubah: 107)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafeqeen ka tazkara jaari hai.

Ek kaam Munafiqeen ne ye kiya ke unhone apni ek Masjid ki buniyad rakhi, jo aaj tak poori Duniya mein phaili hui hain.

🕌 👉🏻

"Kuchh Munafiqeen AanHazrat (saww) ki khidmat mein aaye aur unhone Aap (saww) se arz kiya ke ham apne Mohalle mein ek Masjid tameer karna chahte hain taake Kamzor aur Beemar afraad aur baad o baran ke waqt aam log wahan Namaz padh saken. Aap hame iski ijazat marhamat farmayen. Aap (saww) ne ijazat de di aur Masjid tayyar ho gayi. Us waqt AanHazrat (saww) Jange Tabuk ki tayyariyon mein masroof the. Us Masjid ki Opening  Munafiqeen Aapke paas aaye ke wahan Namaz padh kar iska Iftetah karen. Us waqt Aap (saww) Jang ki wajah se hazir nahi hue. Lekin jab Jang se wapas aaye to is Masjid ki mazammat mein ye Ayat nazil hui. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko is Masjid mein Allah ki taraf se khade hone ki bhi ijazat nahi thi balke Hukm hua ke Masjid e Quba mein Namaz padhen. Masjid e Zeraar ye naam nihaad Masjid Abu Aamir Raahib ke liye baunwan Kamingah banayi gayi thi, jabke woh Raahib Khuda o Rasool ke khilaaf barsare paikar rah chuka tha aur Munafiqeen iske baare mein Jhooti Qasmen khaa rahe the. Jabke inke Jhootepan ka Khuda gawah tha."

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Aaj bhi Masjiden alag alag khemon mein bati hui hain. Zaroori nahi har Masjid muqaddas ho, iska daromadar banane wale par hai. Isliye Musalman ko chahiye is baat ka zaroor dhiyan de ke Masjid ki buniyad kiya hai. Kahin ye Masjid e Zerar ki tarah to nahi jo fauran demolish kara di gayi.

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as) se riwayat:

Jab Masjid e Zeraar ke mutalliq ye Ayat nazil hui to Rasoole Khuda (saww) Aamir bin Adi aur Malik bin Dakhaham Khuzai aur Zaid bin Haris ko is Masjid ko munhadim karne ke liye rawana kiya. Malik ne us Masjid mein Aag lagai jo Khajooron ke pedon se bani thi, chand lamhon mein wo khaak ho gayi aur diwaren bhi gira di gayin. Is Masjid ki jagah ko Kachra ghar bana diya ke log yaha ghalazat aur murdah Jaanwar phenken.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕌

Riwayat

" *Yazeed (la)* ne hukm diya ke Shohada e Karbala ke Sar Damishq ki *Jama Masjid* ke darwazo'n mein latkaye jaayen aur Sar e Mutahhar Imam Husain (as) *Minara e Masjid* par latkaya jaye. Chunanche aisa hi hua ke Imam Husain (as) ka Sar e Mutahhar *Minara e Masjid* par aur baaqi Shohada ke sar *Masjid* ke alag alag darwazo'n mein latkaye gaye. Log har roz tamasha dekhne aate rahe…Imam Husain (as) ka Sar e Mutahhar 40 roz o shab *Minara e Masjid* par latka raha aur is dauran Imam Zainul Abideen (as) Sar e Mubarak ki Ziyarat kiya karte the aur girya farmate the."

(Riaz ul Quds, v2, p695)

(Munafiqeen Masjidon ka estemal is tarah karte.)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha Apne Waqt ke Imam (as) ka jald zahoor farma taake woh in Munafiqeen ke addon ko ukhad pheken.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *8th Mahe Rajab 1441*

   *4th March 2020, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MASJID KI BUNIYAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1420)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَا تَقُمۡ فِیهِ أَبَدࣰاۚ لَّمَسۡجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنۡ أَوَّلِ یَوۡمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِیهِۚ فِیهِ رِجَالࣱ یُحِبُّونَ أَن یَتَطَهَّرُوا۟ۚ وَٱللَّهُ یُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُطَّهِّرِینَ *  أَفَمَنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡیَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَ ٰ⁠نٍ خَیۡرٌ أَم مَّنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡیَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارࣲ فَٱنۡهَارَ بِهِۦ فِی نَارِ جَهَنَّمَۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یَهۡدِی ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ *  لَا یَزَالُ بُنۡیَـٰنُهُمُ ٱلَّذِی بَنَوۡا۟ رِیبَةࣰ فِی قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَّاۤ أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِیمٌ حَكِیمٌ.*

_"Aap us (Masjid e Zaraar) mein hargiz khade na hona. Aap ke khade hone ke liye wohi Masjid zyada mauzun hain *jo Awwal Roz se hi Taqwa par qayem ki gayi hai.* Is mein aise log rahte hain jo Paak rahna pasand karte hain aur Allah ko Pakeeza afraad pasand hain."_

_"Kya jisne apni Buniyad Khaufe Khuda aur Raza e Ilahi par rakhi hai woh behtar hai ya jisne apni Buniyad kisi ghaati ke kinare par jo ke girne ke kagar par ho, ke wo saari Imaarat ko le kar Jahannum mein gir jaye? Allah Zulm karnewalon ko kabhi Seedhi Raah nahi dikhata."_

_"Ye Imaarat jo unhone banayi hai hamesha unke Dilon mein be yaqeeni ki jad bani rahegi bajuz iske unke Dil hi tukde tukde ho jayen. Allah Sahibe Ilm aur Sahibe Hikmat hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 108 - 110)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Munafeqeen ka tazkara jaari hai.

Guzishta Ayat mein Munafiqeen ki banayi Masjid ka zikr hua jiski Buniyad Nifaaq par thi, jise gira diya gaya.

Is Ayat mein bayan ye hai ke Masjid ki Buniyad Taqwa hai aur is mein jo log hote hain woh Paak hote hain.

🕌 👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha gaya ke ye kaunsi Masjid hai jiske mutalliq Allah ne farmaya ke *iski Buniyad Roz e Awwal se hi Taqwe par rakhi gayi?* 

Imam (as) ne farmaya woh Masjid e Quba hai.

(Al Kaafi, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo bhi Ibaadat Ghairullah ki Raza ke liye sar anjam di jayegi woh rayega chali jayegi. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya Ayat (9:109). *Aur Taqwa ye hai ke mashkook cheez ke khauf se Insaan Insaan baaz jayez cheezon jo bhi khairbaad kah de."*_

(Taqwa means har jayez cheez mein bhi ehtiyat barte.)

(Misbahus Shariyah, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕌

Imam Baqir o Sadiq (as), Rasoole Khuda (saww):

"Is Ayat mein un Ahle Imaan ki taarif ki gayi hai jo Paishab Paikhana ke liye Paani istemal karte the."

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Mein apne chahne walon ko chahta hun aur apne se Bughz rakhne walon se Bughz rakhta hun....."_

_"Khuda ne jis Banda e Momin ke Dil ka Imtihaan liya hai to woh apne Dil mein hamari Mo'addat ki thandak mehsoos karta hai aur jis Bande par Khuda Naraz hota hai to woh apne Dil mein hamari Adawat mehsoos karta hai. Hamara Muhib Rehmat e Ilahi ka Muntazir rahta hai aur uske liye Rehmat ke Darwaze khul chuke hain, jabke hamse Bughz rakhne wala us girte hue kagare ke kinare par khada hai jo girega to seedha Dozakh mein hi jayega. Ahle Rehmat ko unka thikana Mubarak ho aur Ahle Dozakh ko unka thikana Mubarak ho."_

(Aamaali Shaikhut Taifa, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَئِمَّةَ الْهُدٰى اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَهْلَ التَّقْوٰى اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَيُّهَا الْحُجَجُ عَلٰۤى اَهْلِ الدُّنْيَا اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَيُّهَا الْقُوَّامُ فِي الْبَرِيَّةِ بِالْقِسْطِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَهْلَ الصَّفْوَةِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اٰلَ رَسُوْلِ اللّٰهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ اَهْلَ النَّجْوٰى...*

(Ziyarat e Aimma (as) Jannatul Baqi - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻

*WILADAT JANABE ALI ASGHAR (as) MUBARAK*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

**********************************

         *9th Mahe Rajab 1441*

    *5th March 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*JIHAAD KI FAZILAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1421)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشۡتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۚ یُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ فَیَقۡتُلُونَ وَیُقۡتَلُونَۖ وَعۡدًا عَلَیۡهِ حَقࣰّا فِی ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِیلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَٱسۡتَبۡشِرُوا۟ بِبَیۡعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِی بَایَعۡتُم بِهِۦۚ وَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ.*

_"Yaqeenan Allah ne Saheban e Imaan se unki Jaan aur Amwaal ko Jannat ke ewaz khareed liya hai. Ye log Raahe Khuda mein Jihaad karte hain, Qatl karte hain aur khud Qatl hote hain. Ye Waada Allah ke zimme ek Pukhta Ahd hai. Taurat, Injeel aur Qur'an mein har jagah iska Zikr maujood hai aur Khuda se badh kar Apne Ahd ko poora karnewala Kaun hai? Pas tum apne is Saude par khushiyan manao jo tum ne Khuda se chuka liya hai, yehi sabse badi Kamyabi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 111)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jihaad mein attack nahi balke Defense hai. Jihaadi Aantakwadi nahi hota. Koi Gunda Mawali Jihaadi nahi banta balke Jihaad karne wala Momin hota hai.

⚔ 👉🏻

Imam Baqir (as) ka Khat Khalifa e Bani Umayya ke naam:

_"Jihaad ke Amal ko Allah ne doosre Aamaal par Fazilat di hai aur Jihaad karnewale ko Khuda ne khusoosi darajat aur Maghferat o Rehmat ka mustaheq qarar diya hai. Jihaad Ghalba e Deen ka zariya hai aur Jihaad se hi Deen ka Difa kiya jata hai aur Jihaad hi ke zariye se Allah ne Mo'meneen se unki Jaano aue Amwaal ka Sauda kiya hai aur iske badle mein unhe Jannat ata ki hai aur ye sarasar faydemand Tijarat hai. Allah ne iske liye Hifz e Hudood ki sharayet aaed ki hai aur iski pahli shart ye hai ke Insaan doosre Insaano ki Ibaadat ke bajaye Allah ki Ibaadat kare aur Bando ki sarparasti se nikal kar Khuda ki Sarparasti mein dakhil ho jaye."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚔🗡

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Iske (Jihaad) kuchh Hudood o Quyood (Limits) hain. Jihaad jaisi ahm zimmedari har kisi ke bas mein nahi. Ye fariza makhsoos afraad ke liye hai. Wo Sharayet ye hain:"

"Neki ki Dawat aur Burai se mana karna (3:104). Is giroh ka talluq Ahle Haram se hai. Ghairullah ki Ibaadat nahi karte. Tameer e Ka'aba ke waqt is giroh ke liye Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Dua ki thi. Khuda ne isi giroh ke mutalliq gawahi di ke har Na-Paaki se Paak rakha. Sahibe Baseerat Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke follower yehi giroh hain jisne AanHazrat (saww) par sachche Dil se Imaan laye aur Aap (saww) ki tasdeeq ki, jiski Peshani Ghairullah ke Sajdon se daghdar na hui ho, jisne apne Imaan ke saath Zulm yani Shirk ko kabhi makhloot nahi kiya ho. (Yusuf:108), (Anfaal:64). Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Pairokaro ke Ausaaf in Ayaton mein bayan kiye hain: (Al Fath:29), (Tehreem:8), (Al Momenon:1-11), (Al Furqan: 68-69) (Qare'een Quran mein ye Ayaat padh len) Allah ne aise hi afraad se Jannat ka Sauda kiya hai aur unki Jaano Maal khareed kar Jannat ka Maalik banaya hai aur iske Baynaame ko Khuda ne Taurat, Injeel aur Qur'an mein tehreer kiya hai. (9:111)"

(Riwayat ka mukhtasar khulasa)

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Khudaya! Mujhe bhi un logon mein se qarar de jinse Tu ne unki Jaano Maal ka Sauda kiya hai aur jinhone Tujh se kiye hue Iqrar ko nibhaya hai aur kisi tarah ki Bad-Ahdi aur Khilafwarzi nahi ki hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM MOHD TAQI (as)*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

**********************************

       *10th Mahe Rajab 1441*

       *6th March 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MOMIN KE SIFAAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1422)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلتَّـٰۤىِٕبُونَ ٱلۡعَـٰبِدُونَ ٱلۡحَـٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّـٰۤىِٕحُونَ ٱلرَّ ٰ⁠كِعُونَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدُونَ ٱلۡـَٔامِرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱلۡحَـٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ.*

_"Ye log Tauba karnewale, Ibaadat karnewale, Hamd e Parwardigar karnewale, Raahe Khuda mein Safar karnewale, Ruku Karnewale, Sajdah Karnewale, Nekiyon ka Hukm Karnewale, Buraiyyon se roknewale aur Hudood e Ilahi ki Hifazat Karnewale hain. Aap Ahle Imaan ko (Jannat ki) Basharat de den."_

(Surah Taubah: 112)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat se paiwast Mo'meneen ke Sifaat ka Zikr jaari hai.

👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Imam Zainul Abedin (as) Hajj ki adayegi ke liye Makkah jaa rahe the. Ibaad Basari ne Aap (as) se kaha ke Jang ka dushwar rasta chhod kar Hajj ka aramdeh rasta ikhtiyar kar liya jabke Qur'an mein ye Jihhad ki Ayat (9:111) hai."

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Iske aage wali Ayat (9:112) bhi padho. Jab hame in Sifaat se mutassif afraad milenge to ham Hajj ke bajaye inke saath shaamil ho kar Jihaad karna pasand karenge."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

📖

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Is Ayat mein *ٱلتَّـٰۤىِٕبُونَ ٱلۡعَـٰبِدُونَ* ke bajaye  *ٱلتَّـٰۤىِٕبِينَ ٱلۡعَـٰبِدِينَ* padho. Kyonki ye *ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ* ke Sifaat hain, (Arabic Grammar ke mutabiq) Majroor ki haalat mein hain."_

(e.g.: *ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ ٱلتَّـٰۤىِٕبِينَ ٱلۡعَـٰبِدِينَ.....* is tarah hai.)

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Ubay bin Ka'ab, Abdullah bin Masood aur A'mash ki Qiraat mein isi tarah hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🍁

 *Imam Mohd Taqi (as):*

_"Jo baghair Ilm ke amal karega wo islaah karne se zyada tabaahi machaayega."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p209)

📖

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Kya koi Jawan Mard hai jo is chabaye hue Luqme (Duniya) ko uske Ahl ke liye chhod de? Tumhare Nafson ki Qeemat sirf Jannat hai, lehaza Jannat ke alawa aur kisi qeemat par inhe na becho."_

_" Jisne tumko Maal o Mataa' (Provision) bakhsha hai Uski Raah mein tum ise sarf nahi karte aur na apni Jaano ko Uske liye khatre mein dalte ho, Jisne unko paida kiya hai."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤝🏻

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Ahle Imaan se Aalam e Musaaq (World of Covenant) mein unki Jaan o Maal ka sauda kiya tha aur woh log Zamana e Raja'at mein apne Waade ki takmeel karenge."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*واَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ اَمِيْرُ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ الْحَقُّ الَّذِيْ نَطَقَ بِوِلَايَتِكَ التَّنْزِيْلُ وَ اَخَذَ لَكَ الْعَهْدَ عَلَى الْاُمَّةِ بِذٰلِكَ الرَّسُوْلُ وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ وَ عَمَّكَ وَ اَخَاكَ الَّذِيْنَ تَاجَرْتُمُ اللّٰهَ بِنُفُوْسِكُمْ، فَاَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ فِيْكُمْ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ اشْتَرٰى مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَ اَمْوَالَهُمْ بِاَنَّ لَهُمُ الْجَنَّةَ يُقَاتِلُوْنَ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ فَيَقْتُلُوْنَ وَ يُقْتَلُوْنَ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّا فِيْ التَّوْرٰيةِ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلِ وَ الْقُرْاٰنِ وَ مَنْ اَوْفٰى بِعَهْدِهِ مِنَ اللّٰهِ فَاسْتَبْشِرُوْا بِبَيْعِكُمُ الَّذِيْ بَايَعْتُمْ بِهِ وَ ذٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيْمُ. التَّاۤئِبُوْنَ الْعَابِدُوْنَ الْحَامِدُوْنَ السَّاۤئِحُوْنَ الرَّاكِعُوْنَ السَّاجِدُوْنَ الْاٰمِرُوْنَ بِالْمَعْرُوْفِ وَ النَّاهُوْنَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ وَ الْحَافِظُوْنَ لِحُدُوْدِ اللّٰهِ وَ بَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَشْهَدُ يَاۤ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَنَّ الشَّآكَّ فِيْكَ مَاۤ اٰمَنَ بِالرَّسُوْلِ الْاَمِيْنِ وَ اَنَّ الْعَادِلَ بِكَ غَيْرَكَ عَانِدٌ [عَادِلٌ‏] عَنِ الدِّيْنِ الْقَوِيْمِ الَّذِي ارْتَضَاهُ لَنَا رَبُّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ وَ اَكْمَلَهُ بِوِلَايَتِكَ يَوْمَ الْغَدِيْرِ وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ الْمَعْنِيُّ بِقَوْلِ الْعَزِيْزِ الرَّحِيْمِ*

(Ziyarat Roze Ghadeer - Mafateeh.)

Ye Dua is Ayat ki Tafseer hai ke Momin se murad Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) hain aur jo Sifaat is mein bayan kiye gaye hain woh sab Aap (as) mein paye jate hain.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *16th Mahe Rajab 1441*

   *12th March 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MUSHREKIN KE LIYE ISTEGHFAR NAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1423)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَا كَانَ لِلنَّبِیِّ وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ أَن یَسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ وَلَوۡ كَانُوۤا۟ أُو۟لِی قُرۡبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَیَّنَ لَهُمۡ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِیمِ *  وَمَا كَانَ ٱسۡتِغۡفَارُ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ لِأَبِیهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوۡعِدَةࣲ وَعَدَهَاۤ إِیَّاهُ فَلَمَّا تَبَیَّنَ لَهُۥۤ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوࣱّ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنۡهُۚ إِنَّ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ لَأَوَّ ٰ⁠هٌ حَلِیمࣱ.*

_"Nabi aur Ahle Imaan ki ye Shaan nahi hai ke woh Mushrekin ke liye Dua-e-Maghferat karen chahe woh unke Qarabatdar hi kyon na ho jabke un par ye baat khul chuki hai ke woh Jahannum ke mustaheq hain."_

_"Aur Ibrahim (as) ka unke Baap ke liye Isteghfar sirf us Waade ki bina par tha jo unhone usse kiya tha. Jabke unke liye wazeh ho gaya ke woh Dushman-e-Khuda hai to usse Bezaari (Tabarrah) ikhtiyar kar li. Yaqeenan Ibrahim (as) bahut zyada Tazarro' karnewala aur Burdbar the."_

(Surah Taubah: 113 - 114)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Quran Majeed mein Azar ko Ibrahim (as) ka ' *اب* - Ab' bataya hai. Jabke Azar Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke Waalid nahi balke Chacha the. Qur'an mein (2:133) mein Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ke Beton ne Hazrat Ibrahim (as), Hazrat Ismail (as) aur Hazrat Ishaaq (as) ko ' *آباء* - Fathers) kaha hai jabke Ibrahim (as) H. Yaqoob (as) ke Dada the, H. Ismail (as) H. Yaqoob (as) ke Chacha, H. Ishaaq (as) unki haqeeqi Walid the.

Hazrat Ibrahim (as) apne Haqeeqi Waalid ke liye hamesha Maghferat ki Dua karte rahe. (Ibrahim:41)

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Asl baat ye hai ke Ibrahim (as) ne usse Waada kiya tha ke agar usne Islam qubool kar liye to Aap (as) uske liye Maghferat talab karenge. Phir jab Aap (as) ne mehsoos kiya ke woh Dushman-e-Khuda hai to Aap (as) ne usse Bezaari (Tabarrah) ikhtiyar kar li."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

"Lafz ' *اوّاه* - Awwah'  ka matlab ye hai ke Aap (as) Khaufe Khuda se Aahen bhara karte the aur Ijabat e Dua ke liye Tazarro' o Aajezi se kaam lete the aur Ita'at e Khuda wandi ka hamesha pabandi karte the."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir & Imam Sadiq (as):

_"ke ' *اوّاه* - Awwah'  Kasrat se Dua karne wale ko kaha jata hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Aam Musalman is Ayat ki Tafseer is tarah karte hain ke jab Hazrat Abu Talib (as) ki wafat hui us waqt Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Aapse Kalma padhne ke liye kaha aur Aapne nahi padha to ye Ayat nazil hui. Ye Jaali hadis Bukhari, Muslim, Fakhre Raazi aur doosri Sunni Books mein maujood hai. Jabke saaf zahir hai ke Surah Taubah 9 AH mein Madine mein nazil hui, aur Hazrat Abu Talib (as) ki wafat Makkah mein hui 10 Be'sat (4 BH) (26 Rajab, 19th March) ko hui. Iska sirf ek Raavi hai Saeed bin Musayyab jo Dushman e Ali (as) tha. Isliye is riwayat mein Ta'assub ki jhalak dikhayi deti hai. Allama Amini ne is Raavi ki Dushmani ki bahut si misalen pesh ki hain. Ye ham sirf ikhtesar se kam lete hain.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

Imam Musa Kazim (as) se Raavi ne sawal kiya ke agar woh Christian Doctor se ilaaj karwai aur sahetyab ho jaye to kya uske liye Dua kar sakte hain?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Dua kar sakte ho lekin tumhari Dua use koi fayda nahi pahunchayegi."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Reza (as):

_'Yahoodi ya Nasrani ke liye is tarah Dua kar sakte ho:' Allah teri Duniya mein Barkat dale."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنِ الْكِبْرِيَاۤءُ رِدَآؤُهُ، يَا مَنْ لَاتُحْصٰى اٰلَآؤُهُ، يَا مَنْ لَا تُعَدُّ نَعْمَآؤُهُ.*

_"Aye Parwardigar jiska Naam Mubarak hai... Uski Kibriyai Uski Rida hai, Aye Woh Jiski Bakhshishon ahsa (count) nahi hai, Jiski Ne'mato'n ka shumar nahi hai..."_

(Joshane Kabir No. 76 - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *17th Mahe Rajab 1441*

      *13th March 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*RAAHE HIDAYAT MUNQATA NAHI HOTA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1424)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*
