*وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِیُضِلَّ قَوۡمَۢا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ یُبَیِّنَ لَهُم مَّا یَتَّقُونَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءٍ عَلِیمٌ *  إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ یُحۡیِۦ وَیُمِیتُۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِیࣲّ وَلَا نَصِیرࣲ.*

_"Allah ka ye tareeqa nahi ke logon ko Hidayat dene ke baad phir Gumrahi mein mubtila kare jab tak unhe saaf saaf na bataye ke unhe kin cheezon se bachna chahiye. Beshak Allah har cheez ka Jannewala hai. Yaqeenan Allah hi ke liye Aasmaanon aur Zameen ki Badshahat hai. Woh Zindagi bakhasta hai aur Maut deta hai. Khuda ke alawa tumhara koi Sarparast aur Madadgar nahi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 115 - 116)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Bahut si daleelen hai ke ye Duniya baghair kisi Hujjat e Khuda se khaali nahi rah sakti. Khuda ne hame is Duniya mein Lawaris nahi chhoda balke pahle 1,24,000 Anbiya bheje aur phir 12 Imam, jabke Barahvi Hujjat aaj bhi is Duniya mein maujood hai. Ye be Aqli ki baat hai ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) apni Ummat wa Islam ko Lawaris chhod gaye jaisa ke Sahih Muslim mein likha hai.

👉🏻

Riwayat:

"Allah Ta'ala jab tak naye Imam ka tarruf na kara de us waqt tak sabiq (pichhle) Imam ko Duniya se nahi uthata."

(Usoole Kaafi, Qurbul Asnaad, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

*حتى يعرفهم ما يرضيه و ما يسخطه*

_"Khuda kisi ko Azaab nahi karta jab tak use samjha na le ke kaunsi cheez Uski Raza ka sabab hain aur kaunsi Uske Ghazab ka mojib hain."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain, Vol 4,P-276)

Duniya mein saari Bala o Musibaton ka sabab yehi hai ke logon ne Khuda ke muqarrar karda Numainde ko chhod kar idhar udhar bhatak rahe hain. Agar ham Aaj ke Imam (as) se tamassuk ikhtiyar karen to ye Corona warona ki koi haisiyyat nahi.

Sab se pahle to hame ye pukhta Aqeeda hona chahiye ke hamari Maut o Hayaat ka Maalik Allah hai. Ab agar koi la ilaaj Bimaari kisi ko lag jaye to siwai Khuda ke kaun bacha sakta hai. Jisne Bimaari paida ki Us hi ke aage gidgayenge. Beta apne Baap se pitta hai phir usi ko pakad kar rota hai, usi ka daman thame rahta hai, kisi aur ke paas nahi jata. Lekin Allah baghair Waseele ke nahi sunta. Allah ne Apni Hujjat ko is Kaynat mein baqi rakha hai, hamari faryad usi ke zariye Allah tak pahunchegi.

Bimaari khud Momin ke liye Imtihaan hai, jabke Kafir ke liye Azaab hai. Jab Allah kisi Momin ko chahta hai lekin Khuda ye dekhta hai ye uske Gunahon ki wajah se Dozakh mein jaa sakta hai to Allah usko Musibat, Bala o Bimaariyon mein mubtila karke uske Gunah is Duniya mein dho deta hai, taake Akherat mein woh Neekhar Dhula hua pesh ho. Jabke Kafir ko Allah chhod deta hai. Lekin agar ham dekhen ke Kafir aisho araam mein hai matlab Allah uski kuchh Nekiyon ki jaza is Duniya mein de kar khatm kar deta hai, pas Akherat mein woh Gunahon ka pulanda le kar hazir hoga. Lehaza ghabhraye nahi ye Imtijhan ki Duniya hai.

(Aajkal bahut si afwahen ghoomti rahti hain, ye sab Imaan ki kamzori hai.)

Aajkal Coronavirus ke liye ham yehi kah sakte hain, Zalim ke liye uske Zulm ki wajah se Azaab hai, jabke Mo'meneen ke liye Imtihaan ki ghadi hai. Mo'meneen ko chahiye ke is Imtihaan mein Kamyabi ke liye sirf aur sirf Hazrat e Hujjat (atfs) se Tawassul karen. Uska bas wahid Hal (Solution) yehi hai.

(Iski bahut misalen, waqeat hain jiske liye yaha jagah nahi hai. Mazeed tafseelat ke liye is silsile mein Books refer karen.)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

Allah Ta'ala:

_"Balaa o Musibat se maayus mat ho; Jaise Sona aag mein pighla kar parkha jaata hai waise Momin Balaa'on mein parkha jaata hai."_

(Al-Hadith Al-Qudsi - ABISN, Nairobi, Kenya)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Namaz e Shab padha karo. Ye Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ki Sunnat hai, tumse pehle waale Swaliheen ki aadat hai aur tumhare jismo'n se Bimariyaa'n door karti hai."_

(Sawaabul Aamaal, p89)

🤲🏻

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Baare Ilaha! Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo nuzool e Bala ka sabab hote hain......_

_...Khudaya! Kitni hi Azeem Balayen hain jinse Tu ne bachaya hai......._

_....Parwardigar! Tu Jaanta hai ke mein Duniya ki mamooli si Balaa aur chhoti si sakhti ko bardasht nahi kar sakta aur mere liye iski nagawariyan na qabile tahammul hain jabke ye Balayen qaleel (little) aur inki muddat mukhtasar hai. To mein un Akherat ki Bala'on ko kis tarah bardasht karunga jinki sakhtiyan Azeem, jinki muddat taweel, aur jinka qayam daymi (permanent) hai. Jin mein takhfeef ka koi bhi imkaan nahi *isliye ke ye Balayen Tere Ghazab aur Inteqaam ka nateeja hain* aur inki taab Zameen o Aasman  nahi la sakte to mein ek Banda e Zaeef, Haqeer, Miskeen o Bechara kiya hasiyyat rakhta hun."_

(Dua-e-Kumail - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

        *18th Mahe Rajab 1441*

    *14th March 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                 ♦ _*TAUBA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1425)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِیِّ وَٱلۡمُهَـٰجِرِینَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِی سَاعَةِ ٱلۡعُسۡرَةِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا كَادَ یَزِیغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِیقࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِهِمۡ رَءُوفࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ *  وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَـٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِینَ خُلِّفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰۤ إِذَا ضَاقَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَظَنُّوۤا۟ أَن لَّا مَلۡجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّاۤ إِلَیۡهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ لِیَتُوبُوۤا۟ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِیمُ.*

_"Yaqeenan Allah ne Nabi aur un Muhajerin o Ansaar par Tawajjo farmayi, jinhone tangi ke waqt mein Paighambar ka saath diya. Agarche un mein kuchh logon ke Dil kaji ki taraf maael ho chuke the. Allah ne unki Tauba ko qubool kiya. Woh un par bada Tars khaanewala, Meherbani Karnewala hai."_

_"Aur Allah ne un Teeno par bhi Rahem kiya, jo Jihaad se peechhe reh gaye, yahan tak ke jab Zameen apni wus'aton sameet un par tang ho gayi aur unki apni jaane bhi un par baar hone lagi aur unhone jaan liya ke Allah se bachne ke liye koi jaaye panah khud Allah hi ke Daman e Rehmat ke siwa kahin nahi hai to Allah ne un par Tawajjo farmayi taake woh Tauba kar len. Yaqeenan Woh Bada Ma'af Karnewala aur Rahim hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 117 - 118)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaat ke zel mein unke bahanebaazi ke bare mein zikr kar chuke hain.

Ghazwa e Tubuk ke waqt bahut se Munafiqeen ne khud sakhta heele banane banakar ghar mein rahne ki ijazat hasil kar li thi aur AanHazrat (saww) ke 3 mukhlis Sahabi yani Ka'ab bin Malik Shayer, Murarah bin Rabee' aur Hilal bin Umayya bhi is Jang mein sharik nahi ho sake the aur woh aaj aur kal ke chakkaron mein giraftar rahe. Ka'ab ke paas Jang par jaane ke liye poora samaan nahi tha. Aise hi aaj kal karte karte din beet gaye. Rasoole Khuda (saww) unke in heele bahane se naraaz hue, yahan tak ke unke bhaiyyon aur Biwiyon ne bhi unse munh mod liya. Tab in teeno ne kaha ke jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) hamse naraz hain aur Rishtedaron ne bhi talluqat khatm kar diye hai to unhone iraada kiya ke chalo Pahad par chalen aur wahan Khuda se gidgida kar Tauba ki darkhwast karen.

Chunanche teeno Sahabi Pahad par chale gaye. Din ko Roza rakhte, poora Din Namaz padh kar Khuda se Maghferat talab karte. Unhone socha ke jab sab hamse naraz hain to ham apas mein kyon khush hain, isliye teeno alaihda alaihda ho gaye aur us Pahad par tano tanha rahe, giya o buka karne lage aur tahayya kar liya ke jab tak Khuda unki Tauba qubool na kare, wahin mar jayenge.

Teesri Raat jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) Janabe Umme Salma ke ghar par the to ye Ayat (9:118) nazil hui aur unki Tauba qubool ho gayi."

Jab unko ye Ayat sunayi gayi tab woh Pahad se neeche utre.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Jo Aatish e Jahannum se darega wo Allah se apne gunaho'n ke baare mein jaldi Tauba karega aur Haraam kaam karne se bachega."_

(Tuhfal Uqool, p281, Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)

🙏🏻

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab saa'ns yahaa'n tak aa jaaye (ishara kiya apne halq ki taraf), to oos waqt Aalim ki Tauba to qubool na hogi, albatta jaahil ki hogi."_

(Al Kaafi, v5, p41)

🤲🏻

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Khudaya! Tera Qaher Ghalib, aur Teri Qudrat naafiz hai aur Teri Hukumat se Faraar na mumkin hai. Khudaya! Mere Gunahon ke liye Bakhshnewala, mere Uyoob ko Pardaposhi Karnewale, mere Qabeeh Aamaal ko Nekiyon mein tabdeel karnewala Tere alawa koi nahi hai.."_

(Dua-e-Kumail - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *19th Mahe Rajab 1441*

      *15th March 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*SADEQEEN KE SAATH HO JAO*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1426)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِینَ.*

_"Aye Ahle Imaan! Allah se darte raho aur *Sachchon* ke saath ho jao."_

(Surah Taubah: 119)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Ayat Ahle Bait (as) ke Pairokar banne ki dawat de rahi hai.

🕌

Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Reza (as):

_"Allah ne jis Jamat e Sadeqeen ke saath rehne ka Hukm diya hai woh Jamat e Sadeqeen ham hain."_

(Manaqib Ibne Shahre Ashoob, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Allah ne kuchh logon ko Ilm ka Ahl muqarrar kiya hai aur unki ita'at ko farz qarar diya hai aur unke liye farmaya hai: Ayat (9:119)"_

(Ehtejaaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Hazrat Ali (as) ne Masjide Nabawi mein daur e Khilafat e Usman mein farmaya:

_"Aye Girohe Sahaaba! Jab ye Ayat (9:119) nazil hui to Salman Farsi ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se arz kiya: Kya ye Ayat Aam hai ya khas? AanHazrat (saww) ne farmaya tha: "Aam Ahle Imaan ko iska Hukm diya gaya hai aur Sadeqeen se mera bhai Ali (as) aur Qayamat tak aanewale mere Ausiya murad hain." Kiya tumne ye baat suni thi? "_

Sab maujood Ashaab ne kaha: Ji haan.

(Kamaluddin, Kitab Sulaim bin Qais, Noorus Saqlain)

📖

Mashoor Sunni Mufassir Fakhre Raazi:

"Is Ayat ne Qayamat tak ke liye Ummat ko do hisso mein taqseem kar diya hai. Ek hissa woh hai jinhe ye Hukm diya gaya hai ke woh Allah se darte raho aur Sachcho ke saath ho jayen. Agar Giroh se ghalti aur Khata ka imkaan hai isliye Allah ne ye farmaya taake ghaltiyon se bach saken."

"Aur Ummat ka doosra hissa Jamate Sadeqeen par mushtamil hai aur ye Masoom Jamaat hai aur Kaynat mein jab tak ye Ayat baqi rahegi us waqt tak Masoom ka koi na koi Fard baqi rahega. Kyonki ye baat na mumkin hai ke Ghair Masoom ko Hukm diya jaye ke woh Sadeqeen ke saath ho jayen aur phir amali taur par Sadeqeen Jamaat maujood na ho."

(Tafseer e Kabir)

(To be Cont'd......)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Siddiq 3 hain:_

_(1) Momin e Aal e Yasin Habib Najjaar Siddiq hai jisne apni qaum ko Ambiya (as) ki Pairavi ki Dawat di thi,_

_(2) Hizqeel Momin e Aal e Firoun Siddiq hai,_

_(3) Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) Siddiq hai aur wo un sab se afzal hain._

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v7, p404)

🤲🏻

*صَلِّ عَلَى الْخَلَفِ الْهَادِي الْمَهْدِيِّ اِمَامِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ وَارِثِ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ حُجَّةِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ، اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَهْلِ بَيْتِهِ الْاَئِمَّةِ الْهَادِيْنَ الْعُلَمَاۤءِ الصَّادِقِيْنَ الْاَبْرَارِ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ.....*

(Salwat Abul Hasan Zarab Isfahani - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE WILADAT OF JANABE SAKINA (sa)*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

**********************************

       *20th Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *16th March 2020, Monday*

💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐

_*Read the Biography of Janabe Sakina (sa), click:*_

http://www.duas.org/sakina.htm

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*SADEQEEN KE SAATH HO JAO*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1427)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَا كَانَ لِأَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِینَةِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ أَن یَتَخَلَّفُوا۟ عَن رَّسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا یَرۡغَبُوا۟ بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ لَا یُصِیبُهُمۡ ظَمَأࣱ وَلَا نَصَبࣱ وَلَا مَخۡمَصَةࣱ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا یَطَـُٔونَ مَوۡطِئࣰا یَغِیظُ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَلَا یَنَالُونَ مِنۡ عَدُوࣲّ نَّیۡلًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلࣱ صَـٰلِحٌۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا یُضِیعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِینَ.*

_"Ahle Madina aur uske atraaf mein rehnewale Dihaatiyon ko ye Haq nahi hai aur woh Allah ke Rasool ko chhod kar ghar jayen aur apne Nufoos ko unke Nufoos se zyada aziz jane isliye ke unhe jo koi Pyaas, Thakan aur Jismaani mashaqqat Rahe Khuda mein mehsoos hoti hai aur woh jab bhi koi aisa qadam uthate hain jo Munkarin e Haq ke liye nagawar hota hai aur jab bhi woh kisi Dushman se Adawat e Haq ka koi Inteqaam lete hain to uske badle unke liye Amal e Saleh likha jata hai. Yaqeenan Khuda Neki karnewalon ke Ajr ko zaye nahi karta."_

(Surah Taubah: 120)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd)

Guzishta Ayat ki Tafseer jaari.

🕌

Khutba Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Aye logo! Agah raho! Mujhe Qur'an Majeed mein kuchh Asmaa' (Names) se makhsoos kiya gaya hai. Un Naamo par qabiz hone ki jasaarat na karna warna tum apne Deen se gumrah ho jaoge. Allah ka farman hai (Ayat 9:119). Aur woh Sadiq mein hun."_

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Is Ayat (9:119) ka mafhoom hai ke tum Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ke saath ho jao."_

(Amaali Shaikhut Taifa, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕌

Abu Hamza Sumali ne Hazrat Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se arz kya: 'Maula! Mein kaunsa amal baja laon jisse Haqeeqat e Imaan ki takmeel ho jaye?'

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Tum Khuda ke Mehboob Bandon yaani Hazrat Mohd Mustafa (saww), Ali Murtaza (as), Hasan (as), Husain (as), Ali bin Husain (as), aur mujh se aur meri god mein baithe hue mere is farzand Jafar (as) se Muhabbat rakho. Jo bhi in se Muhabbat rakhega to woh tamam Auliya e Khuda se Muhabbat rakhega aur inse Muhabbat rakhnewala 'Koonu minas Sadeqeen' ki Ayat par Amal karnewala qarar payega."_

Is Ayat se murad Aimma (as) hain.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Dua e Ghadeer:

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Parwardigar! Tu ne hame Apne muqarrar kardah Sahibane Amr ki Ita'at ka Hukm diya hai aur Tu ne hame "Sadeqeen" ke saath ho jane ka Hukm diya hai aur Tu ne farmaya hai (4:59) aur Tu ne farmaya (9:119). Parwardigar! Ham ne Tere Farman ki Ita'at ki. Hame sabit qadam rakha aur hame Farmanbardari ki haalat mein Maut dena. Apne Auliya ki Tasdeeq Kuninda hone ki haalat mein hamari Rooh qabz karna aur apni taraf se Hidayat dene ke baad hamare Dilon ko kaj na hone dena aur hame apni taraf se Rehmat ata farma. Beshak Tu bahut zyada ata karne wala hai."_

(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *21st Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *17th March 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*SACHCHON KA SAATH DO*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1428)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا یُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةࣰ صَغِیرَةࣰ وَلَا كَبِیرَةࣰ وَلَا یَقۡطَعُونَ وَادِیًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمۡ لِیَجۡزِیَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Isi tarah se aisa kabhi nahi hoga ke woh (Rahe Khuda) mein thoda ya bahut koi kharch uthayen aur (Jihaad ke liye) koi waadi paar karen aur unke Haq mein use likh na liya jaye, taake Khuda unhe unke achhe Aamaal ka behtar silah ata kare."_

(Surah Taubah: 121)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat mein ye zikr hua tha ke hame Apne Rahbarane Deen ko nahi chhodna chahiye. Rasoole Khuda (saww) aur unke Ausiya (as) ki Zindagi hamari Zindagi se zyada Aula hai. Isliye Ghadeer mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) yehi farmaya tha *الست اولى بكم من انفسكم* Sabhi ne kaha 'Kyonki nahi.' Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ke "jiska mein Maula hun uske ye Ali Maula hain." Isi ko Wilayat kahte hain. Jab hamne unki Wilayat qubool ki to hamari zimmedari hai ke apne aapko unke hawale sipurd karden. Unki har unke Dushman se hifazat karen. Jo shakhs is kaam mein lag jata hai na Pyaas lagti hai, na thakan, na aur koi takleef hoti hai. Allah unke har kaam Ajr dega, kyonki Allah Adil hai kisi ki bhi Neki zaye nahi hogi. Chahe koi amal chhota ho ya bada.

👉🏻

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Khuda ne jis Bande se kisi achche kaam karne par Ajr o Sawaab ka waada farmaya hai, Wo use zaroor poora kar ke rahega. Aur jis Bande ko kisi bure kaam karne par sazaa dene ki dhamki di hai, usme Use ikhtiyaar hai (ke sazaa de ya Ma'af kar de kyunki Uska sazaa dena Adl hai aur Ma'af karna Fazl hai)."_

(Wasaail ush Shia, v1, p80)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Yaqeenan Akherat ki Niyyat se Duniya ka jo kaam karoge uska Ajr (Sawab) Duniya mein milega lekin Duniya ki Niyyat se jo Akherat ka kaam karoge, Allah uska Ajr hargiz nahi dega."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p36)

🏥

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Kisi Bimari (ya kisi dard) ki wajah se Raat ko jaagte rehna (Khuda ke nazdeek) Ajr o Sawaab ke aitbaar se ek saal ki Ibadat se afzal o aazam hai."_

(Wasaail ush Shia, v2, p96)

🤲🏻

*وَ اَنْتَ يَا مَوْلَايَ كَرِيْمٌ مِنْ اَوْلَادِ الْكِرَامِ وَ مَأْمُوْرٌ بِالضِّيَافَةِ وَ الْاِجَارَةِ فَاَضِفْنِيْ وَ اَجِرْنِيْ صَلَوَاتُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰى اَهْلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ۔*

(Ziyarat e Juma Imam e Zaman (atfs) -Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *23rd Mahe Rajab 1441*

      *19th March 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

               ♦ _*TAQLEED*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:  📚

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَا كَانَ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنْفِرُوا كَافَّةً ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِنْ كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍ مِنْهُمْ طَائِفَةٌ لِيَتَفَقَّهُوا فِي الدِّينِ وَلِيُنْذِرُوا قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوا إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ*

_"Munasib nahi ke sab ke sab Mo'meneen (Ijtehad ki taraf) kooch karen. Kyon na har group mein se ek kooch kare, taake Deen mein Fiqh (Islam ke Ma'arif e Ahkam ki gahri samajh) hasil karen aur apni qaum ki taraf wapas aa kar unhe daraen taake woh (Hukm e Khuda ki mukhtalifat se) daren."_

(Surah Tauba: 122)

📚📖 📕

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*قال الامام المهدى (ع):*

*" أما الحوادث الواقعة فارجعوا فيها إلى رواة حديثنا، فإنهم حجتى عليكم و أنا حجة الله عليهم."*

_"Har zamane mein pesh aane wale hawades (aur waqeat, problems) mein hamari Ahadees bayan karne wale Raaviyon (Mujtahedin) ki taraf rujoo' karo, kyonki woh tum par hamari Hujjat hain aur mein un par Khuda ki Hujjat hun."_

(Ref: Kamaluddin, Vol 2, P-484, H-10, Al ghaiba Shaikh Toosi, P-291, H-247, Ehtejaaj, Vol 2, P-284, Aalamul Wara, Vol 2, P-271, Kashful Ghumma, Vol 3, P-338, Al Kharaej wal Jaraeh, Vol 3, P-1114, Biharul Anwaar, Vol 53, P-181, H-10, Wasaelus Shia, Vol 27, P-140, H-33424)

Imam Mahdi (as) ne Ishaq bin Yaqoob ke sawal ka ye jawab diya. Ayat ke mutabiq ye zaroori nahi ke sab Mujtahid bane, lekin baaz afraad is mansab par faez ho sakte hain. Ye Fuqaha Deen ki gahrai se study karte hain aur hamare problems ka Ahadees ki roshni mein hal nikalte hain. Baqi comon logon ke liye zaroori, balke wajib hai ke in Mujtahid ki Taqleed karen. Aur ye Fuqaha e Karam is hadis ke mutabiq Imam ki taraf se muqarrar hain, to inki khilaf warzi Imam ke farman ki mukhalifat hogi. Isliye is Zamana e Ghaibat e Kubra mein ham aam Mo'meneen ke liye Aalam Mujtahid ki Taqleed Wajib hai. Jaise ham apni Bimaari ke ilaaj ke liye Doctor ko refer karte hain. Makan banane ke liye Engineer ko, usi tarah Deeni Masael mein Religious Expert ko refer kiya jata hai.

Chunke ham apne Imam ki Ghaibat mein ek Aalam ko follow kar rahe hain, isliye is zamane mein woh Nayeb e Imam ki hasiyat rakhta hai. Hame ye ikhtiyar hai jo Mujtahid ki Sifat par fit baithe usko follow karen.

Fuqaha ki kya Sifaat honi chahiye wo is hadis mein mulaheza farmayen:

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚

Imam Hasan Askari (as):

*«فأما من كان من الفقهاء صائنا لنفسه، حافظا لدينه، مخالفا على هواه، مطيعا لأمر مولاه، فللعوام أن يقلدوه*

_"Fuqaha mein se jo_

_(1) Apne Nafs ki hifazat karne wala ho aur_

_(2) Deen ki hifazat karne wala ho,_

_(3) Khwaishaat e Nafs ki mukhalifat karne wala ho,_

_(4) Apne Aqaa ke hukm ki ita'at karne wala ho,_

_pas awaam ko chahiye ke uski Taqleed kare."_

(Wasailus Shia, Vol 27, P-131, Aqwaal 14 Masumeen (as), p227)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰہُمَّ اَعْطِنِيْ بَصِيْرَةً فِيْ دِيْنِكَ، وَ فَهْمًا فِيْ حُكْمِكَ، وَ فِقْهًا فِيْ عِلْمِكَ، وَ كِفْلَيْنِ مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ.*

_"Aye Khuda! Mujhe Apne Deen ke bare mein ek Baseerat, Apne Hikmat mein Tafheem, Apne Ilm mein Fiqh, Apne Rehmat ki do Zamanaten."_

(Dua Hamza Sumali - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *24th Mahe Rajab 1441*

        *20th March 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                  ♦ _*FIQH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:  (1430)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَا كَانَ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنْفِرُوا كَافَّةً ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِنْ كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍ مِنْهُمْ طَائِفَةٌ لِيَتَفَقَّهُوا فِي الدِّينِ وَلِيُنْذِرُوا قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوا إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ*

_"Munasib nahi ke sab ke sab Mo'meneen (Ijtehad ki taraf) kooch karen. Kyon na har group mein se ek kooch kare, taake Deen mein Fiqh (Islam ke Ma'arif e Ahkam ki gahri samajh) hasil karen aur apni qaum ki taraf wapas aa kar unhe daraen taake woh (Hukm e Khuda ki mukhtalifat se) daren."_

(Surah Tauba: 122)

📚📖 📕

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd...)

Imam Sadiq (as) se Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki is hadis ke baare mein sawal kiya gaya: *"اختلاف امتى رحمة"* (Meri Ummat ka Ikhtilaf Rehmat hai.)

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Ji haan hadis sahih hai. Hadis ka wo mafhoom nahi hai jo tum samajh rahe ho. 'Ikhtilaf' ka ek mafhoom yake ke baad digar ana bhi hai (One after another) (2:164). Aur is Ayat (9:122) mein:_

_Allah Ta'ala ne Ahle Imaan ko Hukm diya ke woh Deen Fahmi ke liye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein ek ke baad ek aate rahen aur Ahkam e Islam se waqfiyyat hasil karen aur jab unhe waqfiyyat ho jaye to apni Qaum mein jayen aur unhe Deen ki Tableegh karen. Isliye Nabi Akram (saww) ne farmaya: "Meri Ummat ka yake baad digare Fahme Deen ke liye mere paas aana Rehmat hai. Habib e Khuda (saww) ki Hadis ka ye mafhoom hargiz nahi hai ke Khuda ke Deen mein Ikhtilaf e Rehmat hai, kyonki Deen to ek hai."_

(Ilalus Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Reza (as)

se sawaal hua ke Namaz e Juma 2 Rak'at hai aur agar Imam na ho to 4 Rak'at Namaz e Zuhr kyun padhi jaati hai? Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Iski bahut si wajuhaat (reasons) hain: 1) Log Namaz e Juma ke liye door daraaz se safar kar ke aate hain. Allah Ta'ala ne chaha ke log thake hue hain is liye inhe 2 Rak'at ki ri'aayat (concession) di jaaye. Is liye Namaz e Juma 2 Rak'at hai. 2) Imam kuchh der ke liye khutba deta hai aur muqtadi Khutba sunte rehte hain aur unhe Namaz ka intezar hota hai aur jo Namaz ke intezaar mein ho to wo bhi Namaz mein shumaar kiya jata hai. Isi liye Juma ke 2 Khutbe 2 Rak'at qaem karne ke barabar hai. 3) Imam ke saath 2 Rak'at Namaz Khuda ki nazar mein 4 Rak'at hai kyunki Imam ke Ilm, Fiqh, Adl aur Fazl ki wajah se 2 Rak'at Namaz ko itni bulandi naseeb hoti hai ke wo 4 Rak'at maani jati hai. 4) Juma Musalmano'n ki Eid hai aur Namaz e Eid 2 Rak'at hi hua karti hai aur 2 Khutbo'n ki wajah se isme Qasr paida nahi hoti."_

(Uyoon Akhbaar ar Reza, v2, p232)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Fuqaha Rasoolo'n ke Ameen (Amanatdar) hain, jab tak ke wo Duniyadari mein na paden."_

Logo'n ne puchha: "Duniyadari se aap ki kya muraad hai?"

Farmaya,

_"Badshaho'n ki pairavi karna. Aur jab Fuqaha aisa karne lagen to unse apne Deen ke baare mein daro."_

(Kaafi, v1, p46, h5, Ijtehaad Ke Jalway, p91)

📖

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jab Allah Ta'ala kisi bande ke saath Neki aur Ehsaan ka iraada karta hai to usko Deen mein Fiqh (soojh boojh) ata karta hai (yaani Ilm e Deen aur Fiqh ata karta hai)."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p263)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰہُمَّ اَعْطِنِيْ بَصِيْرَةً فِيْ دِيْنِكَ، وَ فَهْمًا فِيْ حُكْمِكَ، وَ فِقْهًا فِيْ عِلْمِكَ، وَ كِفْلَيْنِ مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ.*

_"Aye Khuda! Mujhe Apne Deen ke bare mein ek Baseerat, Apne Hikmat mein Tafheem, Apne Ilm mein Fiqh, Apne Rehmat ki do Zamanaten."_

(Dua Hamza Sumali - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT IMAM MUSA KAZIM (as)*

**********************************

        *25th Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *21st March 2020, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                 ♦ _*JIHAAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1431)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِینَ یَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡیَجِدُوا۟ فِیكُمۡ غِلۡظَةࣰۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ.*

_"Imaan Walo! Apne ird gird rahne wale Kafiron se Jang karo aur woh tumhare andar sakhti aur taqat ka ehsaas karen. Aur Jaan lo ke Allah Parhezgaron ke saath hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 123)

📚📖 ⚔️

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat mein Allah ne War Techniques ka ek point bayan kiya hai ke qareeb ka Dushman door ke Dushman se zyada khatarnak hota hai. Aur hame unhe par apna rob jama kar rakhna chahiye. Apne Dushman ko dhauns mein rakhen lekin Parhezgari ka bhi khayal rahe.

⚔️

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Is Ayat mein ilaqa Dailim ke Kuffar se Jang karne ka Hukm hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Hamara Shia bas woh hai jo hamari pairavi kare aur hamari Mukhalifat na kare aur jab ham khauf mein hon to woh bhi apne aapko khauf mein mehsoos kare aur jab ham Amn mein hon to woh bhi apne aapko Amn mein mehsoos kare. Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai "Ahle Zikr se sawal karo.." (Nahl:43) aur (9:122). Lehaza tum par Sawal karna aur ham se daryaft karna Wajib kiya gaya hai lekin ham par Jawab farz nahi kiya gaya."_

🕌

_"Fahm e Deen ki Alaamat mein Hilm aur Khamoshi shamil hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Us waqt tak koi shakhs Faqih nahi ban sakta jab tak woh apne Libaas ke naye aur purane hone se be parwah na ho jaye aur koi shakhs us waqt tak Faqih nahi ban sakta jab tak woh khaane peene ki fikr se azaad na ho jaye."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Teen Baaton se Muslim ki takmeel hoti hai:_

_(1) Fiqh: Deen mein soojh boojh hasil karna._

_(2) Economical: Maeeshat mein etedaal ka hona._

_(3) Patience: Masaeb par Sabr karna."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا تُبَدِّلْ اِسْمِيْ وَ لَا تُغَيِّرْ جِسْمِيْ وَ لَا تَجْهَدْ بَلَاۤئِيْ وَ لَا تُشْمِتْ بِيْۤ اَعْدَاۤئِيْۤ اَعُوْذُ بِعَفْوِكَ مِنْ عِقَابِكَ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِكَ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ.....*

(One of the Dua in Aamaal of 15th Shaban night - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE WAFAT E JANABE ABU TALIB (as)*

**********************************

       *26th Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *22nd March 2020, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*IMAAN  KE DARJE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1432)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا مَاۤ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةࣱ فَمِنۡهُم مَّن یَقُولُ أَیُّكُمۡ زَادَتۡهُ هَـٰذِهِۦۤ إِیمَـٰنࣰاۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ إِیمَـٰنࣰا وَهُمۡ یَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ *  وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِینَ فِی قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضࣱ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمۡ كَـٰفِرُونَ.*

_"Aur jab kabhi koi Surah nazil hoti hai to un mein se baaz log (bataur e Tanz) kahte hain ke is Sureh ne tum mein se kis ke Imaan mein izaafa kiya hai? Jo log Imaan laye hain unke Imaan mein izaafa hota hai aur woh khush hote hain. Aur jinke Dilon mein Bimaari hai to Surah ke nuzool se unke sabiq Nijasat par ek nayi Nijasat ka izaafa ho jata hai. Aur aise log Kufr par hi mar jaate hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 124 - 125)

📚📖 ⚔️

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Imaan mein kami bhi hoti hai aur Imaan mein izaafa bhi hota hai. Quran mein hai (9:124) aur Ayat "Woh aise Jawan the jo apne Rab par Imaan laye the aur Hamne Hidayat ka un mein izaafa kiya tha. (Kahef:13). Agar Imaan ke darajat mein kami beshi na hoti to kisi Momin ko apne Momin bhai par Fazilat hasil na hoti aur Ne'maat mein sabke sab yaksan taur par hissedar hote aur tamam Ahle Imaan barabar hote aur kisi ko kisi par bartari hasil na hoti. Imaani Taqazon ke itmam se Ahle Imaan Jannat mein jayenge aur Imaamni Darajat mein izaafe ki wajah se Jannat ke Darajat mein farq hoga aur jahan Imaani Taqaze mafqood honge to aise afraad Dozakh mein dakhil honge."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Imaan Dil mein chamak ki manind namudar hota hai, jitna Imaan badhta jayega utna hi chamak mein izaafa hota jayega."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤷‍♂

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Lafz *رجس* se murad Shak hai. Means jinke Dilon mein Bimaari hai, Suraton ke nuzool se unke Shukoon o Shubhaat (Doubts) mein mazeed izaafa hota hai."_

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ وَ الْمُسْلِمَاتِ اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلِ التَّقْوٰى زَادَهُمْ وَ الْاِيمَانَ وَ الْحِكْمَةَ فِي قُلُوْبِهِمْ وَ اَوْزِعْهُمْ اَنْ يَشْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِيْۤ اَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ، وَ اَنْ يُوْفُوْا بِعَهْدِكَ الَّذِيْ عَاهَدْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ اِلٰهَ الْحَقِّ وَ خَالِقَ الْخَلْقِ....*

(Doosra Khutba e Juma Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

🏴 *Aghaze Safar e Karbala* 🏴

🐪🐫🐪🐫🐪🐫🐪🐫🐪🐫

**********************************

         *28th Mahe Rajab 1441*

     *24th March 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                ♦ _*IMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1433)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِینَ فِی قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضࣱ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمۡ كَـٰفِرُونَ.*

_"Aur jinke Dilon mein Bimaari hai to Surah ke nuzool se unke sabiq Nijasat par ek nayi Nijasat ka izaafa ho jata hai. Aur aise log Kufr par hi mar jaate hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 125)

📚📖 ⚔️

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aajkal ek mohlik waba (Deadly Pandamic) phaili hui hai. Duniya bhar mein log is Bimaari se pareshan hain. Koi bhi Bala ya to Azaab ya Imtihan hoti hai.

Riwayat mein hai ke 7 Martaba agar kisi par Sura Al Hamd padh diya jaye to uska Bukhar utar jata hai Aur isi tarah mukhtalif Duayen batayin gayi hain. Lekin aksar log ye dekh kar tajjub karte hai ke koi asar nahi hua. Ya aajkal log is tarah bhi kahne lage hain ke ya sab cheezon se koi asar nahi hota. Waise jaise is Ayat mein zikr hua Munafiq mazaq udate ke is Ayat ne tumhare Imaan mein kiya izaafa kiya? Allah Ta'ala ne jawab diya ke jinke Dilon mein Bimaari hai unko koi asar nahi hone wala. Unke Dilon mein Nijaasaton ki parten chadti chali jaati hai. Nijasat/Paleedi 4 qismon ki hai: (1) Tabiyat ke lihaz se (2) Aql o fikr ke zaviye se (3) Shariyat ke hawale se (4) Tamam pahluon se.

Iske natije mein Imaan ki kamzori paida hoti hai. Aqeeda kamzor hota hai. Allah par bharosa uth jata hai. Aise shakhs ki Maut Kufr ki Maut hogi.

Isliye jab Insaano ke Gunah badh jate hain to Allah ka Azaab nazil hota hai.

Aise waqt mein Ahle Imaan sirf aur sirf Dua, Tauba o Isteghfar par hi bharosa karte hai. Ziyarat e Ashura is Waba mein zyada mujarrab isko pabandi se padhen.

🤷‍♂

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Lafz *رجس* se murad Shak hai. Means jinke Dilon mein Bimaari hai, Suraton ke nuzool se unke Shukoon o Shubhaat (Doubts) mein mazeed izaafa hota hai."_

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Hasan (as):

_"Jo hum Kaano'n se sune aur uski tasdeeq (accept) karein wo Imaan hai aur jo Aa'nkho'n se dekhein aur qubool karein wo Yaqeen hai."_

(Jaame ul Akhbaar, p49)

🕌

﻿Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Ali (as) ki mohabbat Imaan hai aur Ali (as) ka bugz kufr hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p123)

🕌

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

_"Ghaibat ki wajah wahi hai ke jiske liye Khuda ne kaha hai Imaan waalo’n! Bahut si cheezo’n ke baare mein na puchha karo kyunki agar unko zaahir kar diya jaaye to tumko bura lagega”_ (5:101). 

(Aqwaal 14 Masumeen (as) , p247)

🤲🏻

*....اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ اَنْ تَزِيْدَنِيْ اِيْمَانًا وَ تَثْبِيْتًا يَا بَاطِنًا فِي ظُهُوْرِهِ وَ ظَاهِرًا فِي بُطُوْنِهِ وَ مَكْنُوْنِهِ يَا مُفَرِّقًا بَيْنَ النُّوْرِ وَ الدَّيْجُوْرِ يَا مَوْصُوْفًا بِغَيْرِ كُنْهٍ وَ مَعْرُوْفًا بِغَيْرِ شِبْهٍ.*

(Dua e Rajab - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF JANABE ZAINAB (sa)*

**********************************

           *1st Shabaan 1441*

   *26th March 2020, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*AAFAT, BALA, CALAMITY*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1434)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوَلَا یَرَوۡنَ أَنَّهُمۡ یُفۡتَنُونَ فِی كُلِّ عَامࣲ مَّرَّةً أَوۡ مَرَّتَیۡنِ ثُمَّ لَا یَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمۡ یَذَّكَّرُونَ.*

_"Aur To kya unko dikhayi nahi deta ke ye log har Saal ek bar ya do bar kisi na kisi Aafat mein phanse rahte hain phir bhi na Tauba karte aur na hi koi Nasihat hasil karte hain."_

(Surah Taubah: 126)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Allah Bala, Musibat, Aafat wa Beemari de kar apne Bande ko jhatka deta hai ke shayad woh Gumrahi ke Raasta chhod kar, Seedha Raasta ikhtiyar kare. Apne Gunahon ki Tauba kare. Beshak Allah Tauba qubool karne wala hai. Tauba se Azaab e Ilahi tal jata hai. Hazrat Yunus (as) ki Qaum ne Tauba ki, unki Tauba qubool hui aur aanewala Azaab tal gaya. Is Ayat ke mutabiq Allah sabhi logon ko Saal mein ek ya do martaba azmata hi hai. Masibat o Bala ya Waba dekh kar har Insaan ko sabaq lena chahiye. Allah kisi bhi tarah se kisi ki bhi Azmaish le sakta hai. Jab Nauka (Boat) bhanwar mein doobne lagti hai to sab ko Allah yaad aane lagta hai. Balayen hoti hi isliye hain ke Insaan ke Ghamand ko tod diya jaye. Aajkal ham yehi dekh rahe hain jo ye Ayat bayan kar rahi hai

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Bala ke zariye Momin ka isi tarah Imtihaan hota hai jis tarah Aag ke zariye Sone ko parkha jaata hai."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p131)

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Momin jab Budhha hota hai to Allah ek Farishte ko hukm deta hai ke is haalat mein uske liye wohi Nek Amal likhein jo uski Jawani aur Tandrusti ki haalat mein likhte the aur isi tarah jab wo Beemar hota hai to ek Farishte ko muayyan (appoint) karta hai ke woh Haalat e Marz mein uske liye wohi likhe jo wo Haalat e Tandrusti mein baja laata."_

(Furoo e Kafi, v1, p271)

Imam Kazim (as)

se ek shakhs ne shikayat ki ke, "Mere bahut se bachche hain aur sab beemar hain." Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Unka ilaaj Sadqe ke zariye karo kyun ki Sadqe se zyada jaldi qubool hone wali aur Mareez ko zyada faayda pahunchane wali aur koi cheez nahi hai."_

(Tibb ul Aimma (as), p13)

🤲🏻

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Khudaya! Mere Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Namoos ko batta laga dete hain. Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Ne'mato'n ko mutaghayyar kar diye karte hain. Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Duaon ko Teri Bargah tak pahunchne se rok dete hain. Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo ummidon ko munqata kar dete hain. *Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Nuzool e Balaa ka sabab hote hain.* "_

(Dua-e-Kumail - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *2nd Shabaan 1441*

      *27th March 2020, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*HAQ KE DUSHMAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1435)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا مَاۤ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةࣱ نَّظَرَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ هَلۡ یَرَىٰكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدࣲ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ لَّا یَفۡقَهُونَ.*

_"Jab koi Surah nazil hota hai to ye log Aankhon hi Aankhon mein ek doosre baaten karte hain ke kahin tumhe koi dekh to nahi raha hai. Phir woh chupke se nikal bhagte hain. Allah ne unke Dil pher diye hain, kyonki ye samajhne wali qaum nahi hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 127)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Ayat Munafiqeen ki Harkaton ki taraf ishara kar rahi hai.

Is Ayat se General Lesson bhi liya jaa sakta hai. Aisi harkat woh log karte hain jinko Haq ya Haq baaten pasand nahi yahan tak ke sunna bhi pasand nahi karte. Kyonki jab Haq ka zikr hota hai to Baatil ki bhi poll khulti hai. Unko isi baat ka darr rahta hai aur isi liye woh wahan se khisak lete hain. Zahir mein to bade Momin dikhayi denge lekin unke Dil mein wo sab kuchh bhara hota hai jo ham soch bhi nahi sakte. Unki hatdharmi, Enaad, Gunah, Takabbur ki wajah se unke Dil Haq se phir jate hain. Agar unke paas zara si samajh hoti to woh aisa nahi karte. In Dilon par Allah ka Azaab nazil nahi hoga to aur kya hoga, Aafat nahi aayegi to kya aayegi.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🙏🏻

Imam Ali (as):

_"Tauba Dilo'n ko Paak karti hai aur Gunaho'n ko dhoti hai."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p177)

🛣️ 🚩

Imam Ali (as):

_"Agar Allah chahta to Bando'n ko khud hi Apni Ma'arefat ata kar deta. *Lekin Usne hamen Apna Darwaza, Apni Siraat aur Apni Sabeel qaraar diya* hai aur woh wajah muqarrar kar di jisse Us tak pahunch sakte hain. Pus, jo log hamari Wilayat se Mu'nh mod le'n ya hum par kisi doosre ko fazilat den, unhi ko Allah ne farmaya hai ke, 'Woh Raah e Raast se hat janewale hain'."_

(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p101)

🎷🎺🎸

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Gina / Music Dil mein Nifaaq (Hypocrisy) ko yu'n ugaati hai jaise Paani Sabzi-Tarkaari ko."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 7, p437)

🤲🏻

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

_"Aye Parwardigar! Tu mujhe pukaarta hai to main Tujh se Mu'nh modta hun. Tu mujh se Mohabbat karta hai, main Tujh se khafgi karta hun. Tu mere saath Ulfat karta hai, main be-rukhi karta hun, jaisa ke mera Tujh par koi Ehsaan raha ho. To bhi mera ye Amal Tujhe mujh par Rehmat farmane aur mujh par apni ata o bakshish ke saath Fazl o Ehsaan karne se baaz nahi rakhta. Pus, Apne is nadaan bande par Rahem farma aur ispar Apne Fazl o Ehsaan se Sakhawat farma. Beshak, Tu Bada Denewala, Sakhi hai."_

(Dua e Iftitaah)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF JANABE ALI AKBAR (as) or Imam Zainul Abedin (as)*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

**********************************

             *5th Shabaan 1441*

     *30th March 2020, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*AUSAAF-E-RASOOL (saww)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1436)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَقَدۡ جَاۤءَكُمۡ رَسُولࣱ مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ عَزِیزٌ عَلَیۡهِ مَا عَنِتُّمۡ حَرِیصٌ عَلَیۡكُم بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ رَءُوفࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ.*

_"Yaqeenan tumhare paas ek Rasool aaya hai jo khud tum mein se hain. Tumhari har Musibat us par shaaq guzarti hai. Woh tumhari Hidayat ke liye bahut Hirs karne wala hai (Care for you) aur Ahle Imaan ke liye Shafeeq aur Rahim hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 128)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aaj Shabeeh e Rasool Janabe Ali Akbar Ibne Imam Husain (as) ki Wiladate Mubarak hai, isliye ham Ausaaf e Rasool (saww) ke bare mein zikr karenge.

🕌

"Rasool tum mein se hai" ke kai mafhoom hain. Yani hamara Habib Nasle Insaani se talluq rakhta hai. Agar ek Insaan ke bajaye Allah kisi Farishte ko Nabi o Rasool bana kar bhejta to Maqsade Hidayat faut ho jata. Rasoole Khuda (saww) khaandani hawale se Arabi hain. Ibne Abbas se riwayat hai ke Arab ke jitne qabeele the Nabi Akram (saww) ki kisi na kisi Dadi Nani ka unse talluq banta tha isiliye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya ke tumhe to khush ho kar Hamare Rasool par Imaan laana chahiye aur support karna chahiye kyonki uski Azmat Ahle Arab ki Azmat hai. Arab Ahle Haram ka ehteram karte the aur unhe Khuda ka Kunba qarar dete the, is lehaz se Nabi Akram (saww) ka ehteram karna chahiye thaia, kyonki inhi se Ka'abe ki Azmat wabasta hai. Chunke Rasoole Khuda (saww) unhi ke darmiyan mein the, isliye Arab unki Pakeezgi, Sadaqat, Amaanat, Sharafat o Kirdar se bakhoobi waqif the. Woh ye bhi jaante the Rasoole Khuda (saww) har waqt logon ko Afaat o Balaa se door rakhne aur zyada se zyada fayda pahunchane ke khwahishmand rahe. Itne bade Khair khwah ko Rasool tasleem karna ye ek Azeem Ne'mat hai. Agar *انفس* ke maani Nafees ke len to bhi iske matlab hoga Mohtaram o Moazziz, Ashraf o Affzal Rasool.

Ayat mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki ek aur khusoosiyat batayi gayi hai woh ye ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) hamari bhalai chahte hain. Hamara mushaqqat aur Zehmat mein padna Aap (saww) ko bada giraan guzarta hai. Hamara Rasool nahi chahta ke log Aag ka Eindhan bane aur un par Azaab e Ilahi ka mustaheq qarar payen.

Ye Balayen wa Musabaten isliye hain ke hamne Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka daman chhod diya hai. Agar Aap (saww) se lagaon rakhen, unse shifarish karen, to Aap (saww) to Rehmatul Aalamin hain, Aap (saww) ki Shafaat qubool hoti hai, Dua mustajab hoti hai. Hamari Bhalai ke liye bada Harees hai (khwahishmand), Ahle Imaan ke liye Ra'oof, Shafeeq, Rahim o Meherban hai.

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ham mein se the. Unhe hamari Mashaqqat nagawar thi aur woh hamari bhalai ke liye Harees the. AanHazrat (saww) ki mazkoora Sifaat ka talluq hamse hai jabke Mominon ke liye Ra'oof ka talluq Ahle Imaan se hai. AanHazrat (saww) ki mazkoora 3 Sifaat ka talluq sirf hamse hai jabke chauthi Sifat mein bhi ham Ahle Imaan ke saath sharik hain."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

🤲🏻

Imam Husain (as):

_"(Mere Allah!) Usne kya paaya jisne Tujhe khoya aur usne kuchh na khoya, jisne Tujh ko paa liya. Woh yaqeenan na-kaam hua jo Tere bajaye kisi aur ko pasand karne laga aur woh ghaate mein pada jo sarkashi ke saath Tujh se phir gaya. Kyunkar Tere gair se ummeed rakhte hain jabke Tera Ehsaan o Karam rukta hi nahi aur kyunkar Tere gair se maangte hain, jab ke Tere Fazl o Ehsaan karne ki aadat mein tabdili nahi aati."_

(Dua e Arafa)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *6th Shabaan 1441*

     *31st March 2020, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*ARSH-E-AZEEM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1437)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡا۟ فَقُلۡ حَسۡبِیَ ٱللَّهُ لَاۤ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَلَیۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ.*

_"Agar ye log Munh pher len to keh den ke mere liye Allah kafi hai. Uske alawa koi Ma'bood nahi hai. Meine Usi par bharosa kiya hai aur Woh Arshe Azeem ka Parwardigar hai."_

(Surah Taubah: 129)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Akhir mein poore Surah ka khulasa in akhiri Ayaton mein aa jata hai. Is Surah mein Munafiqeen ki Alamaton wa unki harkton wa Mo'meneen ki khusoosiyaton ka zikr hua.

Jahan har cheez fail jaye wahan sirf aur sirf Allah ko yaad karna. Kyonki poore Alam ka control Usi ke Haath mein hai. Usi se Umeed rakhni chahiye, chahe Insaani Dushmanon ka hamla ho ya kisi Virus ka hamla ho. Insaan to bebas hai. Agar Allah par poora yaqeen hai to phir darne ki koi baat nahi, Woh Musabbabul Asbaab hai.

🕌 👉🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Arsh ki kaseer aur mukhtalif Sifaat hain. Allah Ta'ala ne Qur'an Majeed mein lafz "Azeem" se iski Sifaat bayan ki hai aur Arshe Azeem ka maana hai 'Mulke Azeem'. Lafz Arsh Mulk o Saltanat ke maani mein hai jaisa ke Farmane Khuda wandi hai *ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ* "Rehman Apni Saltanat par Jalwa Afroz hua." (20:5) Aur ye Ashya ki kaifiyat ki Milkiyyat hai. Arsh, Kursi se juda cheez hai jabke Arsh o Kursi dono ka talluq Ghaib ke bahut bade Darwazon se hai aur dono hi Ghaib hain aur Ghaib hone mein dono yaksaan hain. Lafz Kursi ka itlaaq Ghaib ke us Darwaze par kiya gaya hai jahan se Kaynat Zahoor pazeer hui aur isse tamam Ashya zahir huin jabke Arsh us Baatini Darwaze ka naam hai jis mein Ilm, Kaif, Kaun, Hamd, Qadr, Zarfiyyat, Mashiyyat, Sifat e Iraada, Ilme Alfaaz o Harakat, Ilm e Sarak (ثرک), Ilmul Ood wal Bada (علم العود و البداء) paye jate hain. Jab ke dono ka talluq Ilm e Ilahi (عِلم اِلٰهِيْ) se hai. Arsh ki Saltanat aur hai aur Kursi ki Saltanat aur hai aur Arsh ka Ilm Kursi ke Ilm se Ghaib tar hai aur jab *(رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ)* kaha jata hai to uska mafhoom ye hota hai ke Uski Sifat Kursi ki Sifat se Azeem hai."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Darindon se Ghar ki Hifazat ke liye is Surah Tauba ki akhiri do Ayat padhne ki Nasihat farmayi.

👉🏻

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) se farmaya:

_"Ali (as)! Jisko Darindon ka khauf ho to woh Surah Tauba ki Akhiri do Ayaten padhe. (Darindon se Mehfooz rahega.)"_

(Usoole Kaafi, Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنْ هُوَ الرَّحْمٰنُ الرَّحِيْمُ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوٰى*

(Dua e Alqama - Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

THE END
